title: Measurable functions
content: Proofs for most of the theorems in section 121 of [Fremlin1]. Real-valued functions are considered, and measurability is defined with respect to an arbitrary sigma-algebra. When the sigma-algebra on the domain is the Lebesgue measure on the reals, then all real-valued measurable functions in the sense of ~ df-mbf are also sigma-measurable, but the definition in this section considers as measurable functions, some that are not measurable in the sense of ~ df-mbf (see ~ mbfpsssmf and ~ smfmbfcex ).

blocks.name: csmblfn
blocks.content: Extend class notation with the class of real-valued measurable functions w.r.t. sigma-algebras.
blocks.origin: const class csmblfn { SMblFn }

blocks.content: Define a real-valued measurable function w.r.t. a given sigma-algebra. See Definition 121C of [Fremlin1] p. 36 and Definition 135E (b) of [Fremlin1] p. 80 . (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 26-Jun-2021.)

blocks.name: pimltmnf2
blocks.content: Given a real-valued function, the preimage of an open interval, unbounded below, with upper bound ` -oo ` , is the empty set. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 26-Jun-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm pimltmnf2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(crab(s0, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), clt, cmnf)), emptycls))
  -| wnfc(s0, c1)
  -| wi(w0, wf(c1, c0, cr))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  eqtrd(crab(s0, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), clt, cmnf)), emptycls, crab(hs0, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), clt, cmnf)), w0)
  a1i(w0, wceq(crab(s0, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), clt, cmnf)), crab(hs0, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), clt, cmnf))))
  cbvrab(s0, hs0, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), clt, cmnf), wbr(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), clt, cmnf))
  nfcv(s0, c0)
  nfcv(hs0, c0)
  nfv(hs0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), clt, cmnf))
  nfbr(s0, cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), clt, cmnf)
  nffv(s0, c1, cv(hs0))
  nfcv(s0, cv(hs0))
  nfcv(s0, clt)
  nfcv(s0, cmnf)
  breq1d(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), clt, cmnf, cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))
  fveq2(cv(s0), cv(hs0), c1)
  sylibr(w0, wceq(crab(hs0, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), clt, cmnf)), emptycls), wral(hs0, c0, wn(wbr(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), clt, cmnf))))
  ralrimiva(hs0, c0, w0, wn(wbr(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), clt, cmnf)))
  mpbid(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wn(wbr(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), clt, cmnf)), wbr(cmnf, cle, cfv(c1, cv(hs0))))
  xrltled(cmnf, cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  mnfltd(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  xrlenltd(cmnf, cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  a1i(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wcel(cmnf, cxr))
  mnfxr()
  rexrd(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  ffvelrnda(cv(hs0), c0, c1, cr, w0)
  rabeq0(hs0, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), clt, cmnf))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), clt, cmnf))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.clt.s(s0)
  diff.cmnf.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm pimltmnf2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → { s0 ∈ c0 |(c1 ` s0)[<]-∞ } = ∅)
  ⊣ F/(s0, c1)
  ⊣ (w0 →(c1 : c0 → ℝ))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
} = {
  eqtrd({ s0 ∈ c0 |(c1 ` s0)[<]-∞ }, emptycls, { hs0 ∈ c0 |(c1 ` hs0)[<]-∞ }, w0)
  a1i(w0, { s0 ∈ c0 |(c1 ` s0)[<]-∞ } = { hs0 ∈ c0 |(c1 ` hs0)[<]-∞ })
  cbvrab(s0, hs0, c0, (c1 ` s0)[<]-∞, (c1 ` hs0)[<]-∞)
  nfcv(s0, c0)
  nfcv(hs0, c0)
  nfv(hs0, (c1 ` s0)[<]-∞)
  nfbr(s0, (c1 ` hs0), clt, cmnf)
  nffv(s0, c1, hs0)
  nfcv(s0, hs0)
  nfcv(s0, clt)
  nfcv(s0, cmnf)
  breq1d((c1 ` s0), clt, cmnf, (c1 ` hs0), s0 = hs0)
  fveq2(s0, hs0, c1)
  sylibr(w0, { hs0 ∈ c0 |(c1 ` hs0)[<]-∞ } = ∅, ∀(hs0 ∈ c0, ¬(c1 ` hs0)[<]-∞))
  ralrimiva(hs0, c0, w0, ¬(c1 ` hs0)[<]-∞)
  mpbid((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c0), ¬(c1 ` hs0)[<]-∞, -∞[≤](c1 ` hs0))
  xrltled(cmnf, (c1 ` hs0), (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c0))
  mnfltd((c1 ` hs0), (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c0))
  xrlenltd(cmnf, (c1 ` hs0), (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c0))
  a1i((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c0), -∞ ∈ ℝ*)
  mnfxr()
  rexrd((c1 ` hs0), (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c0))
  ffvelrnda(hs0, c0, c1, cr, w0)
  rabeq0(hs0, c0, (c1 ` hs0)[<]-∞)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w((c1 ` s0)[<]-∞)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.clt.s(s0)
  diff.cmnf.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
}

blocks.name: preimagelt
blocks.content: The preimage of a right-open, unbounded below interval, is the complement of a left-closed unbounded above interval. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 26-Jun-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm preimagelt(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cdif(c0, crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, cle, c2))), crab(s0, c0, wbr(c2, clt, c1))))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c2, cxr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cxr))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  sylibr(w0, wceq(cdif(c0, crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, cle, c2))), crab(s0, c0, wbr(c2, clt, c1))), wal(s0, wb(wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c0, crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, cle, c2)))), wcel(cv(s0), crab(s0, c0, wbr(c2, clt, c1))))))
  alrimi(s0, w0, wb(wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c0, crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, cle, c2)))), wcel(cv(s0), crab(s0, c0, wbr(c2, clt, c1)))))
  impbid(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c0, crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, cle, c2)))), wcel(cv(s0), crab(s0, c0, wbr(c2, clt, c1))))
  ex(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c0, crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, cle, c2)))), wcel(cv(s0), crab(s0, c0, wbr(c2, clt, c1))))
  sylibr(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c0, crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, cle, c2))))), wcel(cv(s0), crab(s0, c0, wbr(c2, clt, c1))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(c2, clt, c1)))
  jca(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c0, crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, cle, c2))))), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(c2, clt, c1))
  mpbird(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c0, crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, cle, c2))))), wbr(c2, clt, c1), wn(wbr(c1, cle, c2)))
  adantl(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c0, crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, cle, c2)))), wn(wbr(c1, cle, c2)))
  pm2.65da(wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c0, crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, cle, c2)))), wbr(c1, cle, c2), wcel(cv(s0), crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, cle, c2))))
  sylibr(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c0, crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, cle, c2)))), wbr(c1, cle, c2)), wcel(cv(s0), crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, cle, c2))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(c1, cle, c2)))
  anim1i(wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c0, crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, cle, c2)))), wbr(c1, cle, c2), wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  adantr(wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c0, crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, cle, c2)))), wbr(c1, cle, c2), wn(wcel(cv(s0), crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, cle, c2)))))
  eldifn(cv(s0), c0, crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, cle, c2)))
  xrltnled(c2, c1, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c0, crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, cle, c2))))))
  syldan(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c0, crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, cle, c2)))), wcel(c2, cxr), wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  adantl(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c0, crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, cle, c2)))), wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  eldifi(cv(s0), c0, crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, cle, c2)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c0, crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, cle, c2)))), wcel(c1, cxr))
  ex(w0, wcel(cv(s0), crab(s0, c0, wbr(c2, clt, c1))), wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c0, crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, cle, c2)))))
  eldifd(cv(s0), c0, crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, cle, c2)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), crab(s0, c0, wbr(c2, clt, c1)))))
  sylnibr(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), crab(s0, c0, wbr(c2, clt, c1)))), wcel(cv(s0), crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, cle, c2))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(c1, cle, c2)))
  intnand(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), crab(s0, c0, wbr(c2, clt, c1)))), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(c1, cle, c2))
  mpbid(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), crab(s0, c0, wbr(c2, clt, c1)))), wn(wbr(c1, cle, c2)), wbr(c2, clt, c1))
  adantl(w0, wcel(cv(s0), crab(s0, c0, wbr(c2, clt, c1))), wbr(c2, clt, c1))
  simprbi(wcel(cv(s0), crab(s0, c0, wbr(c2, clt, c1))), wbr(c2, clt, c1), wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  xrltnled(c2, c1, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), crab(s0, c0, wbr(c2, clt, c1)))))
  syldan(w0, wcel(cv(s0), crab(s0, c0, wbr(c2, clt, c1))), wcel(c2, cxr), wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  adantl(w0, wcel(cv(s0), crab(s0, c0, wbr(c2, clt, c1))), wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  simplbi(wcel(cv(s0), crab(s0, c0, wbr(c2, clt, c1))), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(c2, clt, c1))
  rabid(s0, c0, wbr(c2, clt, c1))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), crab(s0, c0, wbr(c2, clt, c1))), wcel(c1, cxr))
  rabid(s0, c0, wbr(c1, cle, c2))
  dfcleqf(s0, cdif(c0, crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, cle, c2))), crab(s0, c0, wbr(c2, clt, c1)))
  nfdif(s0, c0, crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, cle, c2)))
  nfcv(s0, c0)
  nfrab1(s0, c0, wbr(c1, cle, c2))
  nfrab1(s0, c0, wbr(c2, clt, c1))
}

blocks.name: preimalegt
blocks.content: The preimage of a left-open, unbounded above interval, is the complement of a right-closed unbounded below interval. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 26-Jun-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm preimalegt(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cdif(c0, crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, cle, c2))), crab(s0, c0, wbr(c2, clt, c1))))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cxr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cxr))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  sylibr(w0, wceq(cdif(c0, crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, cle, c2))), crab(s0, c0, wbr(c2, clt, c1))), wal(s0, wb(wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c0, crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, cle, c2)))), wcel(cv(s0), crab(s0, c0, wbr(c2, clt, c1))))))
  alrimi(s0, w0, wb(wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c0, crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, cle, c2)))), wcel(cv(s0), crab(s0, c0, wbr(c2, clt, c1)))))
  impbid(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c0, crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, cle, c2)))), wcel(cv(s0), crab(s0, c0, wbr(c2, clt, c1))))
  ex(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c0, crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, cle, c2)))), wcel(cv(s0), crab(s0, c0, wbr(c2, clt, c1))))
  sylibr(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c0, crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, cle, c2))))), wcel(cv(s0), crab(s0, c0, wbr(c2, clt, c1))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(c2, clt, c1)))
  jca(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c0, crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, cle, c2))))), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(c2, clt, c1))
  mpbird(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c0, crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, cle, c2))))), wbr(c2, clt, c1), wn(wbr(c1, cle, c2)))
  adantl(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c0, crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, cle, c2)))), wn(wbr(c1, cle, c2)))
  pm2.65da(wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c0, crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, cle, c2)))), wbr(c1, cle, c2), wcel(cv(s0), crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, cle, c2))))
  sylibr(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c0, crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, cle, c2)))), wbr(c1, cle, c2)), wcel(cv(s0), crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, cle, c2))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(c1, cle, c2)))
  anim1i(wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c0, crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, cle, c2)))), wbr(c1, cle, c2), wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  adantr(wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c0, crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, cle, c2)))), wbr(c1, cle, c2), wn(wcel(cv(s0), crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, cle, c2)))))
  eldifn(cv(s0), c0, crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, cle, c2)))
  xrltnled(c2, c1, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c0, crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, cle, c2))))))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c0, crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, cle, c2)))), wcel(c2, cxr))

  ex(w0, wcel(cv(s0), crab(s0, c0, wbr(c2, clt, c1))), wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c0, crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, cle, c2)))))

  adantl(w0, wcel(cv(s0), crab(s0, c0, wbr(c2, clt, c1))), wbr(c2, clt, c1))

  syldan(w0, wcel(cv(s0), crab(s0, c0, wbr(c2, clt, c1))), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  adantl(w0, wcel(cv(s0), crab(s0, c0, wbr(c2, clt, c1))), wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  simplbi(wcel(cv(s0), crab(s0, c0, wbr(c2, clt, c1))), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(c2, clt, c1))
  rabid(s0, c0, wbr(c2, clt, c1))

blocks.name: pimconstlt0
blocks.content: Given a constant function, its preimage with respect to an unbounded below, open interval, with upper bound less than or equal to the constant, is the empty set. Second part of Proposition 121E (a) of [Fremlin1] p. 37 . (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 26-Jun-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm pimconstlt0(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(crab(s0, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), clt, c2)), emptycls))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cr))
  -| wceq(c1, cmpt(s0, c0, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cxr))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c2, cle, c3))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  sylibr(w0, wceq(crab(s0, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), clt, c2)), emptycls), wral(s0, c0, wn(wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), clt, c2))))
  ralrimi(s0, c0, w0, wn(wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), clt, c2)))
  ex(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wn(wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), clt, c2)))
  mpbid(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wn(wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), clt, c2)), wbr(c2, cle, cfv(c1, cv(s0))))
  breqtrrd(c2, cle, cfv(c1, cv(s0)), c3, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(c2, cle, c3))
  xrlenltd(c2, cfv(c1, cv(s0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(c2, cxr))
  rexrd(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  eqeltrd(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cr, c3, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  fvmpt2d(s0, c0, c1, c3, cr, w0)
  a1i(w0, wceq(c1, cmpt(s0, c0, c3)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(c3, cr))
  rabeq0(s0, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), clt, c2))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm pimconstlt0(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → { s0 ∈ c0 |(c1 ` s0)[<]c2 } = ∅)
  ⊣ F/(s0, w0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ ℝ)
  ⊣ c1 =(s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ ℝ*)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2[≤]c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
} = {
  sylibr(w0, { s0 ∈ c0 |(c1 ` s0)[<]c2 } = ∅, ∀(s0 ∈ c0, ¬(c1 ` s0)[<]c2))
  ralrimi(s0, c0, w0, ¬(c1 ` s0)[<]c2)
  ex(w0, s0 ∈ c0, ¬(c1 ` s0)[<]c2)
  mpbid((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0), ¬(c1 ` s0)[<]c2, c2[≤](c1 ` s0))
  breqtrrd(c2, cle, (c1 ` s0), c3, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0))
  adantr(w0, s0 ∈ c0, c2[≤]c3)
  xrlenltd(c2, (c1 ` s0), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0))
  adantr(w0, s0 ∈ c0, c2 ∈ ℝ*)
  rexrd((c1 ` s0), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0))
  eqeltrd((c1 ` s0), cr, c3, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0))
  fvmpt2d(s0, c0, c1, c3, cr, w0)
  a1i(w0, c1 =(s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c3))
  adantr(w0, s0 ∈ c0, c3 ∈ ℝ)
  rabeq0(s0, c0, (c1 ` s0)[<]c2)
}

blocks.name: pimconstlt1
blocks.content: Given a constant function, its preimage with respect to an unbounded below, open interval, with upper bound larger than the constant, is the whole domain. First part of Proposition 121E (a) of [Fremlin1] p. 37 . (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 26-Jun-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm pimconstlt1(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(crab(s0, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), clt, c2)), c0))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cr))
  -| wceq(c1, cmpt(s0, c0, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c3, clt, c2))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  eqssd(crab(s0, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), clt, c2)), c0, w0)
  a1i(w0, wss(crab(s0, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), clt, c2)), c0))
  ssrab2(s0, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), clt, c2))
  sylibr(w0, wss(c0, crab(s0, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), clt, c2))), wral(s0, c0, wcel(cv(s0), crab(s0, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), clt, c2)))))
  ralrimi(s0, c0, w0, wcel(cv(s0), crab(s0, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), clt, c2))))
  ex(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), crab(s0, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), clt, c2))))
  sylibr(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(cv(s0), crab(s0, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), clt, c2))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), clt, c2)))
  jca(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), clt, c2))
  simpr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  eqbrtrd(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), clt, c2, c3, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  fvmpt2d(s0, c0, c1, c3, cr, w0)
  a1i(w0, wceq(c1, cmpt(s0, c0, c3)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(c3, cr))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(c3, clt, c2))
  rabid(s0, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), clt, c2))
  dfss3f(s0, c0, crab(s0, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), clt, c2)))
  nfcv(s0, c0)
  nfrab1(s0, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), clt, c2))
}

blocks.name: pimltpnf
blocks.content: Given a real-valued function, the preimage of an open interval, unbounded below, with upper bound ` +oo ` , is the whole domain. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 26-Jun-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm pimltpnf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, clt, cpnf)), c0))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cr))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  eqssd(crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, clt, cpnf)), c0, w0)
  a1i(w0, wss(crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, clt, cpnf)), c0))
  ssrab2(s0, c0, wbr(c1, clt, cpnf))
  sylibr(w0, wss(c0, crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, clt, cpnf))), wral(s0, c0, wcel(cv(s0), crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, clt, cpnf)))))
  ralrimi(s0, c0, w0, wcel(cv(s0), crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, clt, cpnf))))
  ex(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, clt, cpnf))))
  sylibr(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(cv(s0), crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, clt, cpnf))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(c1, clt, cpnf)))
  jca(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(c1, clt, cpnf))
  simpr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  syl(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wbr(c1, clt, cpnf), wcel(c1, cr))
  ltpnf(c1)
  rabid(s0, c0, wbr(c1, clt, cpnf))
  dfss3f(s0, c0, crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, clt, cpnf)))
  nfcv(s0, c0)
  nfrab1(s0, c0, wbr(c1, clt, cpnf))
}

blocks.name: pimgtpnf2
blocks.content: Given a real-valued function, the preimage of an open interval, unbounded above, with lower bound ` +oo ` , is the empty set. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 26-Jun-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm pimgtpnf2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(crab(s0, c0, wbr(cpnf, clt, cfv(c1, cv(s0)))), emptycls))
  -| wnfc(s0, c1)
  -| wi(w0, wf(c1, c0, cr))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  eqtrd(crab(s0, c0, wbr(cpnf, clt, cfv(c1, cv(s0)))), emptycls, crab(hs0, c0, wbr(cpnf, clt, cfv(c1, cv(hs0)))), w0)
  a1i(w0, wceq(crab(s0, c0, wbr(cpnf, clt, cfv(c1, cv(s0)))), crab(hs0, c0, wbr(cpnf, clt, cfv(c1, cv(hs0))))))
  cbvrab(s0, hs0, c0, wbr(cpnf, clt, cfv(c1, cv(s0))), wbr(cpnf, clt, cfv(c1, cv(hs0))))
  nfcv(s0, c0)
  nfcv(hs0, c0)
  nfv(hs0, wbr(cpnf, clt, cfv(c1, cv(s0))))
  nfbr(s0, cpnf, clt, cfv(c1, cv(hs0)))
  nfcv(s0, cpnf)
  nfcv(s0, clt)
  nffv(s0, c1, cv(hs0))
  nfcv(s0, cv(hs0))
  breq2d(cpnf, clt, cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))
  fveq2(cv(s0), cv(hs0), c1)
  sylibr(w0, wceq(crab(hs0, c0, wbr(cpnf, clt, cfv(c1, cv(hs0)))), emptycls), wral(hs0, c0, wn(wbr(cpnf, clt, cfv(c1, cv(hs0))))))
  ralrimiva(hs0, c0, w0, wn(wbr(cpnf, clt, cfv(c1, cv(hs0)))))
  mpbid(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wn(wbr(cpnf, clt, cfv(c1, cv(hs0)))), wbr(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cle, cpnf))
  xrltled(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cpnf, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  ltpnfd(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  xrlenltd(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cpnf, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  rexrd(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  ffvelrnda(cv(hs0), c0, c1, cr, w0)
  a1i(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wcel(cpnf, cxr))
  pnfxr()
  rabeq0(hs0, c0, wbr(cpnf, clt, cfv(c1, cv(hs0))))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wbr(cpnf, clt, cfv(c1, cv(s0))))
  diff.cpnf.s(s0)
  diff.clt.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm pimgtpnf2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → { s0 ∈ c0 | +∞[<](c1 ` s0)} = ∅)
  ⊣ F/(s0, c1)
  ⊣ (w0 →(c1 : c0 → ℝ))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
} = {
  eqtrd({ s0 ∈ c0 | +∞[<](c1 ` s0)}, emptycls, { hs0 ∈ c0 | +∞[<](c1 ` hs0)}, w0)
  a1i(w0, { s0 ∈ c0 | +∞[<](c1 ` s0)} = { hs0 ∈ c0 | +∞[<](c1 ` hs0)})
  cbvrab(s0, hs0, c0, +∞[<](c1 ` s0), +∞[<](c1 ` hs0))
  nfcv(s0, c0)
  nfcv(hs0, c0)
  nfv(hs0, +∞[<](c1 ` s0))
  nfbr(s0, cpnf, clt, (c1 ` hs0))
  nfcv(s0, cpnf)
  nfcv(s0, clt)
  nffv(s0, c1, hs0)
  nfcv(s0, hs0)
  breq2d(cpnf, clt, (c1 ` s0), (c1 ` hs0), s0 = hs0)
  fveq2(s0, hs0, c1)
  sylibr(w0, { hs0 ∈ c0 | +∞[<](c1 ` hs0)} = ∅, ∀(hs0 ∈ c0, ¬ +∞[<](c1 ` hs0)))
  ralrimiva(hs0, c0, w0, ¬ +∞[<](c1 ` hs0))
  mpbid((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c0), ¬ +∞[<](c1 ` hs0), (c1 ` hs0)[≤]+∞)
  xrltled((c1 ` hs0), cpnf, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c0))
  ltpnfd((c1 ` hs0), (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c0))
  xrlenltd((c1 ` hs0), cpnf, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c0))
  rexrd((c1 ` hs0), (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c0))
  ffvelrnda(hs0, c0, c1, cr, w0)
  a1i((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c0), +∞ ∈ ℝ*)
  pnfxr()
  rabeq0(hs0, c0, +∞[<](c1 ` hs0))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(+∞[<](c1 ` s0))
  diff.cpnf.s(s0)
  diff.clt.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
}

blocks.name: salpreimagelt
blocks.content: If all the preimages of left-closed, unbounded below intervals, belong to a sigma-algebra, then all the preimages of right-open, unbounded below intervals, belong to the sigma-algebra. (iv) implies (i) in Proposition 121B of [Fremlin1] p. 36. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 26-Jun-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm salpreimagelt(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, clt, c2)), c3))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wnf(s1, w0)
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, csalg))
  -| wceq(c0, cuni(c3))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cxr))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), cr)), wcel(crab(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s1), cle, c1)), c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cr))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
} = {
  eqeltrd(crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, clt, c2)), c3, cdif(cuni(c3), crab(s0, c0, wbr(c2, cle, c1))), w0)
  eqtr2d(crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, clt, c2)), cdif(cuni(c3), crab(s0, c0, wbr(c2, cle, c1))), cdif(c0, crab(s0, c0, wbr(c2, cle, c1))), w0)
  difeq1d(cuni(c3), crab(s0, c0, wbr(c2, cle, c1)), c0, w0)
  a1i(w0, wceq(cuni(c3), c0))
  eqcomi(cuni(c3), c0)
  preimagelt(s0, c0, c2, c1, w0)
  rexrd(c2, w0)
  saldifcld(c3, crab(s0, c0, wbr(c2, cle, c1)), w0)
  sylc(w0, wcel(crab(s0, c0, wbr(c2, cle, c1)), c3), wcel(c2, cr), wa(w0, wcel(c2, cr)))
  jca(w0, w0, wcel(c2, cr))
  id(w0)
  vtoclgf(s1, c2, cr, wi(wa(w0, wcel(c2, cr)), wcel(crab(s0, c0, wbr(c2, cle, c1)), c3)), wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), cr)), wcel(crab(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s1), cle, c1)), c3)))
  nfim(s1, wa(w0, wcel(c2, cr)), wcel(crab(s0, c0, wbr(c2, cle, c1)), c3))
  nfan(s1, w0, wcel(c2, cr))
  nfel1(s1, c2, cr)
  nfcv(s1, c2)
  nfv(s1, wcel(crab(s0, c0, wbr(c2, cle, c1)), c3))
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(s1), c2), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), cr)), wcel(crab(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s1), cle, c1)), c3), wa(w0, wcel(c2, cr)), wcel(crab(s0, c0, wbr(c2, cle, c1)), c3))
  anbi2d(wceq(cv(s1), c2), w0, wcel(cv(s1), cr), wcel(c2, cr))
  eleq1(cv(s1), c2, cr)
  eleq1d(crab(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s1), cle, c1)), c3, crab(s0, c0, wbr(c2, cle, c1)), wceq(cv(s1), c2))
  rabbidv(s0, c0, wceq(cv(s1), c2), wbr(cv(s1), cle, c1), wbr(c2, cle, c1))
  breq1(cv(s1), c2, cle, c1)
  diff.cr.s(s1)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, crab(s0, c0, wbr(c2, cle, c1)), c3)
  diff.crab.s(s1, s0, c0, wbr(c2, cle, c1))
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.wbr.s(s1, c2, cle, c1)
  diff.cle.s(s1)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(s1), c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm salpreimagelt(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → { s0 ∈ c0 | c1[<]c2 } ∈ c3)
  ⊣ F/(s0, w0)
  ⊣ F/(s1, w0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ SAlg)
  ⊣ c0 = ⋃ c3
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ c1 ∈ ℝ*)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s1 ∈ ℝ)→ { s0 ∈ c0 | s1[≤]c1 } ∈ c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ ℝ)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
} = {
  eqeltrd({ s0 ∈ c0 | c1[<]c2 }, c3, (⋃ c3 \ { s0 ∈ c0 | c2[≤]c1 }), w0)
  eqtr2d({ s0 ∈ c0 | c1[<]c2 }, (⋃ c3 \ { s0 ∈ c0 | c2[≤]c1 }), (c0 \ { s0 ∈ c0 | c2[≤]c1 }), w0)
  difeq1d(⋃ c3, { s0 ∈ c0 | c2[≤]c1 }, c0, w0)
  a1i(w0, ⋃ c3 = c0)
  eqcomi(⋃ c3, c0)
  preimagelt(s0, c0, c2, c1, w0)
  rexrd(c2, w0)
  saldifcld(c3, { s0 ∈ c0 | c2[≤]c1 }, w0)
  sylc(w0, { s0 ∈ c0 | c2[≤]c1 } ∈ c3, c2 ∈ ℝ, (w0 ∧ c2 ∈ ℝ))
  jca(w0, w0, c2 ∈ ℝ)
  id(w0)
  vtoclgf(s1, c2, cr, ((w0 ∧ c2 ∈ ℝ)→ { s0 ∈ c0 | c2[≤]c1 } ∈ c3), ((w0 ∧ s1 ∈ ℝ)→ { s0 ∈ c0 | s1[≤]c1 } ∈ c3))
  nfim(s1, (w0 ∧ c2 ∈ ℝ), { s0 ∈ c0 | c2[≤]c1 } ∈ c3)
  nfan(s1, w0, c2 ∈ ℝ)
  nfel1(s1, c2, cr)
  nfcv(s1, c2)
  nfv(s1, { s0 ∈ c0 | c2[≤]c1 } ∈ c3)
  imbi12d(s1 = c2, (w0 ∧ s1 ∈ ℝ), { s0 ∈ c0 | s1[≤]c1 } ∈ c3, (w0 ∧ c2 ∈ ℝ), { s0 ∈ c0 | c2[≤]c1 } ∈ c3)
  anbi2d(s1 = c2, w0, s1 ∈ ℝ, c2 ∈ ℝ)
  eleq1(s1, c2, cr)
  eleq1d({ s0 ∈ c0 | s1[≤]c1 }, c3, { s0 ∈ c0 | c2[≤]c1 }, s1 = c2)
  rabbidv(s0, c0, s1 = c2, s1[≤]c1, c2[≤]c1)
  breq1(s1, c2, cle, c1)
  diff.cr.s(s1)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, { s0 ∈ c0 | c2[≤]c1 }, c3)
  diff.crab.s(s1, s0, c0, c2[≤]c1)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.wbr.s(s1, c2, cle, c1)
  diff.cle.s(s1)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, s1, c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
}

blocks.name: pimrecltpos
blocks.content: The preimage of an unbounded below, open interval, with positive upper bound, for the reciprocal function. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 26-Jun-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm pimrecltpos(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(crab(s0, c0, wbr(co(nat1, cdiv, c1), clt, c2)), cun(crab(s0, c0, wbr(co(nat1, cdiv, c2), clt, c1)), crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, clt, nat0)))))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cr))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wne(c1, nat0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, crp))
} = {
  sylibr(w0, wceq(crab(s0, c0, wbr(co(nat1, cdiv, c1), clt, c2)), cun(crab(s0, c0, wbr(co(nat1, cdiv, c2), clt, c1)), crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, clt, nat0)))), wal(s0, wb(wcel(cv(s0), crab(s0, c0, wbr(co(nat1, cdiv, c1), clt, c2))), wcel(cv(s0), cun(crab(s0, c0, wbr(co(nat1, cdiv, c2), clt, c1)), crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, clt, nat0)))))))
  alrimi(s0, w0, wb(wcel(cv(s0), crab(s0, c0, wbr(co(nat1, cdiv, c1), clt, c2))), wcel(cv(s0), cun(crab(s0, c0, wbr(co(nat1, cdiv, c2), clt, c1)), crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, clt, nat0))))))
  impbid(w0, wcel(cv(s0), crab(s0, c0, wbr(co(nat1, cdiv, c1), clt, c2))), wcel(cv(s0), cun(crab(s0, c0, wbr(co(nat1, cdiv, c2), clt, c1)), crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, clt, nat0)))))

blocks.name: salpreimalegt
blocks.content: If all the preimages of right-closed, unbounded below intervals, belong to a sigma-algebra, then all the preimages of left-open, unbounded above intervals, belong to the sigma-algebra. (ii) implies (iii) in Proposition 121B of [Fremlin1] p. 35. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 26-Jun-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm salpreimalegt(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, clt, c2)), c3))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wnf(s1, w0)
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, csalg))
  -| wceq(c0, cuni(c3))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c2, cxr))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), cr)), wcel(crab(s0, c0, wbr(c2, cle, cv(s1))), c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cr))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
} = {
  eqeltrd(crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, clt, c2)), c3, cdif(cuni(c3), crab(s0, c0, wbr(c2, cle, c1))), w0)
  eqtr2d(crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, clt, c2)), cdif(cuni(c3), crab(s0, c0, wbr(c2, cle, c1))), cdif(c0, crab(s0, c0, wbr(c2, cle, c1))), w0)
  difeq1d(cuni(c3), crab(s0, c0, wbr(c2, cle, c1)), c0, w0)
  a1i(w0, wceq(cuni(c3), c0))
  eqcomi(cuni(c3), c0)
  preimalegt(s0, c0, c2, c1, w0)
  rexrd(c1, w0)
  saldifcld(c3, crab(s0, c0, wbr(c2, cle, c1)), w0)
  sylc(w0, wcel(crab(s0, c0, wbr(c2, cle, c1)), c3), wcel(c1, cr), wa(w0, wcel(c1, cr)))
  ancli(w0, wcel(c1, cr))
  vtoclgf(s1, c1, cr, wi(wa(w0, wcel(c1, cr)), wcel(crab(s0, c0, wbr(c2, cle, c1)), c3)), wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), cr)), wcel(crab(s0, c0, wbr(c2, cle, cv(s1))), c3)))
  nfcv(s1, c1)
  nfim(s1, wa(w0, wcel(c1, cr)), wcel(crab(s0, c0, wbr(c2, cle, c1)), c3))
  nfan(s1, w0, wcel(c1, cr))
  nfv(s1, wcel(c1, cr))
  nfv(s1, wcel(crab(s0, c0, wbr(c2, cle, c1)), c3))
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(s1), c1), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), cr)), wcel(crab(s0, c0, wbr(c2, cle, cv(s1))), c3), wa(w0, wcel(c1, cr)), wcel(crab(s0, c0, wbr(c2, cle, c1)), c3))
  anbi2d(wceq(cv(s1), c1), w0, wcel(cv(s1), cr), wcel(c1, cr))
  eleq1(cv(s1), c1, cr)

  diff.wcel.s(s1, c1, cr)
  diff.cr.s(s1)

thm salpreimalegt(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → { s0 ∈ c0 | c1[<]c2 } ∈ c3)
  ⊣ F/(s0, w0)
  ⊣ F/(s1, w0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ SAlg)
  ⊣ c0 = ⋃ c3
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ c2 ∈ ℝ*)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s1 ∈ ℝ)→ { s0 ∈ c0 | c2[≤]s1 } ∈ c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ ℝ)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
} = {
  eqeltrd({ s0 ∈ c0 | c1[<]c2 }, c3, (⋃ c3 \ { s0 ∈ c0 | c2[≤]c1 }), w0)
  eqtr2d({ s0 ∈ c0 | c1[<]c2 }, (⋃ c3 \ { s0 ∈ c0 | c2[≤]c1 }), (c0 \ { s0 ∈ c0 | c2[≤]c1 }), w0)
  difeq1d(⋃ c3, { s0 ∈ c0 | c2[≤]c1 }, c0, w0)
  a1i(w0, ⋃ c3 = c0)
  eqcomi(⋃ c3, c0)
  preimalegt(s0, c0, c2, c1, w0)
  rexrd(c1, w0)
  saldifcld(c3, { s0 ∈ c0 | c2[≤]c1 }, w0)
  sylc(w0, { s0 ∈ c0 | c2[≤]c1 } ∈ c3, c1 ∈ ℝ, (w0 ∧ c1 ∈ ℝ))
  ancli(w0, c1 ∈ ℝ)
  vtoclgf(s1, c1, cr, ((w0 ∧ c1 ∈ ℝ)→ { s0 ∈ c0 | c2[≤]c1 } ∈ c3), ((w0 ∧ s1 ∈ ℝ)→ { s0 ∈ c0 | c2[≤]s1 } ∈ c3))
  nfcv(s1, c1)
  nfim(s1, (w0 ∧ c1 ∈ ℝ), { s0 ∈ c0 | c2[≤]c1 } ∈ c3)
  nfan(s1, w0, c1 ∈ ℝ)
  nfv(s1, c1 ∈ ℝ)
  nfv(s1, { s0 ∈ c0 | c2[≤]c1 } ∈ c3)
  imbi12d(s1 = c1, (w0 ∧ s1 ∈ ℝ), { s0 ∈ c0 | c2[≤]s1 } ∈ c3, (w0 ∧ c1 ∈ ℝ), { s0 ∈ c0 | c2[≤]c1 } ∈ c3)
  anbi2d(s1 = c1, w0, s1 ∈ ℝ, c1 ∈ ℝ)
  eleq1(s1, c1, cr)
  eleq1d({ s0 ∈ c0 | c2[≤]s1 }, c3, { s0 ∈ c0 | c2[≤]c1 }, s1 = c1)
  rabbidv(s0, c0, s1 = c1, c2[≤]s1, c2[≤]c1)
  breq2(s1, c1, c2, cle)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c1, cr)
  diff.cr.s(s1)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, { s0 ∈ c0 | c2[≤]c1 }, c3)
  diff.crab.s(s1, s0, c0, c2[≤]c1)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.wbr.s(s1, c2, cle, c1)
  diff.cle.s(s1)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, s1, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
}

blocks.name: pimiooltgt
blocks.content: The preimage of an open interval is the intersection of the preimage of an unbounded below open interval and an unbounded above open interval. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 26-Jun-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm pimiooltgt(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(crab(s0, c0, wcel(c1, co(c2, cioo, c3))), cin(crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, clt, c3)), crab(s0, c0, wbr(c2, clt, c1)))))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cxr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cxr))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cxr))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  eqssd(crab(s0, c0, wcel(c1, co(c2, cioo, c3))), cin(crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, clt, c3)), crab(s0, c0, wbr(c2, clt, c1))), w0)
  ssind(crab(s0, c0, wcel(c1, co(c2, cioo, c3))), crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, clt, c3)), crab(s0, c0, wbr(c2, clt, c1)), w0)
  sylibr(w0, wss(crab(s0, c0, wcel(c1, co(c2, cioo, c3))), crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, clt, c3))), wral(s0, c0, wi(wcel(c1, co(c2, cioo, c3)), wbr(c1, clt, c3))))
  ralrimi(s0, c0, w0, wi(wcel(c1, co(c2, cioo, c3)), wbr(c1, clt, c3)))
  3exp(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(c1, co(c2, cioo, c3)), wbr(c1, clt, c3))
  syl3anc(w3a(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(c1, co(c2, cioo, c3))), wbr(c1, clt, c3), wcel(c2, cxr), wcel(c3, cxr), wcel(c1, co(c2, cioo, c3)))
  iooltub(c2, c3, c1)
  ss2rab(s0, c0, wcel(c1, co(c2, cioo, c3)), wbr(c1, clt, c3))

  ralrimi(s0, c0, w0, wi(wcel(c1, co(c2, cioo, c3)), wbr(c2, clt, c1)))
  3exp(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(c1, co(c2, cioo, c3)), wbr(c2, clt, c1))
  syl3anc(w3a(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(c1, co(c2, cioo, c3))), wbr(c2, clt, c1), wcel(c2, cxr), wcel(c3, cxr), wcel(c1, co(c2, cioo, c3)))
  3adant3(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(c1, co(c2, cioo, c3)), wcel(c2, cxr))
  3adant3(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(c1, co(c2, cioo, c3)), wcel(c3, cxr))
  simp3(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(c1, co(c2, cioo, c3)))
  ioogtlb(c2, c3, c1)
  ss2rab(s0, c0, wcel(c1, co(c2, cioo, c3)), wbr(c2, clt, c1))
  sylibr(w0, wss(cin(crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, clt, c3)), crab(s0, c0, wbr(c2, clt, c1))), crab(s0, c0, wcel(c1, co(c2, cioo, c3)))), wral(s0, cin(crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, clt, c3)), crab(s0, c0, wbr(c2, clt, c1))), wcel(cv(s0), crab(s0, c0, wcel(c1, co(c2, cioo, c3))))))
  ralrimi(s0, cin(crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, clt, c3)), crab(s0, c0, wbr(c2, clt, c1))), w0, wcel(cv(s0), crab(s0, c0, wcel(c1, co(c2, cioo, c3)))))
  ex(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cin(crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, clt, c3)), crab(s0, c0, wbr(c2, clt, c1)))), wcel(cv(s0), crab(s0, c0, wcel(c1, co(c2, cioo, c3)))))
  sylibr(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cin(crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, clt, c3)), crab(s0, c0, wbr(c2, clt, c1))))), wcel(cv(s0), crab(s0, c0, wcel(c1, co(c2, cioo, c3)))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(c1, co(c2, cioo, c3))))
  jca(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cin(crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, clt, c3)), crab(s0, c0, wbr(c2, clt, c1))))), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(c1, co(c2, cioo, c3)))
  eliood(c1, c2, c3, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cin(crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, clt, c3)), crab(s0, c0, wbr(c2, clt, c1))))))
  xrred(c1, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cin(crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, clt, c3)), crab(s0, c0, wbr(c2, clt, c1))))))
  necomd(c1, cmnf, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cin(crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, clt, c3)), crab(s0, c0, wbr(c2, clt, c1))))))
  xrltned(cmnf, c1, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cin(crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, clt, c3)), crab(s0, c0, wbr(c2, clt, c1))))))
  xrlelttrd(cmnf, c1, c2, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cin(crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, clt, c3)), crab(s0, c0, wbr(c2, clt, c1))))))
  a1i(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cin(crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, clt, c3)), crab(s0, c0, wbr(c2, clt, c1))))), wcel(cmnf, cxr))
  mnfxr()
  mnfled(c2, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cin(crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, clt, c3)), crab(s0, c0, wbr(c2, clt, c1))))))
  syldan(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cin(crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, clt, c3)), crab(s0, c0, wbr(c2, clt, c1)))), wcel(c2, cxr), wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(c2, cxr))
  xrltned(c1, cpnf, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cin(crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, clt, c3)), crab(s0, c0, wbr(c2, clt, c1))))))
  xrltletrd(c1, cpnf, c3, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cin(crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, clt, c3)), crab(s0, c0, wbr(c2, clt, c1))))))
  syldan(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cin(crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, clt, c3)), crab(s0, c0, wbr(c2, clt, c1)))), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  a1i(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cin(crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, clt, c3)), crab(s0, c0, wbr(c2, clt, c1))))), wcel(cpnf, cxr))
  pnfxr()
  syl(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cin(crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, clt, c3)), crab(s0, c0, wbr(c2, clt, c1))))), wbr(c3, cle, cpnf), wcel(c3, cxr))
  syldan(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cin(crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, clt, c3)), crab(s0, c0, wbr(c2, clt, c1)))), wcel(c3, cxr), wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  adantl(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cin(crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, clt, c3)), crab(s0, c0, wbr(c2, clt, c1)))), wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  syl(wcel(cv(s0), cin(crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, clt, c3)), crab(s0, c0, wbr(c2, clt, c1)))), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, clt, c3))))
  sseli(cv(s0), crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, clt, c3)), c0)
  ssrab2(s0, c0, wbr(c1, clt, c3))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(c3, cxr))
  pnfge(c3)
  adantl(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cin(crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, clt, c3)), crab(s0, c0, wbr(c2, clt, c1)))), wbr(c2, clt, c1))
  syl(wcel(cv(s0), cin(crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, clt, c3)), crab(s0, c0, wbr(c2, clt, c1)))), wbr(c2, clt, c1), wcel(cv(s0), crab(s0, c0, wbr(c2, clt, c1))))
  elinel2(cv(s0), crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, clt, c3)), crab(s0, c0, wbr(c2, clt, c1)))
  rabidim2(s0, c0, wbr(c2, clt, c1))
  adantl(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cin(crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, clt, c3)), crab(s0, c0, wbr(c2, clt, c1)))), wbr(c1, clt, c3))
  syl(wcel(cv(s0), cin(crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, clt, c3)), crab(s0, c0, wbr(c2, clt, c1)))), wbr(c1, clt, c3), wcel(cv(s0), crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, clt, c3))))
  elinel1(cv(s0), crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, clt, c3)), crab(s0, c0, wbr(c2, clt, c1)))
  rabidim2(s0, c0, wbr(c1, clt, c3))
  rabid(s0, c0, wcel(c1, co(c2, cioo, c3)))
  dfss3f(s0, cin(crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, clt, c3)), crab(s0, c0, wbr(c2, clt, c1))), crab(s0, c0, wcel(c1, co(c2, cioo, c3))))
  nfin(s0, crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, clt, c3)), crab(s0, c0, wbr(c2, clt, c1)))
  nfrab1(s0, c0, wbr(c1, clt, c3))
  nfrab1(s0, c0, wbr(c2, clt, c1))

blocks.name: preimaicomnf
blocks.content: Preimage of an open interval, unbounded below. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 26-Jun-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm preimaicomnf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cima(ccnv(c0), co(cmnf, cico, c1)), crab(s0, c2, wbr(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), clt, c1))))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c0, c2, cxr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cxr))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  eqtrd(cima(ccnv(c0), co(cmnf, cico, c1)), crab(s0, c2, wbr(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), clt, c1)), crab(s0, c2, wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), co(cmnf, cico, c1))), w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(cima(ccnv(c0), co(cmnf, cico, c1)), crab(s0, c2, wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), co(cmnf, cico, c1)))), wfn(c0, c2))
  ffnd(c0, c2, cxr, w0)
  fncnvima2(s0, c0, c2, co(cmnf, cico, c1))
  rabbidva(s0, c2, w0, wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), co(cmnf, cico, c1)), wbr(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), clt, c1))
  impbid(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), co(cmnf, cico, c1)), wbr(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), clt, c1))
  ex(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), co(cmnf, cico, c1)), wbr(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), clt, c1))
  syl3anc(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), co(cmnf, cico, c1))), wbr(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), clt, c1), wcel(cmnf, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), co(cmnf, cico, c1)))
  a1i(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), co(cmnf, cico, c1))), wcel(cmnf, cxr))
  ad2antrr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), co(cmnf, cico, c1)), wcel(c1, cxr))
  simpr(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), co(cmnf, cico, c1)))
  icoltub(cmnf, c1, cfv(c0, cv(s0)))
  ex(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wbr(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), clt, c1), wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), co(cmnf, cico, c1)))
  elicod(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cmnf, c1, wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wbr(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), clt, c1)))
  a1i(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wbr(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), clt, c1)), wcel(cmnf, cxr))
  mnfxr()
  ad2antrr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2), wbr(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), clt, c1), wcel(c1, cxr))
  adantr(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wbr(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), clt, c1), wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cxr))
  adantr(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wbr(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), clt, c1), wbr(cmnf, cle, cfv(c0, cv(s0))))
  mnfled(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)))
  ffvelrnda(cv(s0), c2, c0, cxr, w0)
  simpr(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wbr(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), clt, c1))
  diff.co.s(s0, cmnf, cico, c1)
  diff.cmnf.s(s0)
  diff.cico.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: pimltpnf2
blocks.content: Given a real-valued function, the preimage of an open interval, unbounded below, with upper bound ` +oo ` , is the whole domain. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 26-Jun-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm pimltpnf2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(crab(s0, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), clt, cpnf)), c0))
  -| wnfc(s0, c1)
  -| wi(w0, wf(c1, c0, cr))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  eqtrd(crab(s0, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), clt, cpnf)), c0, crab(hs0, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), clt, cpnf)), w0)
  a1i(w0, wceq(crab(s0, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), clt, cpnf)), crab(hs0, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), clt, cpnf))))
  cbvrab(s0, hs0, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), clt, cpnf), wbr(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), clt, cpnf))
  nfcv(s0, c0)
  nfcv(hs0, c0)
  nfv(hs0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), clt, cpnf))
  nfbr(s0, cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), clt, cpnf)
  nffv(s0, c1, cv(hs0))
  nfcv(s0, cv(hs0))
  nfcv(s0, clt)
  nfcv(s0, cpnf)
  breq1d(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), clt, cpnf, cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))
  fveq2(cv(s0), cv(hs0), c1)
  pimltpnf(hs0, c0, cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), w0)
  nfv(hs0, w0)
  ffvelrnda(cv(hs0), c0, c1, cr, w0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), clt, cpnf))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.clt.s(s0)
  diff.cpnf.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm pimltpnf2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → { s0 ∈ c0 |(c1 ` s0)[<]+∞ } = c0)
  ⊣ F/(s0, c1)
  ⊣ (w0 →(c1 : c0 → ℝ))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
} = {
  eqtrd({ s0 ∈ c0 |(c1 ` s0)[<]+∞ }, c0, { hs0 ∈ c0 |(c1 ` hs0)[<]+∞ }, w0)
  a1i(w0, { s0 ∈ c0 |(c1 ` s0)[<]+∞ } = { hs0 ∈ c0 |(c1 ` hs0)[<]+∞ })
  cbvrab(s0, hs0, c0, (c1 ` s0)[<]+∞, (c1 ` hs0)[<]+∞)
  nfcv(s0, c0)
  nfcv(hs0, c0)
  nfv(hs0, (c1 ` s0)[<]+∞)
  nfbr(s0, (c1 ` hs0), clt, cpnf)
  nffv(s0, c1, hs0)
  nfcv(s0, hs0)
  nfcv(s0, clt)
  nfcv(s0, cpnf)
  breq1d((c1 ` s0), clt, cpnf, (c1 ` hs0), s0 = hs0)
  fveq2(s0, hs0, c1)
  pimltpnf(hs0, c0, (c1 ` hs0), w0)
  nfv(hs0, w0)
  ffvelrnda(hs0, c0, c1, cr, w0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w((c1 ` s0)[<]+∞)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.clt.s(s0)
  diff.cpnf.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
}

thm pimgtmnf2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {

  ralrimiva(hs0, c0, w0, wbr(cmnf, clt, cfv(c1, cv(hs0))))

  ffvelrnda(cv(hs0), c0, c1, cr, w0)

  nfcv(s0, cmnf)

  nffv(s0, c1, cv(hs0))
  nfcv(s0, cv(hs0))
  nfv(hs0, wbr(cmnf, clt, cfv(c1, cv(s0))))
  breq2d(cmnf, clt, cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cfv(c1, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), cv(s0), c1)
  ssrabf(s0, c0, c0, wbr(cmnf, clt, cfv(c1, cv(s0))))
  nfcv(s0, c0)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)

  diff.clt.s(s0)

thm pimdecfgtioc(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0 =(c1 ⋂ c2))
  ⊣ F/(s0, w0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ⊆ ℝ)
  ⊣ (w0 →(c3 : c2 → ℝ*))
  ⊣ (w0 → ∀(s0 ∈ c2, ∀(s1 ∈ c2,(s0[≤]s1 →(c3 ` s1)[≤](c3 ` s0)))))
  ⊣ (w0 → c4 ∈ ℝ*)
  ⊣ c0 = { s0 ∈ c2 | c4[<](c3 ` s0)}
  ⊣ c5 = sup(c0, ℝ*, <)
  ⊣ (w0 → c5 ∈ c0)
  ⊣ c1 =(-∞[(,]]c5)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
  ⊣ d(s1, c5)
} = {
  eqssd(c0, (c1 ⋂ c2), w0)
  ssind(c0, c1, c2, w0)
  ressiocsup(c0, c1, c5, w0)
  sylibr(w0, (c1 ⋂ c2)⊆ c0, ∀(s0 ∈(c1 ⋂ c2), s0 ∈ c0))
  ralrimi(s0, (c1 ⋂ c2), w0, s0 ∈ c0)
  ex(w0, s0 ∈(c1 ⋂ c2), s0 ∈ c0)
  sylibr((w0 ∧ s0 ∈(c1 ⋂ c2)), s0 ∈ c0, (s0 ∈ c2 ∧ c4[<](c3 ` s0)))
  jca((w0 ∧ s0 ∈(c1 ⋂ c2)), s0 ∈ c2, c4[<](c3 ` s0))
  xrltletrd(c4, (c3 ` s0), (c3 ` c5), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈(c1 ⋂ c2)))
  adantr(w0, s0 ∈(c1 ⋂ c2), c4 ∈ ℝ*)
  adantr(w0, s0 ∈(c1 ⋂ c2), (c3 ` c5)∈ ℝ*)
  ffvelrnd(c3, c5, cxr, c2, w0)
  ffvelrnd(c3, s0, cxr, c2, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈(c1 ⋂ c2)))
  adantr(w0, s0 ∈(c1 ⋂ c2), (c3 : c2 → ℝ*))
  adantr(w0, s0 ∈(c1 ⋂ c2), c4[<](c3 ` c5))
  simprd(w0, c4[<](c3 ` c5), c5 ∈ c2)
  sylib(w0, (c5 ∈ c2 ∧ c4[<](c3 ` c5)), c5 ∈ { s0 ∈ c2 | c4[<](c3 ` s0)})
  syl6eleq(c5, { s0 ∈ c2 | c4[<](c3 ` s0)}, c0, w0)
  elrabf(s0, c5, c2, c4[<](c3 ` s0), c4[<](c3 ` c5))
  nfcv(s0, c2)
  nfbr(s0, c4, clt, (c3 ` c5))
  nfcv(s0, c4)
  nffv(s0, c3, c5)
  nfcv(s0, c3)
  nfcxfr(s0, c5, sup(c0, ℝ*, <))
  nfsup(s0, c0, cxr, clt)
  nfcv(s0, cxr)
  nfcv(s0, clt)
  breq2d(c4, clt, (c3 ` s0), (c3 ` c5), s0 = c5)
  fveq2(s0, c5, c3)
  sylc((w0 ∧ s0 ∈(c1 ⋂ c2)), (c3 ` c5)[≤](c3 ` s0), (c5 ∈ c2 ∧ ∀(s1 ∈ c2,(s0[≤]s1 →(c3 ` s1)[≤](c3 ` s0)))), s0[≤]c5)
  jca((w0 ∧ s0 ∈(c1 ⋂ c2)), c5 ∈ c2, ∀(s1 ∈ c2,(s0[≤]s1 →(c3 ` s1)[≤](c3 ` s0))))
  adantr(w0, s0 ∈(c1 ⋂ c2), c5 ∈ c2)
  sseldi(c5, c2, c0, w0)
  syldan(w0, s0 ∈(c1 ⋂ c2), ∀(s1 ∈ c2,(s0[≤]s1 →(c3 ` s1)[≤](c3 ` s0))), s0 ∈ c2)
  adantl(w0, s0 ∈(c1 ⋂ c2), s0 ∈ c2)
  elinel2(s0, c1, c2)
  r19.21bi(s0, c2, w0, ∀(s1 ∈ c2,(s0[≤]s1 →(c3 ` s1)[≤](c3 ` s0))))
  syl3anc((w0 ∧ s0 ∈(c1 ⋂ c2)), s0[≤]c5, -∞ ∈ ℝ*, c5 ∈ ℝ*, s0 ∈(-∞[(,]]c5))
  a1i((w0 ∧ s0 ∈(c1 ⋂ c2)), -∞ ∈ ℝ*)

  elinel1(s0, c1, c2)
  iocleub(cmnf, c5, s0)
  rspcva(s1, c5, c2, (s0[≤]s1 →(c3 ` s1)[≤](c3 ` s0)), (s0[≤]c5 →(c3 ` c5)[≤](c3 ` s0)))
  imbi12d(s1 = c5, s0[≤]s1, (c3 ` s1)[≤](c3 ` s0), s0[≤]c5, (c3 ` c5)[≤](c3 ` s0))
  breq2(s1, c5, s0, cle)
  breq1d((c3 ` s1), cle, (c3 ` s0), (c3 ` c5), s1 = c5)
  fveq2(s1, c5, c3)
  rabeq2i(s0, c0, c2, c4[<](c3 ` s0))
  dfss3f(s0, (c1 ⋂ c2), c0)
  nfci(s0, hs0, (c1 ⋂ c2))
  nfv(s0, hs0 ∈(c1 ⋂ c2))
  nfcxfr(s0, c0, { s0 ∈ c2 | c4[<](c3 ` s0)})
  nfrab1(s0, c2, c4[<](c3 ` s0))
  diff.cxr.s(s0)
  diff.clt.s(s0)
  diff.wi.s(s1, s0[≤]c5, (c3 ` c5)[≤](c3 ` s0))
  diff.wbr.s(s1, s0, cle, c5)
  diff.wbr.s(s1, (c3 ` c5), cle, (c3 ` s0))
  diff.cfv.s(s1, c3, c5)
  diff.cle.s(s1)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, c3, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)

  diff.hs0.c((c1 ⋂ c2))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, hs0, (c1 ⋂ c2))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cin.s(s0, c1, c2)

thm pimincfltioc(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0 =(c1 ⋂ c2))
  ⊣ F/(s0, w0)
  ⊣ F/(s1, w0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ⊆ ℝ)
  ⊣ (w0 →(c3 : c2 → ℝ*))
  ⊣ (w0 → ∀(s0 ∈ c2, ∀(s1 ∈ c2,(s0[≤]s1 →(c3 ` s0)[≤](c3 ` s1)))))
  ⊣ (w0 → c4 ∈ ℝ*)
  ⊣ c0 = { s0 ∈ c2 |(c3 ` s0)[<]c4 }
  ⊣ c5 = sup(c0, ℝ*, <)
  ⊣ (w0 → c5 ∈ c0)
  ⊣ c1 =(-∞[(,]]c5)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
  ⊣ d(s0, c5)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
  ⊣ d(s1, c5)
} = {
  eqssd(c0, (c1 ⋂ c2), w0)
  ssind(c0, c1, c2, w0)
  ressiocsup(c0, c1, c5, w0)
  sylibr(w0, (c1 ⋂ c2)⊆ c0, ∀(s0 ∈(c1 ⋂ c2), s0 ∈ c0))
  ralrimi(s0, (c1 ⋂ c2), w0, s0 ∈ c0)
  ex(w0, s0 ∈(c1 ⋂ c2), s0 ∈ c0)
  sylibr((w0 ∧ s0 ∈(c1 ⋂ c2)), s0 ∈ c0, (s0 ∈ c2 ∧(c3 ` s0)[<]c4))
  jca((w0 ∧ s0 ∈(c1 ⋂ c2)), s0 ∈ c2, (c3 ` s0)[<]c4)
  xrlelttrd((c3 ` s0), c4, (c3 ` c5), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈(c1 ⋂ c2)))
  ffvelrnd(c3, s0, cxr, c2, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈(c1 ⋂ c2)))
  adantr(w0, s0 ∈(c1 ⋂ c2), (c3 : c2 → ℝ*))
  adantl(w0, s0 ∈(c1 ⋂ c2), s0 ∈ c2)

  adantr(w0, s0 ∈(c1 ⋂ c2), (c3 ` c5)∈ ℝ*)

  chvarv(hs0, s0, ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈(c1 ⋂ c2))→(c3 ` s0)[≤](c3 ` c5)), ((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈(c1 ⋂ c2))→(c3 ` hs0)[≤](c3 ` c5)))
  imbi12d(hs0 = s0, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈(c1 ⋂ c2)), (c3 ` hs0)[≤](c3 ` c5), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈(c1 ⋂ c2)), (c3 ` s0)[≤](c3 ` c5))
  anbi2d(hs0 = s0, w0, hs0 ∈(c1 ⋂ c2), s0 ∈(c1 ⋂ c2))
  eleq1w(hs0, s0, (c1 ⋂ c2))
  breq1d((c3 ` hs0), cle, (c3 ` c5), (c3 ` s0), hs0 = s0)
  fveq2(hs0, s0, c3)
  dmrelrnrel(s0, s1, c3, hs0, cle, c5, c2, cle, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈(c1 ⋂ c2)))
  nfan(s0, w0, hs0 ∈(c1 ⋂ c2))
  nfan(s1, w0, hs0 ∈(c1 ⋂ c2))
  nfv(s1, hs0 ∈(c1 ⋂ c2))
  adantr(w0, hs0 ∈(c1 ⋂ c2), ∀(s0 ∈ c2, ∀(s1 ∈ c2,(s0[≤]s1 →(c3 ` s0)[≤](c3 ` s1)))))
  adantl(w0, hs0 ∈(c1 ⋂ c2), hs0 ∈ c2)
  elinel2(hs0, c1, c2)
  adantr(w0, hs0 ∈(c1 ⋂ c2), c5 ∈ c2)

  syl3anc((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈(c1 ⋂ c2)), hs0[≤]c5, -∞ ∈ ℝ*, c5 ∈ ℝ*, hs0 ∈(-∞[(,]]c5))
  a1i((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈(c1 ⋂ c2)), -∞ ∈ ℝ*)
  mnfxr()

  ressxr()
  sseldd(c5, cr, c0, w0)

  a1i(w0, c0 ⊆ c2)
  eqsstri(c0, c2, { s0 ∈ c2 |(c3 ` s0)[<]c4 })
  ssrab2(s0, c2, (c3 ` s0)[<]c4)
  adantl(w0, hs0 ∈(c1 ⋂ c2), hs0 ∈(-∞[(,]]c5))

  elinel1(hs0, c1, c2)
  iocleub(cmnf, c5, hs0)

  simprd(w0, (c3 ` c5)[<]c4, c5 ∈ c2)
  sylib(w0, (c5 ∈ c2 ∧(c3 ` c5)[<]c4), c5 ∈ c0)
  elrab2(s0, c5, c0, c2, (c3 ` c5)[<]c4, (c3 ` s0)[<]c4)

  fveq2(s0, c5, c3)
  rabeq2i(s0, c0, c2, (c3 ` s0)[<]c4)
  dfss3f(s0, (c1 ⋂ c2), c0)
  nfci(s0, hs0, (c1 ⋂ c2))
  nfv(s0, hs0 ∈(c1 ⋂ c2))
  nfcxfr(s0, c0, { s0 ∈ c2 |(c3 ` s0)[<]c4 })
  nfrab1(s0, c2, (c3 ` s0)[<]c4)
  diff.hs0.w(((w0 ∧ s0 ∈(c1 ⋂ c2))→(c3 ` s0)[≤](c3 ` c5)))
  diff.cle.s(s0)

blocks.name: pimdecfgtioo
blocks.content: Given a nondecreasing function, the preimage of an unbounded below, open interval, when the supremum of the preimage does not belong to the preimage. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 26-Jun-2021.)

blocks.name: pimincfltioo
blocks.content: Given a nondecreasing function, the preimage of an unbounded below, open interval, when the supremum of the preimage does not belong to the preimage. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 26-Jun-2021.)
blocks.origin:

  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)

blocks.name: pimgtmnf
blocks.content: Given a real-valued function, the preimage of an open interval, unbounded above, with lower bound ` -oo ` , is the whole domain. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 26-Jun-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm pimgtmnf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(crab(s0, c0, wbr(cmnf, clt, c1)), c0))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cr))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  eqtrd(crab(s0, c0, wbr(cmnf, clt, c1)), c0, crab(s0, c0, wbr(cmnf, clt, cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cv(s0)))), w0)
  rabbida(s0, c0, w0, wbr(cmnf, clt, c1), wbr(cmnf, clt, cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cv(s0))))
  breq2d(cmnf, clt, c1, cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cv(s0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  eqcomd(c1, cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cv(s0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  fvmpt2d(s0, c0, cmpt(s0, c0, c1), c1, cr, w0)
  eqidd(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), w0)
  pimgtmnf2(s0, c0, cmpt(s0, c0, c1), w0)
  nfmpt1(s0, c0, c1)
  fmptdf(s0, cmpt(s0, c0, c1), c0, cr, c1, w0)
  eqid(cmpt(s0, c0, c1))
  diff.cr.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm pimgtmnf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → { s0 ∈ c0 | -∞[<]c1 } = c0)
  ⊣ F/(s0, w0)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ c1 ∈ ℝ)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
} = {
  eqtrd({ s0 ∈ c0 | -∞[<]c1 }, c0, { s0 ∈ c0 | -∞[<]((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)` s0)}, w0)
  rabbida(s0, c0, w0, -∞[<]c1, -∞[<]((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)` s0))
  breq2d(cmnf, clt, c1, ((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)` s0), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0))
  eqcomd(c1, ((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)` s0), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0))
  fvmpt2d(s0, c0, (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1), c1, cr, w0)
  eqidd((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1), w0)
  pimgtmnf2(s0, c0, (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1), w0)
  nfmpt1(s0, c0, c1)
  fmptdf(s0, (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1), c0, cr, c1, w0)
  eqid((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1))
  diff.cr.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: issmflem
blocks.content: The predicate " ` F ` is a real-valued measurable function w.r.t. to the sigma-algebra ` S ` ". A function is measurable iff the preimages of all open intervals unbounded below are in the subspace sigma-algebra induced by its domain. The domain of ` F ` is required to be a subset of the underlying set of ` S ` . Definition 121C of [Fremlin1] p. 36, and Proposition 121B (i) of [Fremlin1] p. 35 . (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 26-Jun-2021.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: issmf
blocks.content: The predicate " ` F ` is a real-valued measurable function w.r.t. to the sigma-algebra ` S ` ". A function is measurable iff the preimages of all open intervals unbounded below are in the subspace sigma-algebra induced by its domain. The domain of ` F ` is required to be a subset of the underlying set of ` S ` . Definition 121C of [Fremlin1] p. 36, and Proposition 121B (i) of [Fremlin1] p. 35 . (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 26-Jun-2021.)
blocks.origin:

  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, csalg))
  -| wceq(c2, cdm(c0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)

  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ SAlg)
  ⊣ c2 = dom(c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)

  3anbi3i(c2 ⊆ ⋃ c1, (c0 : c2 → ℝ), ∀(hs1 ∈ ℝ, { hs0 ∈ c2 |(c0 ` hs0)[<]hs1 } ∈(c1[|`t]c2)), ∀(s0 ∈ ℝ, { s1 ∈ c2 |(c0 ` s1)[<]s0 } ∈(c1[|`t]c2)))

blocks.name: salpreimalelt
blocks.content: If all the preimages of right-closed, unbounded below intervals, belong to a sigma-algebra, then all the preimages of right-open, unbounded below intervals, belong to the sigma-algebra. (ii) implies (i) in Proposition 121B of [Fremlin1] p. 36. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 26-Jun-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm salpreimalelt(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, clt, c2)), c3))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wnf(s1, w0)
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, csalg))
  -| wceq(c0, cuni(c3))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cxr))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), cr)), wcel(crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, cle, cv(s1))), c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cr))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
} = {
  salpreimagelt(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c3, w0)
  salpreimagtge(s0, hs0, c0, cv(s1), c1, c3, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), cr)))

  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s1), cr), wcel(c3, csalg))
  adantlr(w0, wcel(cv(s1), cr), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(c1, cxr))
  adantlr(w0, wcel(cv(s1), cr), wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wcel(crab(s0, c0, wbr(cv(hs0), clt, c1)), c3))
  salpreimalegt(s0, s1, c0, cv(hs0), c1, c3, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cr)))

  simpr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cr))
  simpr(w0, wcel(cv(s1), cr))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)

  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cv(s1), cr)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)

thm salpreimalelt(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → { s0 ∈ c0 | c1[<]c2 } ∈ c3)
  ⊣ F/(s0, w0)
  ⊣ F/(s1, w0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ SAlg)
  ⊣ c0 = ⋃ c3
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ c1 ∈ ℝ*)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s1 ∈ ℝ)→ { s0 ∈ c0 | c1[≤]s1 } ∈ c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ ℝ)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
} = {
  salpreimagelt(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c3, w0)
  salpreimagtge(s0, hs0, c0, s1, c1, c3, (w0 ∧ s1 ∈ ℝ))
  nfan(s0, w0, s1 ∈ ℝ)
  nfv(s0, s1 ∈ ℝ)
  nfv(hs0, (w0 ∧ s1 ∈ ℝ))
  adantr(w0, s1 ∈ ℝ, c3 ∈ SAlg)
  adantlr(w0, s1 ∈ ℝ, s0 ∈ c0, c1 ∈ ℝ*)

blocks.content: If all the preimages of lef-open, unbounded above intervals, belong to a sigma-algebra, then all the preimages of right-open, unbounded below intervals, belong to the sigma-algebra. (iii) implies (i) in Proposition 121B of [Fremlin1] p. 36. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 26-Jun-2021.)

thm salpreimagtlt(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {

blocks.name: smfpreimalt
blocks.content: Given a function measurable w.r.t. to a sigma-algebra, the preimage of an open interval unbounded below is in the subspace sigma-algebra induced by its domain. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 26-Jun-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm smfpreimalt(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(crab(s0, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), clt, c2)), co(c3, crest, c0)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, csalg))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cfv(csmblfn, c3)))
  -| wceq(c0, cdm(c1))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cr))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  syl2anc(w0, wcel(crab(s0, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), clt, c2)), co(c3, crest, c0)), wcel(c2, cr), wral(hs0, cr, wcel(crab(s0, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), clt, cv(hs0))), co(c3, crest, c0))))
  simp3d(w0, wral(hs0, cr, wcel(crab(s0, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), clt, cv(hs0))), co(c3, crest, c0))), wss(c0, cuni(c3)), wf(c1, c0, cr))
  mpbid(w0, w3a(wss(c0, cuni(c3)), wf(c1, c0, cr), wral(hs0, cr, wcel(crab(s0, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), clt, cv(hs0))), co(c3, crest, c0)))), wcel(c1, cfv(csmblfn, c3)))
  issmf(hs0, s0, c1, c3, c0, w0)
  rspcva(hs0, c2, cr, wcel(crab(s0, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), clt, cv(hs0))), co(c3, crest, c0)), wcel(crab(s0, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), clt, c2)), co(c3, crest, c0)))
  eleq1d(crab(s0, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), clt, cv(hs0))), co(c3, crest, c0), crab(s0, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), clt, c2)), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  rabbidv(s0, c0, wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), clt, cv(hs0)), wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), clt, c2))
  breq2(cv(hs0), c2, cfv(c1, cv(s0)), clt)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(cr)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(crab(s0, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), clt, c2)), co(c3, crest, c0)))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

thm smfpreimalt(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → { s0 ∈ c0 |(c1 ` s0)[<]c2 } ∈(c3[|`t]c0))
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ SAlg)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈(SMblFn ` c3))
  ⊣ c0 = dom(c1)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ ℝ)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
} = {
  syl2anc(w0, { s0 ∈ c0 |(c1 ` s0)[<]c2 } ∈(c3[|`t]c0), c2 ∈ ℝ, ∀(hs0 ∈ ℝ, { s0 ∈ c0 |(c1 ` s0)[<]hs0 } ∈(c3[|`t]c0)))
  simp3d(w0, ∀(hs0 ∈ ℝ, { s0 ∈ c0 |(c1 ` s0)[<]hs0 } ∈(c3[|`t]c0)), c0 ⊆ ⋃ c3, (c1 : c0 → ℝ))
  mpbid(w0, (c0 ⊆ ⋃ c3 ∧(c1 : c0 → ℝ)∧ ∀(hs0 ∈ ℝ, { s0 ∈ c0 |(c1 ` s0)[<]hs0 } ∈(c3[|`t]c0))), c1 ∈(SMblFn ` c3))
  issmf(hs0, s0, c1, c3, c0, w0)
  rspcva(hs0, c2, cr, { s0 ∈ c0 |(c1 ` s0)[<]hs0 } ∈(c3[|`t]c0), { s0 ∈ c0 |(c1 ` s0)[<]c2 } ∈(c3[|`t]c0))
  eleq1d({ s0 ∈ c0 |(c1 ` s0)[<]hs0 }, (c3[|`t]c0), { s0 ∈ c0 |(c1 ` s0)[<]c2 }, hs0 = c2)
  rabbidv(s0, c0, hs0 = c2, (c1 ` s0)[<]hs0, (c1 ` s0)[<]c2)
  breq2(hs0, c2, (c1 ` s0), clt)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(cr)
  diff.hs0.w({ s0 ∈ c0 |(c1 ` s0)[<]c2 } ∈(c3[|`t]c0))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: smff
blocks.content: A function measurable w.r.t. to a sigma-algebra, is actually a function. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 26-Jun-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm smff(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wf(c0, c1, cr))

} = {
  simp2d(w0, wf(c0, c1, cr), wss(c1, cuni(c2)), wral(hs1, cr, wcel(crab(hs0, c1, wbr(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), clt, cv(hs1))), co(c2, crest, c1))))
  mpbid(w0, w3a(wss(c1, cuni(c2)), wf(c0, c1, cr), wral(hs1, cr, wcel(crab(hs0, c1, wbr(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), clt, cv(hs1))), co(c2, crest, c1)))), wcel(c0, cfv(csmblfn, c2)))
  issmf(hs1, hs0, c0, c2, c1, w0)
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm smff(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0 : c1 → ℝ))

blocks.name: smfdmss
blocks.content: The domain of a function measurable w.r.t. to a sigma-algebra, is a subset of the set underlying the sigma-algebra. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 26-Jun-2021.)

thm smfdmss(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {

blocks.name: issmff
blocks.content: The predicate " ` F ` is a real-valued measurable function w.r.t. to the sigma-algebra ` S ` ". A function is measurable iff the preimages of all open intervals unbounded below are in the subspace sigma-algebra induced by its domain. The domain of ` F ` is required to be a subset of the underlying set of ` S ` . Definition 121C of [Fremlin1] p. 36, and Proposition 121B (i) of [Fremlin1] p. 35 . (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 26-Jun-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm issmff(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wcel(c0, cfv(csmblfn, c1)), w3a(wss(c2, cuni(c1)), wf(c0, c2, cr), wral(s0, cr, wcel(crab(s1, c2, wbr(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), clt, cv(s0))), co(c1, crest, c2))))))
  -| wnfc(s1, c0)
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, csalg))
  -| wceq(c2, cdm(c0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  bitrd(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(csmblfn, c1)), w3a(wss(c2, cuni(c1)), wf(c0, c2, cr), wral(s0, cr, wcel(crab(s1, c2, wbr(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), clt, cv(s0))), co(c1, crest, c2)))), w3a(wss(c2, cuni(c1)), wf(c0, c2, cr), wral(s0, cr, wcel(crab(hs0, c2, wbr(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), clt, cv(s0))), co(c1, crest, c2)))))
  issmf(s0, hs0, c0, c1, c2, w0)
  a1i(w0, wb(w3a(wss(c2, cuni(c1)), wf(c0, c2, cr), wral(s0, cr, wcel(crab(hs0, c2, wbr(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), clt, cv(s0))), co(c1, crest, c2)))), w3a(wss(c2, cuni(c1)), wf(c0, c2, cr), wral(s0, cr, wcel(crab(s1, c2, wbr(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), clt, cv(s0))), co(c1, crest, c2))))))
  3anbi3i(wss(c2, cuni(c1)), wf(c0, c2, cr), wral(s0, cr, wcel(crab(hs0, c2, wbr(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), clt, cv(s0))), co(c1, crest, c2))), wral(s0, cr, wcel(crab(s1, c2, wbr(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), clt, cv(s0))), co(c1, crest, c2))))
  ralbii(s0, cr, wcel(crab(hs0, c2, wbr(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), clt, cv(s0))), co(c1, crest, c2)), wcel(crab(s1, c2, wbr(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), clt, cv(s0))), co(c1, crest, c2)))
  eleq1i(crab(hs0, c2, wbr(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), clt, cv(s0))), co(c1, crest, c2), crab(s1, c2, wbr(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), clt, cv(s0))))
  cbvrab(hs0, s1, c2, wbr(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), clt, cv(s0)), wbr(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), clt, cv(s0)))
  nfcv(hs0, c2)
  nfcxfr(s1, c2, cdm(c0))
  nfdm(s1, c0)
  nfbr(s1, cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), clt, cv(s0))
  nffv(s1, c0, cv(hs0))
  nfcv(s1, cv(hs0))
  nfcv(s1, clt)
  nfcv(s1, cv(s0))
  nfv(hs0, wbr(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), clt, cv(s0)))
  breq1d(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), clt, cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1)))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), cv(s1), c0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)

  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.clt.s(s1)

}

thm issmff(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0 ∈(SMblFn ` c1)↔(c2 ⊆ ⋃ c1 ∧(c0 : c2 → ℝ)∧ ∀(s0 ∈ ℝ, { s1 ∈ c2 |(c0 ` s1)[<]s0 } ∈(c1[|`t]c2)))))
  ⊣ F/(s1, c0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ SAlg)
  ⊣ c2 = dom(c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
} = {
  bitrd(w0, c0 ∈(SMblFn ` c1), (c2 ⊆ ⋃ c1 ∧(c0 : c2 → ℝ)∧ ∀(s0 ∈ ℝ, { s1 ∈ c2 |(c0 ` s1)[<]s0 } ∈(c1[|`t]c2))), (c2 ⊆ ⋃ c1 ∧(c0 : c2 → ℝ)∧ ∀(s0 ∈ ℝ, { hs0 ∈ c2 |(c0 ` hs0)[<]s0 } ∈(c1[|`t]c2))))
  issmf(s0, hs0, c0, c1, c2, w0)
  a1i(w0, ((c2 ⊆ ⋃ c1 ∧(c0 : c2 → ℝ)∧ ∀(s0 ∈ ℝ, { hs0 ∈ c2 |(c0 ` hs0)[<]s0 } ∈(c1[|`t]c2)))↔(c2 ⊆ ⋃ c1 ∧(c0 : c2 → ℝ)∧ ∀(s0 ∈ ℝ, { s1 ∈ c2 |(c0 ` s1)[<]s0 } ∈(c1[|`t]c2)))))
  3anbi3i(c2 ⊆ ⋃ c1, (c0 : c2 → ℝ), ∀(s0 ∈ ℝ, { hs0 ∈ c2 |(c0 ` hs0)[<]s0 } ∈(c1[|`t]c2)), ∀(s0 ∈ ℝ, { s1 ∈ c2 |(c0 ` s1)[<]s0 } ∈(c1[|`t]c2)))
  ralbii(s0, cr, { hs0 ∈ c2 |(c0 ` hs0)[<]s0 } ∈(c1[|`t]c2), { s1 ∈ c2 |(c0 ` s1)[<]s0 } ∈(c1[|`t]c2))
  eleq1i({ hs0 ∈ c2 |(c0 ` hs0)[<]s0 }, (c1[|`t]c2), { s1 ∈ c2 |(c0 ` s1)[<]s0 })
  cbvrab(hs0, s1, c2, (c0 ` hs0)[<]s0, (c0 ` s1)[<]s0)
  nfcv(hs0, c2)
  nfcxfr(s1, c2, dom(c0))
  nfdm(s1, c0)
  nfbr(s1, (c0 ` hs0), clt, s0)
  nffv(s1, c0, hs0)
  nfcv(s1, hs0)
  nfcv(s1, clt)
  nfcv(s1, s0)
  nfv(hs0, (c0 ` s1)[<]s0)
  breq1d((c0 ` hs0), clt, s0, (c0 ` s1), hs0 = s1)
  fveq2(hs0, s1, c0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.clt.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.hs0.w((c0 ` s1)[<]s0)

thm issmfd(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(csmblfn, c1)))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, csalg))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c2, cuni(c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c0, c2, cr))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cr)), wcel(crab(s1, c2, wbr(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), clt, cv(s0))), co(c1, crest, c2)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {
  mpbird(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(csmblfn, c1)), w3a(wss(cdm(c0), cuni(c1)), wf(c0, cdm(c0), cr), wral(s0, cr, wcel(crab(s1, cdm(c0), wbr(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), clt, cv(s0))), co(c1, crest, cdm(c0))))))
  3jca(w0, wss(cdm(c0), cuni(c1)), wf(c0, cdm(c0), cr), wral(s0, cr, wcel(crab(s1, cdm(c0), wbr(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), clt, cv(s0))), co(c1, crest, cdm(c0)))))
  eqsstrd(cdm(c0), cuni(c1), c2, w0)
  ffdmd(c0, cr, c2, w0)
  ralrimi(s0, cr, w0, wcel(crab(s1, cdm(c0), wbr(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), clt, cv(s0))), co(c1, crest, cdm(c0))))
  ex(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cr), wcel(crab(s1, cdm(c0), wbr(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), clt, cv(s0))), co(c1, crest, cdm(c0))))
  mpbird(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cr)), wcel(crab(s1, cdm(c0), wbr(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), clt, cv(s0))), co(c1, crest, cdm(c0))), wcel(crab(s1, c2, wbr(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), clt, cv(s0))), co(c1, crest, c2)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cr), wb(wcel(crab(s1, cdm(c0), wbr(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), clt, cv(s0))), co(c1, crest, cdm(c0))), wcel(crab(s1, c2, wbr(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), clt, cv(s0))), co(c1, crest, c2))))
  eleq12d(crab(s1, cdm(c0), wbr(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), clt, cv(s0))), co(c1, crest, cdm(c0)), crab(s1, c2, wbr(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), clt, cv(s0))), co(c1, crest, c2), w0)
  rabeqd(s1, cdm(c0), c2, w0, wbr(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), clt, cv(s0)))
  oveq2d(c1, crest, cdm(c0), c2, w0)
  fdmd(c0, c2, cr, w0)
  issmf(s0, s1, c0, c1, cdm(c0), w0)
  eqid(cdm(c0))
  diff.cdm.s(s1, c0)
  diff.cdm.s(s0, c0)
}

thm issmfd(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0 ∈(SMblFn ` c1))
  ⊣ F/(s0, w0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ SAlg)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ⊆ ⋃ c1)
  ⊣ (w0 →(c0 : c2 → ℝ))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ ℝ)→ { s1 ∈ c2 |(c0 ` s1)[<]s0 } ∈(c1[|`t]c2))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
} = {
  mpbird(w0, c0 ∈(SMblFn ` c1), (dom(c0)⊆ ⋃ c1 ∧(c0 : dom(c0)→ ℝ)∧ ∀(s0 ∈ ℝ, { s1 ∈ dom(c0)|(c0 ` s1)[<]s0 } ∈(c1[|`t]dom(c0)))))
  3jca(w0, dom(c0)⊆ ⋃ c1, (c0 : dom(c0)→ ℝ), ∀(s0 ∈ ℝ, { s1 ∈ dom(c0)|(c0 ` s1)[<]s0 } ∈(c1[|`t]dom(c0))))
  eqsstrd(dom(c0), ⋃ c1, c2, w0)
  ffdmd(c0, cr, c2, w0)
  ralrimi(s0, cr, w0, { s1 ∈ dom(c0)|(c0 ` s1)[<]s0 } ∈(c1[|`t]dom(c0)))
  ex(w0, s0 ∈ ℝ, { s1 ∈ dom(c0)|(c0 ` s1)[<]s0 } ∈(c1[|`t]dom(c0)))
  mpbird((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ ℝ), { s1 ∈ dom(c0)|(c0 ` s1)[<]s0 } ∈(c1[|`t]dom(c0)), { s1 ∈ c2 |(c0 ` s1)[<]s0 } ∈(c1[|`t]c2))
  adantr(w0, s0 ∈ ℝ, ({ s1 ∈ dom(c0)|(c0 ` s1)[<]s0 } ∈(c1[|`t]dom(c0))↔ { s1 ∈ c2 |(c0 ` s1)[<]s0 } ∈(c1[|`t]c2)))
  eleq12d({ s1 ∈ dom(c0)|(c0 ` s1)[<]s0 }, (c1[|`t]dom(c0)), { s1 ∈ c2 |(c0 ` s1)[<]s0 }, (c1[|`t]c2), w0)
  rabeqd(s1, dom(c0), c2, w0, (c0 ` s1)[<]s0)
  oveq2d(c1, crest, dom(c0), c2, w0)
  fdmd(c0, c2, cr, w0)
  issmf(s0, s1, c0, c1, dom(c0), w0)
  eqid(dom(c0))
  diff.cdm.s(s1, c0)
  diff.cdm.s(s0, c0)
}

blocks.name: smfpreimaltf
blocks.content: Given a function measurable w.r.t. to a sigma-algebra, the preimage of an open interval unbounded below is in the subspace sigma-algebra induced by its domain. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 26-Jun-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm smfpreimaltf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(crab(s0, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), clt, c2)), co(c3, crest, c0)))
  -| wnfc(s0, c1)
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, csalg))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cfv(csmblfn, c3)))
  -| wceq(c0, cdm(c1))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cr))
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  syl2anc(w0, wcel(crab(s0, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), clt, c2)), co(c3, crest, c0)), wcel(c2, cr), wral(hs0, cr, wcel(crab(s0, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), clt, cv(hs0))), co(c3, crest, c0))))
  simp3d(w0, wral(hs0, cr, wcel(crab(s0, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), clt, cv(hs0))), co(c3, crest, c0))), wss(c0, cuni(c3)), wf(c1, c0, cr))
  mpbid(w0, w3a(wss(c0, cuni(c3)), wf(c1, c0, cr), wral(hs0, cr, wcel(crab(s0, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), clt, cv(hs0))), co(c3, crest, c0)))), wcel(c1, cfv(csmblfn, c3)))
  issmff(hs0, s0, c1, c3, c0, w0)
  rspcva(hs0, c2, cr, wcel(crab(s0, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), clt, cv(hs0))), co(c3, crest, c0)), wcel(crab(s0, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), clt, c2)), co(c3, crest, c0)))
  eleq1d(crab(s0, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), clt, cv(hs0))), co(c3, crest, c0), crab(s0, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), clt, c2)), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  rabbidv(s0, c0, wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), clt, cv(hs0)), wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), clt, c2))
  breq2(cv(hs0), c2, cfv(c1, cv(s0)), clt)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(cr)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(crab(s0, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), clt, c2)), co(c3, crest, c0)))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

thm smfpreimaltf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → { s0 ∈ c0 |(c1 ` s0)[<]c2 } ∈(c3[|`t]c0))
  ⊣ F/(s0, c1)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ SAlg)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈(SMblFn ` c3))
  ⊣ c0 = dom(c1)

  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
} = {
  syl2anc(w0, { s0 ∈ c0 |(c1 ` s0)[<]c2 } ∈(c3[|`t]c0), c2 ∈ ℝ, ∀(hs0 ∈ ℝ, { s0 ∈ c0 |(c1 ` s0)[<]hs0 } ∈(c3[|`t]c0)))
  simp3d(w0, ∀(hs0 ∈ ℝ, { s0 ∈ c0 |(c1 ` s0)[<]hs0 } ∈(c3[|`t]c0)), c0 ⊆ ⋃ c3, (c1 : c0 → ℝ))
  mpbid(w0, (c0 ⊆ ⋃ c3 ∧(c1 : c0 → ℝ)∧ ∀(hs0 ∈ ℝ, { s0 ∈ c0 |(c1 ` s0)[<]hs0 } ∈(c3[|`t]c0))), c1 ∈(SMblFn ` c3))
  issmff(hs0, s0, c1, c3, c0, w0)
  rspcva(hs0, c2, cr, { s0 ∈ c0 |(c1 ` s0)[<]hs0 } ∈(c3[|`t]c0), { s0 ∈ c0 |(c1 ` s0)[<]c2 } ∈(c3[|`t]c0))
  eleq1d({ s0 ∈ c0 |(c1 ` s0)[<]hs0 }, (c3[|`t]c0), { s0 ∈ c0 |(c1 ` s0)[<]c2 }, hs0 = c2)
  rabbidv(s0, c0, hs0 = c2, (c1 ` s0)[<]hs0, (c1 ` s0)[<]c2)
  breq2(hs0, c2, (c1 ` s0), clt)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(cr)
  diff.hs0.w({ s0 ∈ c0 |(c1 ` s0)[<]c2 } ∈(c3[|`t]c0))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

thm issmfdf(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {

  eqsstrd(cdm(c0), cuni(c1), c2, w0)
  ffdmd(c0, cr, c2, w0)
  ralrimi(s1, cr, w0, wcel(crab(s0, cdm(c0), wbr(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), clt, cv(s1))), co(c1, crest, cdm(c0))))
  ex(w0, wcel(cv(s1), cr), wcel(crab(s0, cdm(c0), wbr(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), clt, cv(s1))), co(c1, crest, cdm(c0))))
  mpbird(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), cr)), wcel(crab(s0, cdm(c0), wbr(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), clt, cv(s1))), co(c1, crest, cdm(c0))), wcel(crab(s0, c2, wbr(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), clt, cv(s1))), co(c1, crest, c2)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s1), cr), wb(wcel(crab(s0, cdm(c0), wbr(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), clt, cv(s1))), co(c1, crest, cdm(c0))), wcel(crab(s0, c2, wbr(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), clt, cv(s1))), co(c1, crest, c2))))
  eleq12d(crab(s0, cdm(c0), wbr(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), clt, cv(s1))), co(c1, crest, cdm(c0)), crab(s0, c2, wbr(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), clt, cv(s1))), co(c1, crest, c2), w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(crab(s0, cdm(c0), wbr(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), clt, cv(s1))), crab(s0, c2, wbr(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), clt, cv(s1)))), wceq(cdm(c0), c2))
  rabeqf(s0, cdm(c0), c2, wbr(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), clt, cv(s1)))
  nfdm(s0, c0)
  nfcv(s0, c2)
  oveq2d(c1, crest, cdm(c0), c2, w0)
  fdmd(c0, c2, cr, w0)
  issmff(s1, s0, c0, c1, cdm(c0), w0)

} = {
  mpbird(w0, c0 ∈(SMblFn ` c1), (dom(c0)⊆ ⋃ c1 ∧(c0 : dom(c0)→ ℝ)∧ ∀(s1 ∈ ℝ, { s0 ∈ dom(c0)|(c0 ` s0)[<]s1 } ∈(c1[|`t]dom(c0)))))
  3jca(w0, dom(c0)⊆ ⋃ c1, (c0 : dom(c0)→ ℝ), ∀(s1 ∈ ℝ, { s0 ∈ dom(c0)|(c0 ` s0)[<]s1 } ∈(c1[|`t]dom(c0))))
  eqsstrd(dom(c0), ⋃ c1, c2, w0)
  ffdmd(c0, cr, c2, w0)
  ralrimi(s1, cr, w0, { s0 ∈ dom(c0)|(c0 ` s0)[<]s1 } ∈(c1[|`t]dom(c0)))
  ex(w0, s1 ∈ ℝ, { s0 ∈ dom(c0)|(c0 ` s0)[<]s1 } ∈(c1[|`t]dom(c0)))
  mpbird((w0 ∧ s1 ∈ ℝ), { s0 ∈ dom(c0)|(c0 ` s0)[<]s1 } ∈(c1[|`t]dom(c0)), { s0 ∈ c2 |(c0 ` s0)[<]s1 } ∈(c1[|`t]c2))
  adantr(w0, s1 ∈ ℝ, ({ s0 ∈ dom(c0)|(c0 ` s0)[<]s1 } ∈(c1[|`t]dom(c0))↔ { s0 ∈ c2 |(c0 ` s0)[<]s1 } ∈(c1[|`t]c2)))
  eleq12d({ s0 ∈ dom(c0)|(c0 ` s0)[<]s1 }, (c1[|`t]dom(c0)), { s0 ∈ c2 |(c0 ` s0)[<]s1 }, (c1[|`t]c2), w0)
  syl(w0, { s0 ∈ dom(c0)|(c0 ` s0)[<]s1 } = { s0 ∈ c2 |(c0 ` s0)[<]s1 }, dom(c0)= c2)
  rabeqf(s0, dom(c0), c2, (c0 ` s0)[<]s1)
  nfdm(s0, c0)
  nfcv(s0, c2)
  oveq2d(c1, crest, dom(c0), c2, w0)
  fdmd(c0, c2, cr, w0)
  issmff(s1, s0, c0, c1, dom(c0), w0)
  eqid(dom(c0))
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cdm.s(s1, c0)
}

blocks.name: sssmf
blocks.content: The restriction of a sigma-measurable function, is sigma-measurable. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 26-Jun-2021.)

blocks.pretty:
thm sssmf(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0 |` c1)∈(SMblFn ` c2))
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ SAlg)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈(SMblFn ` c2))
} = {
  issmfd(hs1, hs0, (c0 |` c1), c2, (c1 ⋂ dom(c0)), w0)
  nfv(hs1, w0)
  syl5ss((c1 ⋂ dom(c0)), ⋃ c2, dom(c0), w0)
  smfdmss(dom(c0), c2, c0, w0)
  mpbid(w0, ((c0 |` c1):(c1 ⋂ dom(c0))→ ℝ), ((c0 |` c1): dom((c0 |` c1))→ ℝ))
  mpbird(w0, ((c0 |` c1): dom((c0 |` c1))→ ℝ), ((c0 |`(c1 ⋂ dom(c0))):(c1 ⋂ dom(c0))→ ℝ))

blocks.name: mbfresmf
blocks.content: A real-valued measurable function is a sigma-measurable function (w.r.t. the Lebesgue measure on the Reals). (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 26-Jun-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm mbfresmf(class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(csmblfn, c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cmbf))
  -| wi(w0, wss(crn(c0), cr))
  -| wceq(c1, cdm(cvol))
} = {
  issmfd(hs1, hs0, c0, c1, cdm(c0), w0)
  nfv(hs1, w0)
  eqeltrd(c1, csalg, cdm(cvol), w0)
  a1i(w0, wcel(cdm(cvol), csalg))
  syl6sseqr(cdm(c0), cuni(c1), cr, w0)
  syl(w0, wss(cdm(c0), cr), wcel(c0, cmbf))
  mbfdmssre(c0)
  eqtri(cuni(c1), cr, cuni(cdm(cvol)))
  unieqi(c1, cdm(cvol))
  unidmvol()
  eqeltrd(crab(hs0, cdm(c0), wbr(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), clt, cv(hs1))), co(c1, crest, cdm(c0)), cima(ccnv(c0), co(cmnf, cioo, cv(hs1))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), cr)))
  eqcomd(crab(hs0, cdm(c0), wbr(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), clt, cv(hs1))), cima(ccnv(c0), co(cmnf, cioo, cv(hs1))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), cr)))
  preimaioomnf(hs0, c0, cv(hs1), cdm(c0), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), cr)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), cr), wf(c0, cdm(c0), cr))
  adantl(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), cr), wcel(cv(hs1), cxr))
  rexr(cv(hs1))
  elrestd(cima(ccnv(c0), co(cmnf, cioo, cv(hs1))), c1, cdm(c0), universe, universe, cima(ccnv(c0), co(cmnf, cioo, cv(hs1))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), cr)))
  a1i(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), cr)), wcel(c1, universe))
  eqeltri(c1, universe, cdm(cvol))
  elexi(cdm(cvol), csalg)
  dmvolsal()
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), cr), wcel(cdm(c0), universe))
  dmexd(c0, cmbf, w0)
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), cr), wcel(cima(ccnv(c0), co(cmnf, cioo, cv(hs1))), c1))
  eleqtrrd(cima(ccnv(c0), co(cmnf, cioo, cv(hs1))), c1, cdm(cvol), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wcel(cima(ccnv(c0), co(cmnf, cioo, cv(hs1))), cdm(cvol)), wcel(c0, cmbf), wf(c0, cdm(c0), cr))
  sylibr(w0, wf(c0, cdm(c0), cr), wa(wfn(c0, cdm(c0)), wss(crn(c0), cr)))
  jca(w0, wfn(c0, cdm(c0)), wss(crn(c0), cr))
  3syl(w0, wfn(c0, cdm(c0)), wcel(c0, cmbf), wf(c0, cdm(c0), cc))
  mbff(c0)
  ffn(c0, cdm(c0), cc)
  df-f(c0, cdm(c0), cr)
  mbfima(c0, cdm(c0), cmnf, cv(hs1))
  a1i(w0, wceq(c1, cdm(cvol)))
  ax-mp(wceq(cima(ccnv(c0), co(cmnf, cioo, cv(hs1))), cin(cima(ccnv(c0), co(cmnf, cioo, cv(hs1))), cdm(c0))), wss(cima(ccnv(c0), co(cmnf, cioo, cv(hs1))), cdm(c0)))
  cnvimass(c0, co(cmnf, cioo, cv(hs1)))
  biimpi(wss(cima(ccnv(c0), co(cmnf, cioo, cv(hs1))), cdm(c0)), wceq(cima(ccnv(c0), co(cmnf, cioo, cv(hs1))), cin(cima(ccnv(c0), co(cmnf, cioo, cv(hs1))), cdm(c0))))
  dfss(cima(ccnv(c0), co(cmnf, cioo, cv(hs1))), cdm(c0))
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cdm(c0))
  diff.hs1.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.c(cv(hs1))
  diff.hs0.w(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), cr)))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm mbfresmf(class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0 ∈(SMblFn ` c1))
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ MblFn)
  ⊣ (w0 → ran(c0)⊆ ℝ)
  ⊣ c1 = dom(vol)
} = {
  issmfd(hs1, hs0, c0, c1, dom(c0), w0)
  nfv(hs1, w0)
  eqeltrd(c1, csalg, dom(vol), w0)
  a1i(w0, dom(vol)∈ SAlg)
  syl6sseqr(dom(c0), ⋃ c1, cr, w0)
  syl(w0, dom(c0)⊆ ℝ, c0 ∈ MblFn)
  mbfdmssre(c0)
  eqtri(⋃ c1, cr, ⋃ dom(vol))
  unieqi(c1, dom(vol))
  unidmvol()
  eqeltrd({ hs0 ∈ dom(c0)|(c0 ` hs0)[<]hs1 }, (c1[|`t]dom(c0)), (`' c0 "(-∞[(,)]hs1)), (w0 ∧ hs1 ∈ ℝ))
  eqcomd({ hs0 ∈ dom(c0)|(c0 ` hs0)[<]hs1 }, (`' c0 "(-∞[(,)]hs1)), (w0 ∧ hs1 ∈ ℝ))
  preimaioomnf(hs0, c0, hs1, dom(c0), (w0 ∧ hs1 ∈ ℝ))
  adantr(w0, hs1 ∈ ℝ, (c0 : dom(c0)→ ℝ))
  adantl(w0, hs1 ∈ ℝ, hs1 ∈ ℝ*)
  rexr(hs1)
  elrestd((`' c0 "(-∞[(,)]hs1)), c1, dom(c0), universe, universe, (`' c0 "(-∞[(,)]hs1)), (w0 ∧ hs1 ∈ ℝ))
  a1i((w0 ∧ hs1 ∈ ℝ), c1 ∈ 𝕌)
  eqeltri(c1, universe, dom(vol))
  elexi(dom(vol), csalg)
  dmvolsal()
  adantr(w0, hs1 ∈ ℝ, dom(c0)∈ 𝕌)
  dmexd(c0, cmbf, w0)
  adantr(w0, hs1 ∈ ℝ, (`' c0 "(-∞[(,)]hs1))∈ c1)
  eleqtrrd((`' c0 "(-∞[(,)]hs1)), c1, dom(vol), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, (`' c0 "(-∞[(,)]hs1))∈ dom(vol), c0 ∈ MblFn, (c0 : dom(c0)→ ℝ))
  sylibr(w0, (c0 : dom(c0)→ ℝ), (c0[Fn]dom(c0)∧ ran(c0)⊆ ℝ))
  jca(w0, c0[Fn]dom(c0), ran(c0)⊆ ℝ)
  3syl(w0, c0[Fn]dom(c0), c0 ∈ MblFn, (c0 : dom(c0)→ ℂ))
  mbff(c0)
  ffn(c0, dom(c0), cc)
  df-f(c0, dom(c0), cr)
  mbfima(c0, dom(c0), cmnf, hs1)
  a1i(w0, c1 = dom(vol))
  ax-mp((`' c0 "(-∞[(,)]hs1))=((`' c0 "(-∞[(,)]hs1))⋂ dom(c0)), (`' c0 "(-∞[(,)]hs1))⊆ dom(c0))
  cnvimass(c0, (-∞[(,)]hs1))
  biimpi((`' c0 "(-∞[(,)]hs1))⊆ dom(c0), (`' c0 "(-∞[(,)]hs1))=((`' c0 "(-∞[(,)]hs1))⋂ dom(c0)))
  dfss((`' c0 "(-∞[(,)]hs1)), dom(c0))
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(dom(c0))
  diff.hs1.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.c(hs1)
  diff.hs0.w((w0 ∧ hs1 ∈ ℝ))
}

blocks.name: cnfsmf
blocks.content: A continuous function is measurable. Proposition 121D (b) of [Fremlin1] p. 36 is a special case of this theorem, where the topology on the domain is induced by the standard topology on n-dimensional Real numbers. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 26-Jun-2021.)

thm cnfsmf(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(csmblfn, c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, ctop))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, co(co(c2, crest, cdm(c0)), ccn, c3)))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(csalgen, c2))
} = {
  issmfd(hs1, hs0, c0, c1, cdm(c0), w0)
  nfv(hs1, w0)
  eqsstrd(cdm(c0), cuni(c1), cuni(co(c2, crest, cdm(c0))), w0)
  sstrd(cuni(co(c2, crest, cdm(c0))), cuni(c1), cuni(c2), w0)
  unirestss(c2, cdm(c0), ctop, universe, w0)
  eqeltrd(cdm(c0), universe, cuni(co(c2, crest, cdm(c0))), w0)
  a1i(w0, wcel(cuni(co(c2, crest, cdm(c0))), universe))
  uniex(co(c2, crest, cdm(c0)))
  ovex(c2, crest, cdm(c0))
  unissd(c2, c1, w0)
  ffdmd(c0, cr, cuni(co(c2, crest, cdm(c0))), w0)
  mpbird(w0, wf(c0, cuni(co(c2, crest, cdm(c0))), cr), wf(c0, cuni(co(c2, crest, cdm(c0))), cuni(c3)))
  feq3d(c0, cuni(co(c2, crest, cdm(c0))), cr, cuni(c3), w0)
  a1i(w0, wceq(cr, cuni(c3)))
  eqtr4i(cr, cuni(c3), cuni(cfv(ctg, crn(cioo))))
  uniretop()
  unieqi(c3, cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)))
  sseldd(crab(hs0, cdm(c0), wbr(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), clt, cv(hs1))), co(c1, crest, cdm(c0)), co(c2, crest, cdm(c0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), cr)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), cr), wss(co(c2, crest, cdm(c0)), co(c1, crest, cdm(c0))))
  syl2anc(w0, wss(co(c2, crest, cdm(c0)), co(c1, crest, cdm(c0))), wcel(c1, csalg), wss(c2, c1))
  salgencld(c1, c2, ctop, w0)
  syl(w0, wss(c2, c1), wcel(c2, ctop))
  sssalgen(c2, ctop, c1)
  ssrest(c1, csalg, c2, cdm(c0))
  eqeltrd(crab(hs0, cdm(c0), wbr(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), clt, cv(hs1))), co(c2, crest, cdm(c0)), crab(hs0, cuni(co(c2, crest, cdm(c0))), wbr(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), clt, cv(hs1))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), cr)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), cr), wceq(crab(hs0, cdm(c0), wbr(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), clt, cv(hs1))), crab(hs0, cuni(co(c2, crest, cdm(c0))), wbr(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), clt, cv(hs1)))))
  rabeqd(hs0, cdm(c0), cuni(co(c2, crest, cdm(c0))), w0, wbr(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), clt, cv(hs1)))
  fdmd(c0, cuni(co(c2, crest, cdm(c0))), cuni(c3), w0)
  syl(w0, wf(c0, cuni(co(c2, crest, cdm(c0))), cuni(c3)), wcel(c0, co(co(c2, crest, cdm(c0)), ccn, c3)))
  cnf(c0, co(c2, crest, cdm(c0)), c3, cuni(co(c2, crest, cdm(c0))), cuni(c3))
  eqid(cuni(c3))
  rfcnpre2(hs0, crab(hs0, cuni(co(c2, crest, cdm(c0))), wbr(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), clt, cv(hs1))), co(c2, crest, cdm(c0)), cv(hs1), c0, c3, cuni(co(c2, crest, cdm(c0))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), cr)))
  nfcv(hs0, cv(hs1))
  nfcv(hs0, c0)
  nfv(hs0, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), cr)))
  eqid(cuni(co(c2, crest, cdm(c0))))
  eqid(crab(hs0, cuni(co(c2, crest, cdm(c0))), wbr(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), clt, cv(hs1))))
  adantl(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), cr), wcel(cv(hs1), cxr))
  rexr(cv(hs1))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), cr), wcel(c0, co(co(c2, crest, cdm(c0)), ccn, c3)))
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cdm(c0))
  diff.hs1.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.c(cuni(co(c2, crest, cdm(c0))))
  diff.hs0.c(cv(hs1))
  diff.hs0.w(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), cr)))

thm cnfsmf(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0 ∈(SMblFn ` c1))
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ Top)
  ⊣ c3 =(topGen ` ran((,)))
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈((c2[|`t]dom(c0))[Cn]c3))
  ⊣ c1 =(SalGen ` c2)
} = {
  issmfd(hs1, hs0, c0, c1, dom(c0), w0)
  nfv(hs1, w0)
  eqsstrd(dom(c0), ⋃ c1, ⋃(c2[|`t]dom(c0)), w0)
  sstrd(⋃(c2[|`t]dom(c0)), ⋃ c1, ⋃ c2, w0)
  unirestss(c2, dom(c0), ctop, universe, w0)
  eqeltrd(dom(c0), universe, ⋃(c2[|`t]dom(c0)), w0)
  a1i(w0, ⋃(c2[|`t]dom(c0))∈ 𝕌)
  uniex((c2[|`t]dom(c0)))
  ovex(c2, crest, dom(c0))
  unissd(c2, c1, w0)
  ffdmd(c0, cr, ⋃(c2[|`t]dom(c0)), w0)
  mpbird(w0, (c0 : ⋃(c2[|`t]dom(c0))→ ℝ), (c0 : ⋃(c2[|`t]dom(c0))→ ⋃ c3))
  feq3d(c0, ⋃(c2[|`t]dom(c0)), cr, ⋃ c3, w0)
  a1i(w0, ℝ = ⋃ c3)
  eqtr4i(cr, ⋃ c3, ⋃(topGen ` ran((,))))
  uniretop()
  unieqi(c3, (topGen ` ran((,))))
  sseldd({ hs0 ∈ dom(c0)|(c0 ` hs0)[<]hs1 }, (c1[|`t]dom(c0)), (c2[|`t]dom(c0)), (w0 ∧ hs1 ∈ ℝ))
  adantr(w0, hs1 ∈ ℝ, (c2[|`t]dom(c0))⊆(c1[|`t]dom(c0)))
  syl2anc(w0, (c2[|`t]dom(c0))⊆(c1[|`t]dom(c0)), c1 ∈ SAlg, c2 ⊆ c1)
  salgencld(c1, c2, ctop, w0)
  syl(w0, c2 ⊆ c1, c2 ∈ Top)
  sssalgen(c2, ctop, c1)
  ssrest(c1, csalg, c2, dom(c0))
  eqeltrd({ hs0 ∈ dom(c0)|(c0 ` hs0)[<]hs1 }, (c2[|`t]dom(c0)), { hs0 ∈ ⋃(c2[|`t]dom(c0))|(c0 ` hs0)[<]hs1 }, (w0 ∧ hs1 ∈ ℝ))
  adantr(w0, hs1 ∈ ℝ, { hs0 ∈ dom(c0)|(c0 ` hs0)[<]hs1 } = { hs0 ∈ ⋃(c2[|`t]dom(c0))|(c0 ` hs0)[<]hs1 })
  rabeqd(hs0, dom(c0), ⋃(c2[|`t]dom(c0)), w0, (c0 ` hs0)[<]hs1)
  fdmd(c0, ⋃(c2[|`t]dom(c0)), ⋃ c3, w0)
  syl(w0, (c0 : ⋃(c2[|`t]dom(c0))→ ⋃ c3), c0 ∈((c2[|`t]dom(c0))[Cn]c3))
  cnf(c0, (c2[|`t]dom(c0)), c3, ⋃(c2[|`t]dom(c0)), ⋃ c3)
  eqid(⋃ c3)
  rfcnpre2(hs0, { hs0 ∈ ⋃(c2[|`t]dom(c0))|(c0 ` hs0)[<]hs1 }, (c2[|`t]dom(c0)), hs1, c0, c3, ⋃(c2[|`t]dom(c0)), (w0 ∧ hs1 ∈ ℝ))
  nfcv(hs0, hs1)
  nfcv(hs0, c0)
  nfv(hs0, (w0 ∧ hs1 ∈ ℝ))
  eqid(⋃(c2[|`t]dom(c0)))
  eqid({ hs0 ∈ ⋃(c2[|`t]dom(c0))|(c0 ` hs0)[<]hs1 })
  adantl(w0, hs1 ∈ ℝ, hs1 ∈ ℝ*)
  rexr(hs1)
  adantr(w0, hs1 ∈ ℝ, c0 ∈((c2[|`t]dom(c0))[Cn]c3))
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(dom(c0))
  diff.hs1.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.c(⋃(c2[|`t]dom(c0)))
  diff.hs0.c(hs1)
  diff.hs0.w((w0 ∧ hs1 ∈ ℝ))
}

blocks.content: A nondecreasing function is Borel measurable. Proposition 121D (c) of [Fremlin1] p. 36 . (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 26-Jun-2021.)
