thm incsmflem(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wrex(s0, c0, wceq(c1, cin(cv(s0), c2))))
  -| wnf(s1, w0)
  -| wnf(s2, w0)
  -| wi(w0, wss(c2, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c3, c2, cxr))
  -| wi(w0, wral(s1, c2, wral(s2, c2, wi(wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(s2)), wbr(cfv(c3, cv(s1)), cle, cfv(c3, cv(s2)))))))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(csalgen, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, cxr))
  -| wceq(c1, crab(s1, c2, wbr(cfv(c3, cv(s1)), clt, c5)))
  -| wceq(c6, csup(c1, cxr, clt))
  -| wceq(c7, co(cmnf, cioo, c6))
  -| wceq(c8, co(cmnf, cioc, c6))
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c7)
  -| diffsc(s0, c8)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
  -| diffsc(s1, c6)
  -| diffsc(s1, c7)
  -| diffsc(s1, c8)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c5)
  -| diffsc(s2, c6)
  -| diffsc(s2, c7)
  -| diffsc(s2, c8)
} = {
  pm2.61dan(w0, wrex(s0, c0, wceq(c1, cin(cv(s0), c2))), wcel(c6, c1))
  syl2anc(wa(w0, wcel(c6, c1)), wrex(s0, c0, wceq(c1, cin(cv(s0), c2))), wcel(c8, c0), wceq(c1, cin(c8, c2)))
  syl5eqel(c8, c0, co(cmnf, cioc, c6), wa(w0, wcel(c6, c1)))
  iocborel(cmnf, c6, c0, c4, wa(w0, wcel(c6, c1)))
  a1i(wa(w0, wcel(c6, c1)), wcel(cmnf, cxr))
  mnfxr()
  sselda(c6, c1, cr, w0)
  sstrd(c1, cr, c2, w0)
  a1i(w0, wss(c1, c2))
  eqsstri(c1, c2, crab(s1, c2, wbr(cfv(c3, cv(s1)), clt, c5)))
  ssrab2(s1, c2, wbr(cfv(c3, cv(s1)), clt, c5))
  pimincfltioc(s1, s2, c1, c8, c2, c3, c5, c6, wa(w0, wcel(c6, c1)))
  nfan(s1, w0, wcel(c6, c1))
  nfan(s2, w0, wcel(c6, c1))
  nfv(s2, wcel(c6, c1))
  adantr(w0, wcel(c6, c1), wss(c2, cr))
  adantr(w0, wcel(c6, c1), wf(c3, c2, cxr))
  adantr(w0, wcel(c6, c1), wral(s1, c2, wral(s2, c2, wi(wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(s2)), wbr(cfv(c3, cv(s1)), cle, cfv(c3, cv(s2)))))))
  adantr(w0, wcel(c6, c1), wcel(c5, cxr))
  simpr(w0, wcel(c6, c1))
  rspceeqv(s0, c8, c0, c1, cin(c8, c2), cin(cv(s0), c2))
  ineq1(cv(s0), c8, c2)
  syl2anc(wa(w0, wn(wcel(c6, c1))), wrex(s0, c0, wceq(c1, cin(cv(s0), c2))), wcel(c7, c0), wceq(c1, cin(c7, c2)))
  adantr(w0, wn(wcel(c6, c1)), wcel(c7, c0))
  a1i(w0, wcel(c7, c0))
  eqeltri(c7, c0, co(cmnf, cioo, c6))
  iooborel(cmnf, c6, c0, c4)
  pimincfltioo(s1, s2, c1, c7, c2, c3, c5, c6, wa(w0, wn(wcel(c6, c1))))
  nfan(s1, w0, wn(wcel(c6, c1)))
  nfn(s1, wcel(c6, c1))
  nfel(s1, c6, c1)
  nfcv(s1, c6)
  nfcxfr(s1, c1, crab(s1, c2, wbr(cfv(c3, cv(s1)), clt, c5)))
  nfrab1(s1, c2, wbr(cfv(c3, cv(s1)), clt, c5))
  nfan(s2, w0, wn(wcel(c6, c1)))
  nfv(s2, wn(wcel(c6, c1)))
  adantr(w0, wn(wcel(c6, c1)), wss(c2, cr))
  adantr(w0, wn(wcel(c6, c1)), wf(c3, c2, cxr))
  adantr(w0, wn(wcel(c6, c1)), wral(s1, c2, wral(s2, c2, wi(wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(s2)), wbr(cfv(c3, cv(s1)), cle, cfv(c3, cv(s2)))))))
  adantr(w0, wn(wcel(c6, c1)), wcel(c5, cxr))
  simpr(w0, wn(wcel(c6, c1)))
  rspceeqv(s0, c7, c0, c1, cin(c7, c2), cin(cv(s0), c2))
  ineq1(cv(s0), c7, c2)
  diff.cin.s(s0, c8, c2)
  diff.wn.s(s2, wcel(c6, c1))
  diff.wcel.s(s2, c6, c1)
  diff.cin.s(s0, c7, c2)
}

thm incsmflem(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → ∃(s0 ∈ c0, c1 =(s0 ⋂ c2)))
  ⊣ F/(s1, w0)
  ⊣ F/(s2, w0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ⊆ ℝ)
  ⊣ (w0 →(c3 : c2 → ℝ*))
  ⊣ (w0 → ∀(s1 ∈ c2, ∀(s2 ∈ c2,(s1[≤]s2 →(c3 ` s1)[≤](c3 ` s2)))))
  ⊣ c4 =(topGen ` ran((,)))
  ⊣ c0 =(SalGen ` c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → c5 ∈ ℝ*)
  ⊣ c1 = { s1 ∈ c2 |(c3 ` s1)[<]c5 }
  ⊣ c6 = sup(c1, ℝ*, <)
  ⊣ c7 =(-∞[(,)]c6)
  ⊣ c8 =(-∞[(,]]c6)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c7)
  ⊣ d(s0, c8)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
  ⊣ d(s1, c5)
  ⊣ d(s1, c6)
  ⊣ d(s1, c7)
  ⊣ d(s1, c8)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c2)
  ⊣ d(s2, c3)
  ⊣ d(s2, c5)
  ⊣ d(s2, c6)
  ⊣ d(s2, c7)
  ⊣ d(s2, c8)
} = {
  pm2.61dan(w0, ∃(s0 ∈ c0, c1 =(s0 ⋂ c2)), c6 ∈ c1)
  syl2anc((w0 ∧ c6 ∈ c1), ∃(s0 ∈ c0, c1 =(s0 ⋂ c2)), c8 ∈ c0, c1 =(c8 ⋂ c2))
  syl5eqel(c8, c0, (-∞[(,]]c6), (w0 ∧ c6 ∈ c1))
  iocborel(cmnf, c6, c0, c4, (w0 ∧ c6 ∈ c1))
  a1i((w0 ∧ c6 ∈ c1), -∞ ∈ ℝ*)
  mnfxr()
  sselda(c6, c1, cr, w0)
  sstrd(c1, cr, c2, w0)
  a1i(w0, c1 ⊆ c2)
  eqsstri(c1, c2, { s1 ∈ c2 |(c3 ` s1)[<]c5 })
  ssrab2(s1, c2, (c3 ` s1)[<]c5)
  pimincfltioc(s1, s2, c1, c8, c2, c3, c5, c6, (w0 ∧ c6 ∈ c1))
  nfan(s1, w0, c6 ∈ c1)
  nfan(s2, w0, c6 ∈ c1)
  nfv(s2, c6 ∈ c1)
  adantr(w0, c6 ∈ c1, c2 ⊆ ℝ)
  adantr(w0, c6 ∈ c1, (c3 : c2 → ℝ*))
  adantr(w0, c6 ∈ c1, ∀(s1 ∈ c2, ∀(s2 ∈ c2,(s1[≤]s2 →(c3 ` s1)[≤](c3 ` s2)))))
  adantr(w0, c6 ∈ c1, c5 ∈ ℝ*)
  simpr(w0, c6 ∈ c1)
  rspceeqv(s0, c8, c0, c1, (c8 ⋂ c2), (s0 ⋂ c2))
  ineq1(s0, c8, c2)
  syl2anc((w0 ∧ ¬ c6 ∈ c1), ∃(s0 ∈ c0, c1 =(s0 ⋂ c2)), c7 ∈ c0, c1 =(c7 ⋂ c2))
  adantr(w0, ¬ c6 ∈ c1, c7 ∈ c0)
  a1i(w0, c7 ∈ c0)
  eqeltri(c7, c0, (-∞[(,)]c6))
  iooborel(cmnf, c6, c0, c4)
  pimincfltioo(s1, s2, c1, c7, c2, c3, c5, c6, (w0 ∧ ¬ c6 ∈ c1))
  nfan(s1, w0, ¬ c6 ∈ c1)
  nfn(s1, c6 ∈ c1)
  nfel(s1, c6, c1)
  nfcv(s1, c6)
  nfcxfr(s1, c1, { s1 ∈ c2 |(c3 ` s1)[<]c5 })
  nfrab1(s1, c2, (c3 ` s1)[<]c5)
  nfan(s2, w0, ¬ c6 ∈ c1)
  nfv(s2, ¬ c6 ∈ c1)
  adantr(w0, ¬ c6 ∈ c1, c2 ⊆ ℝ)
  adantr(w0, ¬ c6 ∈ c1, (c3 : c2 → ℝ*))
  adantr(w0, ¬ c6 ∈ c1, ∀(s1 ∈ c2, ∀(s2 ∈ c2,(s1[≤]s2 →(c3 ` s1)[≤](c3 ` s2)))))
  adantr(w0, ¬ c6 ∈ c1, c5 ∈ ℝ*)
  simpr(w0, ¬ c6 ∈ c1)
  rspceeqv(s0, c7, c0, c1, (c7 ⋂ c2), (s0 ⋂ c2))
  ineq1(s0, c7, c2)
  diff.cin.s(s0, c8, c2)
  diff.wn.s(s2, c6 ∈ c1)
  diff.wcel.s(s2, c6, c1)
  diff.cin.s(s0, c7, c2)
}

blocks.name: incsmf
blocks.content: A real-valued, nondecreasing function is Borel measurable. Proposition 121D (c) of [Fremlin1] p. 36 . (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 26-Jun-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm incsmf(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(csmblfn, c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c2, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c0, c2, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wral(s0, c2, wral(s1, c2, wi(wbr(cv(s0), cle, cv(s1)), wbr(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cle, cfv(c0, cv(s1)))))))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(csalgen, c3))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {
  issmfd(hs0, s0, c0, c1, c2, w0)
  nfv(hs0, w0)
  sseqtrd(c2, cuni(c1), cr, w0)
  3eqtrrd(cr, cuni(c1), cuni(c3), cuni(cfv(ctg, crn(cioo))), w0)
  unisalgen2(c1, c3, ctop, w0)

thm incsmf(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0 ∈(SMblFn ` c1))
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ⊆ ℝ)
  ⊣ (w0 →(c0 : c2 → ℝ))
  ⊣ (w0 → ∀(s0 ∈ c2, ∀(s1 ∈ c2,(s0[≤]s1 →(c0 ` s0)[≤](c0 ` s1)))))
  ⊣ c3 =(topGen ` ran((,)))
  ⊣ c1 =(SalGen ` c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
} = {
  issmfd(hs0, s0, c0, c1, c2, w0)
  nfv(hs0, w0)
  sseqtrd(c2, ⋃ c1, cr, w0)
  3eqtrrd(cr, ⋃ c1, ⋃ c3, ⋃(topGen ` ran((,))), w0)
  unisalgen2(c1, c3, ctop, w0)
  a1i(w0, ⋃ c3 = ⋃(topGen ` ran((,))))
  unieqi(c3, (topGen ` ran((,))))
  a1i(w0, ⋃(topGen ` ran((,)))= ℝ)
  eqcomi(⋃(topGen ` ran((,))), cr)
  uniretop()
  mpbird((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ℝ), { s0 ∈ c2 |(c0 ` s0)[<]hs0 } ∈(c1[|`t]c2), ∃(hs1 ∈ c1, { s0 ∈ c2 |(c0 ` s0)[<]hs0 } =(hs1 ⋂ c2)))
  incsmflem(hs1, hs2, hs3, c1, { s0 ∈ c2 |(c0 ` s0)[<]hs0 }, c2, c0, c3, hs0, sup({ s0 ∈ c2 |(c0 ` s0)[<]hs0 }, ℝ*, <), (-∞[(,)]sup({ s0 ∈ c2 |(c0 ` s0)[<]hs0 }, ℝ*, <)), (-∞[(,]]sup({ s0 ∈ c2 |(c0 ` s0)[<]hs0 }, ℝ*, <)), (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ℝ))
  nfv(hs2, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ℝ))
  nfv(hs3, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ℝ))
  adantr(w0, hs0 ∈ ℝ, c2 ⊆ ℝ)
  adantr(w0, hs0 ∈ ℝ, (c0 : c2 → ℝ*))
  frexr(c0, c2, w0)
  adantr(w0, hs0 ∈ ℝ, ∀(hs2 ∈ c2, ∀(hs3 ∈ c2,(hs2[≤]hs3 →(c0 ` hs2)[≤](c0 ` hs3)))))
  sylib(w0, ∀(hs2 ∈ c2, ∀(hs3 ∈ c2,(hs2[≤]hs3 →(c0 ` hs2)[≤](c0 ` hs3)))), ∀(s0 ∈ c2, ∀(s1 ∈ c2,(s0[≤]s1 →(c0 ` s0)[≤](c0 ` s1)))))
  cbvral2v(s0, s1, hs2, hs3, c2, c2, (s0[≤]s1 →(c0 ` s0)[≤](c0 ` s1)), (hs2[≤]hs3 →(c0 ` hs2)[≤](c0 ` hs3)), (hs2[≤]s1 →(c0 ` hs2)[≤](c0 ` s1)))
  imbi12d(s0 = hs2, s0[≤]s1, (c0 ` s0)[≤](c0 ` s1), hs2[≤]s1, (c0 ` hs2)[≤](c0 ` s1))
  breq1(s0, hs2, cle, s1)
  breq1d((c0 ` s0), cle, (c0 ` s1), (c0 ` hs2), s0 = hs2)
  imbi12d(s1 = hs3, hs2[≤]s1, (c0 ` hs2)[≤](c0 ` s1), hs2[≤]hs3, (c0 ` hs2)[≤](c0 ` hs3))
  breq2(s1, hs3, hs2, cle)
  breq2d((c0 ` hs2), cle, (c0 ` s1), (c0 ` hs3), s1 = hs3)
  fveq2(s1, hs3, c0)
  adantl(w0, hs0 ∈ ℝ, hs0 ∈ ℝ*)
  rexr(hs0)
  cbvrabv(s0, hs2, c2, (c0 ` s0)[<]hs0, (c0 ` hs2)[<]hs0)
  breq1d((c0 ` s0), clt, hs0, (c0 ` hs2), s0 = hs2)
  fveq2(s0, hs2, c0)
  eqid(sup({ s0 ∈ c2 |(c0 ` s0)[<]hs0 }, ℝ*, <))
  eqid((-∞[(,)]sup({ s0 ∈ c2 |(c0 ` s0)[<]hs0 }, ℝ*, <)))
  eqid((-∞[(,]]sup({ s0 ∈ c2 |(c0 ` s0)[<]hs0 }, ℝ*, <)))
  adantr(w0, hs0 ∈ ℝ, ({ s0 ∈ c2 |(c0 ` s0)[<]hs0 } ∈(c1[|`t]c2)↔ ∃(hs1 ∈ c1, { s0 ∈ c2 |(c0 ` s0)[<]hs0 } =(hs1 ⋂ c2))))
  syl2anc(w0, ({ s0 ∈ c2 |(c0 ` s0)[<]hs0 } ∈(c1[|`t]c2)↔ ∃(hs1 ∈ c1, { s0 ∈ c2 |(c0 ` s0)[<]hs0 } =(hs1 ⋂ c2))), c1 ∈ SAlg, c2 ∈ 𝕌)
  salgencld(c1, c3, ctop, w0)
  a1i(w0, c3 ∈ Top)
  eqeltri(c3, ctop, (topGen ` ran((,))))
  retop()
  ssexd(c2, cr, universe, w0)
  a1i(w0, ℝ ∈ 𝕌)
  reex()
  elrest(hs1, c1, csalg, c2, universe, { s0 ∈ c2 |(c0 ` s0)[<]hs0 })
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs2.s(hs3)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c({ s0 ∈ c2 |(c0 ` s0)[<]hs0 })
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c((-∞[(,)]sup({ s0 ∈ c2 |(c0 ` s0)[<]hs0 }, ℝ*, <)))
  diff.hs1.c((-∞[(,]]sup({ s0 ∈ c2 |(c0 ` s0)[<]hs0 }, ℝ*, <)))
  diff.hs2.c(c2)
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(hs0)
  diff.hs2.c(sup({ s0 ∈ c2 |(c0 ` s0)[<]hs0 }, ℝ*, <))
  diff.hs2.c((-∞[(,)]sup({ s0 ∈ c2 |(c0 ` s0)[<]hs0 }, ℝ*, <)))
  diff.hs2.c((-∞[(,]]sup({ s0 ∈ c2 |(c0 ` s0)[<]hs0 }, ℝ*, <)))
  diff.hs3.c({ s0 ∈ c2 |(c0 ` s0)[<]hs0 })
  diff.hs3.c(c2)
  diff.hs3.c(c0)
  diff.hs3.c(hs0)
  diff.hs3.c(sup({ s0 ∈ c2 |(c0 ` s0)[<]hs0 }, ℝ*, <))
  diff.hs3.c((-∞[(,)]sup({ s0 ∈ c2 |(c0 ` s0)[<]hs0 }, ℝ*, <)))
  diff.hs3.c((-∞[(,]]sup({ s0 ∈ c2 |(c0 ` s0)[<]hs0 }, ℝ*, <)))
  diff.hs2.w((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ℝ))
  diff.hs3.w((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ℝ))
  diff.wi.s(s0, hs2[≤]s1, (c0 ` hs2)[≤](c0 ` s1))
  diff.wbr.s(s0, hs2, cle, s1)
  diff.wbr.s(s0, (c0 ` hs2), cle, (c0 ` s1))
  diff.cle.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c0, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.wi.s(s1, hs2[≤]hs3, (c0 ` hs2)[≤](c0 ` hs3))
  diff.wbr.s(s1, hs2, cle, hs3)
  diff.wbr.s(s1, (c0 ` hs2), cle, (c0 ` hs3))
  diff.cfv.s(s1, c0, hs2)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs2)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs2)
  diff.hs2.s(s1)
  diff.cle.s(s1)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, c0, hs3)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs3)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs3)
  diff.hs3.s(s1)
  diff.hs2.w((s0[≤]s1 →(c0 ` s0)[≤](c0 ` s1)))
  diff.hs3.w((hs2[≤]s1 →(c0 ` hs2)[≤](c0 ` s1)))
  diff.wbr.s(s0, (c0 ` hs2), clt, hs0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c0, hs2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs2)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs2)
  diff.hs2.s(s0)
  diff.clt.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs2.w((c0 ` s0)[<]hs0)

blocks.name: smfsssmf
blocks.content: If a function is measurable w.r.t. to a sigma-algebra, then it is measurable w.r.t. to a larger sigma-algebra. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 26-Jun-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm smfsssmf(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(csmblfn, c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, csalg))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, csalg))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c2, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(csmblfn, c2)))
} = {
  issmfd(hs1, hs0, c0, c1, cdm(c0), w0)
  nfv(hs1, w0)
  sstrd(cdm(c0), cuni(c1), cuni(c2), w0)
  smfdmss(cdm(c0), c2, c0, w0)
  unissd(c2, c1, w0)
  smff(c0, cdm(c0), c2, w0)
  sseldd(crab(hs0, cdm(c0), wbr(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), clt, cv(hs1))), co(c1, crest, cdm(c0)), co(c2, crest, cdm(c0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), cr)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), cr), wss(co(c2, crest, cdm(c0)), co(c1, crest, cdm(c0))))
  syl2anc(w0, wss(co(c2, crest, cdm(c0)), co(c1, crest, cdm(c0))), wcel(c1, csalg), wss(c2, c1))
  ssrest(c1, csalg, c2, cdm(c0))
  smfpreimalt(hs0, cdm(c0), c0, cv(hs1), c2, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), cr)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), cr), wcel(c2, csalg))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), cr), wcel(c0, cfv(csmblfn, c2)))
  eqid(cdm(c0))
  simpr(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), cr))
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cdm(c0))
  diff.hs1.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.c(cv(hs1))
}

thm smfsssmf(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0 ∈(SMblFn ` c1))
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ SAlg)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ SAlg)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ⊆ c1)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈(SMblFn ` c2))
} = {
  issmfd(hs1, hs0, c0, c1, dom(c0), w0)
  nfv(hs1, w0)
  sstrd(dom(c0), ⋃ c1, ⋃ c2, w0)
  smfdmss(dom(c0), c2, c0, w0)
  unissd(c2, c1, w0)
  smff(c0, dom(c0), c2, w0)
  sseldd({ hs0 ∈ dom(c0)|(c0 ` hs0)[<]hs1 }, (c1[|`t]dom(c0)), (c2[|`t]dom(c0)), (w0 ∧ hs1 ∈ ℝ))
  adantr(w0, hs1 ∈ ℝ, (c2[|`t]dom(c0))⊆(c1[|`t]dom(c0)))
  syl2anc(w0, (c2[|`t]dom(c0))⊆(c1[|`t]dom(c0)), c1 ∈ SAlg, c2 ⊆ c1)
  ssrest(c1, csalg, c2, dom(c0))
  smfpreimalt(hs0, dom(c0), c0, hs1, c2, (w0 ∧ hs1 ∈ ℝ))
  adantr(w0, hs1 ∈ ℝ, c2 ∈ SAlg)
  adantr(w0, hs1 ∈ ℝ, c0 ∈(SMblFn ` c2))
  eqid(dom(c0))
  simpr(w0, hs1 ∈ ℝ)
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(dom(c0))
  diff.hs1.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.c(hs1)
}

blocks.content: The predicate " ` F ` is a real-valued measurable function w.r.t. to the sigma-algebra ` S ` ". A function is measurable iff the preimages of all right-closed intervals unbounded below are in the subspace sigma-algebra induced by its domain. The domain of ` F ` is required to be a subset of the underlying set of ` S ` . Definition 121C of [Fremlin1] p. 36, and Proposition 121B (ii) of [Fremlin1] p. 35 . (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 26-Jun-2021.)

thm issmflelem(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0 ∈(SMblFn ` c1))
  ⊣ F/(s0, w0)
  ⊣ F/(s1, w0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ SAlg)
  ⊣ c2 = dom(c0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ⊆ ⋃ c1)
  ⊣ (w0 →(c0 : c2 → ℝ))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s1 ∈ ℝ)→ { s0 ∈ c2 |(c0 ` s0)[≤]s1 } ∈(c1[|`t]c2))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
} = {
  mpbird(w0, c0 ∈(SMblFn ` c1), (c2 ⊆ ⋃ c1 ∧(c0 : c2 → ℝ)∧ ∀(hs0 ∈ ℝ, { s0 ∈ c2 |(c0 ` s0)[<]hs0 } ∈(c1[|`t]c2))))
  3jca(w0, c2 ⊆ ⋃ c1, (c0 : c2 → ℝ), ∀(hs0 ∈ ℝ, { s0 ∈ c2 |(c0 ` s0)[<]hs0 } ∈(c1[|`t]c2)))
  ralrimiva(hs0, cr, w0, { s0 ∈ c2 |(c0 ` s0)[<]hs0 } ∈(c1[|`t]c2))
  eqeltrd({ s0 ∈ c2 |(c0 ` s0)[<]hs0 }, (c1[|`t]c2), { s0 ∈ ⋃(c1[|`t]c2)|(c0 ` s0)[<]hs0 }, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ℝ))
  adantr(w0, hs0 ∈ ℝ, { s0 ∈ c2 |(c0 ` s0)[<]hs0 } = { s0 ∈ ⋃(c1[|`t]c2)|(c0 ` s0)[<]hs0 })
  rabeqd(s0, c2, ⋃(c1[|`t]c2), w0, (c0 ` s0)[<]hs0)
  mpdan(w0, c2 = ⋃(c1[|`t]c2), c2 ⊆ ⋃ c1)
  eqcomd(c2, ⋃(c1[|`t]c2), (w0 ∧ c2 ⊆ ⋃ c1))
  salpreimalelt(s0, s1, ⋃(c1[|`t]c2), (c0 ` s0), hs0, (c1[|`t]c2), (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ℝ))
  nfan(s0, w0, hs0 ∈ ℝ)
  nfv(s0, hs0 ∈ ℝ)
  nfan(s1, w0, hs0 ∈ ℝ)
  nfv(s1, hs0 ∈ ℝ)
  adantr(w0, hs0 ∈ ℝ, (c1[|`t]c2)∈ SAlg)
  mpdan(w0, (c1[|`t]c2)∈ SAlg, c2 ⊆ ⋃ c1)
  subsalsal((c1[|`t]c2), c1, c2, universe, (w0 ∧ c2 ⊆ ⋃ c1))
  ssexd(c2, ⋃ c1, universe, (w0 ∧ c2 ⊆ ⋃ c1))
  adantr(w0, c2 ⊆ ⋃ c1, ⋃ c1 ∈ 𝕌)
  uniexd(c1, csalg, w0)
  eqid((c1[|`t]c2))
  eqid(⋃(c1[|`t]c2))
  adantlr(w0, hs0 ∈ ℝ, s0 ∈ ⋃(c1[|`t]c2), (c0 ` s0)∈ ℝ*)
  rexrd((c0 ` s0), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ ⋃(c1[|`t]c2)))
  syldan(w0, s0 ∈ ⋃(c1[|`t]c2), (c0 ` s0)∈ ℝ, s0 ∈ c2)
  eleqtrd(s0, c2, ⋃(c1[|`t]c2), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ ⋃(c1[|`t]c2)))
  simpr(w0, s0 ∈ ⋃(c1[|`t]c2))
  adantr(w0, s0 ∈ ⋃(c1[|`t]c2), ⋃(c1[|`t]c2)= c2)
  ffvelrnda(s0, c2, c0, cr, w0)
  adantlr(w0, hs0 ∈ ℝ, s1 ∈ ℝ, { s0 ∈ ⋃(c1[|`t]c2)|(c0 ` s0)[≤]s1 } ∈(c1[|`t]c2))
  eqeltrd({ s0 ∈ ⋃(c1[|`t]c2)|(c0 ` s0)[≤]s1 }, (c1[|`t]c2), { s0 ∈ c2 |(c0 ` s0)[≤]s1 }, (w0 ∧ s1 ∈ ℝ))
  adantr(w0, s1 ∈ ℝ, { s0 ∈ ⋃(c1[|`t]c2)|(c0 ` s0)[≤]s1 } = { s0 ∈ c2 |(c0 ` s0)[≤]s1 })
  rabeqd(s0, ⋃(c1[|`t]c2), c2, w0, (c0 ` s0)[≤]s1)
  mpdan(w0, ⋃(c1[|`t]c2)= c2, c2 ⊆ ⋃ c1)
  restuni4(c1, c2, csalg, (w0 ∧ c2 ⊆ ⋃ c1))
  adantr(w0, c2 ⊆ ⋃ c1, c1 ∈ SAlg)
  simpr(w0, c2 ⊆ ⋃ c1)
  simpr(w0, hs0 ∈ ℝ)
  issmf(hs0, s0, c0, c1, c2, w0)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.cuni.s(s0, (c1[|`t]c2))
  diff.co.s(s0, c1, crest, c2)
  diff.crest.s(s0)
  diff.cuni.s(s1, (c1[|`t]c2))
  diff.cfv.s(s1, c0, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.co.s(s1, c1, crest, c2)
  diff.crest.s(s1)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, hs0, cr)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.cr.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, hs0, cr)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.cr.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
}

blocks.name: smfpimltmpt
blocks.content: Given a function measurable w.r.t. to a sigma-algebra, the preimage of an open interval unbounded below is in the subspace sigma-algebra induced by its domain. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 26-Jun-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm smfpimltmpt(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, clt, c2)), co(c3, crest, c0)))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, csalg))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cfv(csmblfn, c3)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cr))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  mpbird(w0, wcel(crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, clt, c2)), co(c3, crest, c0)), wcel(crab(s0, cdm(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), wbr(cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cv(s0)), clt, c2)), co(c3, crest, cdm(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)))))

  eqid(cdm(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)))
  eleq12d(crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, clt, c2)), co(c3, crest, c0), crab(s0, cdm(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), wbr(cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cv(s0)), clt, c2)), co(c3, crest, cdm(cmpt(s0, c0, c1))), w0)
  3eqtrrd(crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, clt, c2)), crab(s0, cdm(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), wbr(cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cv(s0)), clt, c2)), crab(s0, c0, wbr(cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cv(s0)), clt, c2)), crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, clt, c2)), w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(crab(s0, cdm(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), wbr(cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cv(s0)), clt, c2)), crab(s0, c0, wbr(cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cv(s0)), clt, c2))), wceq(cdm(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), c0))
  rabeqf(s0, cdm(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), c0, wbr(cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cv(s0)), clt, c2))
  nfdm(s0, cmpt(s0, c0, c1))
  nfmpt1(s0, c0, c1)
  nfcv(s0, c0)
  rabbida(s0, c0, w0, wbr(cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cv(s0)), clt, c2), wbr(c1, clt, c2))
  breq1d(cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cv(s0)), clt, c2, c1, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  fvmpt2d(s0, c0, cmpt(s0, c0, c1), c1, c4, w0)
  a1i(w0, wceq(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cmpt(s0, c0, c1)))
  eqidd(crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, clt, c2)), w0)
  oveq2d(c3, crest, c0, cdm(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), w0)
  eqcomd(c0, cdm(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), w0)
  dmmptdf(s0, cmpt(s0, c0, c1), c0, c1, c4, w0)
  eqid(cmpt(s0, c0, c1))
}

blocks.name: smfpimltxr
blocks.content: Given a function measurable w.r.t. to a sigma-algebra, the preimage of an open interval unbounded below is in the subspace sigma-algebra induced by its domain. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 26-Jun-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm smfpimltxr(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(crab(s0, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), clt, c2)), co(c3, crest, c0)))
  -| wnfc(s0, c1)
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, csalg))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cfv(csmblfn, c3)))
  -| wceq(c0, cdm(c1))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cxr))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  pm2.61dan(w0, wcel(crab(s0, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), clt, c2)), co(c3, crest, c0)), wceq(c2, cpnf))
  eqeltrd(crab(s0, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), clt, c2)), co(c3, crest, c0), c0, wa(w0, wceq(c2, cpnf)))
  3eqtrd(crab(s0, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), clt, c2)), c0, crab(s0, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), clt, cpnf)), c0, wa(w0, wceq(c2, cpnf)))
  adantl(w0, wceq(c2, cpnf), wceq(crab(s0, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), clt, c2)), crab(s0, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), clt, cpnf))))
  rabbidv(s0, c0, wceq(c2, cpnf), wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), clt, c2), wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), clt, cpnf))
  breq2(c2, cpnf, cfv(c1, cv(s0)), clt)
  adantr(w0, wceq(c2, cpnf), wceq(crab(s0, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), clt, cpnf)), c0))
  pimltpnf2(s0, c0, c1, w0)
  eqidd(c0, wa(w0, wceq(c2, cpnf)))
  adantr(w0, wceq(c2, cpnf), wcel(c0, co(c3, crest, c0)))
  eqeltrd(c0, co(c3, crest, c0), cuni(co(c3, crest, c0)), w0)
  eqcomd(c0, cuni(co(c3, crest, c0)), w0)
  restuni4(c3, c0, csalg, w0)
  simp1d(w0, wss(c0, cuni(c3)), wf(c1, c0, cr), wral(hs0, cr, wcel(crab(s0, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), clt, cv(hs0))), co(c3, crest, c0))))
  salunid(co(c3, crest, c0), w0)
  syldan(w0, wn(wceq(c2, cpnf)), wcel(crab(s0, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), clt, c2)), co(c3, crest, c0)), wne(c2, cpnf))
  adantl(w0, wn(wceq(c2, cpnf)), wne(c2, cpnf))
  neqne(c2, cpnf)
  pm2.61dan(wa(w0, wne(c2, cpnf)), wcel(crab(s0, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), clt, c2)), co(c3, crest, c0)), wceq(c2, cmnf))
  adantlr(w0, wne(c2, cpnf), wceq(c2, cmnf), wcel(crab(s0, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), clt, c2)), co(c3, crest, c0)))
  eqeltrd(crab(s0, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), clt, c2)), co(c3, crest, c0), emptycls, wa(w0, wceq(c2, cmnf)))
  eqtrd(crab(s0, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), clt, c2)), emptycls, crab(s0, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), clt, cmnf)), wa(w0, wceq(c2, cmnf)))
  adantl(w0, wceq(c2, cmnf), wceq(crab(s0, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), clt, c2)), crab(s0, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), clt, cmnf))))
  rabbidv(s0, c0, wceq(c2, cmnf), wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), clt, c2), wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), clt, cmnf))
  breq2(c2, cmnf, cfv(c1, cv(s0)), clt)
  pimltmnf2(s0, c0, c1, wa(w0, wceq(c2, cmnf)))
  adantr(w0, wceq(c2, cmnf), wf(c1, c0, cr))
  simp2d(w0, wf(c1, c0, cr), wss(c0, cuni(c3)), wral(hs0, cr, wcel(crab(s0, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), clt, cv(hs0))), co(c3, crest, c0))))
  mpbid(w0, w3a(wss(c0, cuni(c3)), wf(c1, c0, cr), wral(hs0, cr, wcel(crab(s0, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), clt, cv(hs0))), co(c3, crest, c0)))), wcel(c1, cfv(csmblfn, c3)))
  issmff(hs0, s0, c1, c3, c0, w0)
  adantr(w0, wceq(c2, cmnf), wcel(emptycls, co(c3, crest, c0)))
  0sald(co(c3, crest, c0), w0)
  subsalsal(co(c3, crest, c0), c3, c0, universe, w0)
  syl5eqel(c0, universe, cdm(c1), w0)
  dmexd(c1, cfv(csmblfn, c3), w0)
  eqid(co(c3, crest, c0))
  syl2anc(wa(wa(w0, wne(c2, cpnf)), wn(wceq(c2, cmnf))), wcel(crab(s0, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), clt, c2)), co(c3, crest, c0)), w0, wcel(c2, cr))
  xrred(c2, wa(wa(w0, wne(c2, cpnf)), wn(wceq(c2, cmnf))))
  syl(wa(wa(w0, wne(c2, cpnf)), wn(wceq(c2, cmnf))), wcel(c2, cxr), w0)
  simpll(w0, wne(c2, cpnf), wn(wceq(c2, cmnf)))
  adantl(wa(w0, wne(c2, cpnf)), wn(wceq(c2, cmnf)), wne(c2, cmnf))
  neqne(c2, cmnf)
  simplr(w0, wne(c2, cpnf), wn(wceq(c2, cmnf)))
  smfpreimaltf(s0, c0, c1, c2, c3, wa(w0, wcel(c2, cr)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(c2, cr), wcel(c3, csalg))
  adantr(w0, wcel(c2, cr), wcel(c1, cfv(csmblfn, c3)))
  simpr(w0, wcel(c2, cr))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, c2, cpnf)
  diff.cpnf.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, c2, cmnf)
  diff.cmnf.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm smfpimltxr(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → { s0 ∈ c0 |(c1 ` s0)[<]c2 } ∈(c3[|`t]c0))
  ⊣ F/(s0, c1)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ SAlg)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈(SMblFn ` c3))
  ⊣ c0 = dom(c1)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ ℝ*)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
} = {
  pm2.61dan(w0, { s0 ∈ c0 |(c1 ` s0)[<]c2 } ∈(c3[|`t]c0), c2 = +∞)
  eqeltrd({ s0 ∈ c0 |(c1 ` s0)[<]c2 }, (c3[|`t]c0), c0, (w0 ∧ c2 = +∞))
  3eqtrd({ s0 ∈ c0 |(c1 ` s0)[<]c2 }, c0, { s0 ∈ c0 |(c1 ` s0)[<]+∞ }, c0, (w0 ∧ c2 = +∞))
  adantl(w0, c2 = +∞, { s0 ∈ c0 |(c1 ` s0)[<]c2 } = { s0 ∈ c0 |(c1 ` s0)[<]+∞ })
  rabbidv(s0, c0, c2 = +∞, (c1 ` s0)[<]c2, (c1 ` s0)[<]+∞)
  breq2(c2, cpnf, (c1 ` s0), clt)
  adantr(w0, c2 = +∞, { s0 ∈ c0 |(c1 ` s0)[<]+∞ } = c0)
  pimltpnf2(s0, c0, c1, w0)
  eqidd(c0, (w0 ∧ c2 = +∞))
  adantr(w0, c2 = +∞, c0 ∈(c3[|`t]c0))
  eqeltrd(c0, (c3[|`t]c0), ⋃(c3[|`t]c0), w0)
  eqcomd(c0, ⋃(c3[|`t]c0), w0)
  restuni4(c3, c0, csalg, w0)
  simp1d(w0, c0 ⊆ ⋃ c3, (c1 : c0 → ℝ), ∀(hs0 ∈ ℝ, { s0 ∈ c0 |(c1 ` s0)[<]hs0 } ∈(c3[|`t]c0)))
  salunid((c3[|`t]c0), w0)
  syldan(w0, ¬ c2 = +∞, { s0 ∈ c0 |(c1 ` s0)[<]c2 } ∈(c3[|`t]c0), c2 ≠ +∞)
  adantl(w0, ¬ c2 = +∞, c2 ≠ +∞)
  neqne(c2, cpnf)
  pm2.61dan((w0 ∧ c2 ≠ +∞), { s0 ∈ c0 |(c1 ` s0)[<]c2 } ∈(c3[|`t]c0), c2 = -∞)
  adantlr(w0, c2 ≠ +∞, c2 = -∞, { s0 ∈ c0 |(c1 ` s0)[<]c2 } ∈(c3[|`t]c0))
  eqeltrd({ s0 ∈ c0 |(c1 ` s0)[<]c2 }, (c3[|`t]c0), emptycls, (w0 ∧ c2 = -∞))
  eqtrd({ s0 ∈ c0 |(c1 ` s0)[<]c2 }, emptycls, { s0 ∈ c0 |(c1 ` s0)[<]-∞ }, (w0 ∧ c2 = -∞))
  adantl(w0, c2 = -∞, { s0 ∈ c0 |(c1 ` s0)[<]c2 } = { s0 ∈ c0 |(c1 ` s0)[<]-∞ })
  rabbidv(s0, c0, c2 = -∞, (c1 ` s0)[<]c2, (c1 ` s0)[<]-∞)
  breq2(c2, cmnf, (c1 ` s0), clt)
  pimltmnf2(s0, c0, c1, (w0 ∧ c2 = -∞))
  adantr(w0, c2 = -∞, (c1 : c0 → ℝ))
  simp2d(w0, (c1 : c0 → ℝ), c0 ⊆ ⋃ c3, ∀(hs0 ∈ ℝ, { s0 ∈ c0 |(c1 ` s0)[<]hs0 } ∈(c3[|`t]c0)))
  mpbid(w0, (c0 ⊆ ⋃ c3 ∧(c1 : c0 → ℝ)∧ ∀(hs0 ∈ ℝ, { s0 ∈ c0 |(c1 ` s0)[<]hs0 } ∈(c3[|`t]c0))), c1 ∈(SMblFn ` c3))
  issmff(hs0, s0, c1, c3, c0, w0)
  adantr(w0, c2 = -∞, ∅ ∈(c3[|`t]c0))
  0sald((c3[|`t]c0), w0)
  subsalsal((c3[|`t]c0), c3, c0, universe, w0)
  syl5eqel(c0, universe, dom(c1), w0)
  dmexd(c1, (SMblFn ` c3), w0)
  eqid((c3[|`t]c0))
  syl2anc(((w0 ∧ c2 ≠ +∞)∧ ¬ c2 = -∞), { s0 ∈ c0 |(c1 ` s0)[<]c2 } ∈(c3[|`t]c0), w0, c2 ∈ ℝ)
  xrred(c2, ((w0 ∧ c2 ≠ +∞)∧ ¬ c2 = -∞))
  syl(((w0 ∧ c2 ≠ +∞)∧ ¬ c2 = -∞), c2 ∈ ℝ*, w0)
  simpll(w0, c2 ≠ +∞, ¬ c2 = -∞)
  adantl((w0 ∧ c2 ≠ +∞), ¬ c2 = -∞, c2 ≠ -∞)
  neqne(c2, cmnf)
  simplr(w0, c2 ≠ +∞, ¬ c2 = -∞)
  smfpreimaltf(s0, c0, c1, c2, c3, (w0 ∧ c2 ∈ ℝ))
  adantr(w0, c2 ∈ ℝ, c3 ∈ SAlg)
  adantr(w0, c2 ∈ ℝ, c1 ∈(SMblFn ` c3))
  simpr(w0, c2 ∈ ℝ)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, c2, cpnf)
  diff.cpnf.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, c2, cmnf)
  diff.cmnf.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: issmfdmpt
blocks.content: A sufficient condition for " ` F ` being a measurable function w.r.t. to the sigma-algebra ` S ` ". (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 26-Jun-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm issmfdmpt(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cfv(csmblfn, c2)))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wnf(s1, w0)
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, csalg))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c0, cuni(c2)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cr))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), cr)), wcel(crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, clt, cv(s1))), co(c2, crest, c0)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {
  issmfdf(s0, s1, cmpt(s0, c0, c1), c2, c0, w0)
  nfmpt1(s0, c0, c1)
  fmptdf(s0, cmpt(s0, c0, c1), c0, cr, c1, w0)
  eqid(cmpt(s0, c0, c1))
  eqeltrd(crab(s0, c0, wbr(cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cv(s0)), clt, cv(s1))), co(c2, crest, c0), crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, clt, cv(s1))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), cr)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s1), cr), wceq(crab(s0, c0, wbr(cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cv(s0)), clt, cv(s1))), crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, clt, cv(s1)))))
  sylib(w0, wceq(crab(s0, c0, wbr(cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cv(s0)), clt, cv(s1))), crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, clt, cv(s1)))), wral(s0, c0, wb(wbr(cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cv(s0)), clt, cv(s1)), wbr(c1, clt, cv(s1)))))
  ralrimi(s0, c0, w0, wb(wbr(cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cv(s0)), clt, cv(s1)), wbr(c1, clt, cv(s1))))
  ex(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wb(wbr(cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cv(s0)), clt, cv(s1)), wbr(c1, clt, cv(s1))))
  breq1d(cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cv(s0)), clt, cv(s1), c1, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  fvmpt2d(s0, c0, cmpt(s0, c0, c1), c1, cr, w0)
  eqidd(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), w0)
  rabbi(s0, c0, wbr(cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cv(s0)), clt, cv(s1)), wbr(c1, clt, cv(s1)))
  diff.cmpt.s(s1, s0, c0, c1)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cr.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: smfconst
blocks.content: Given a sigma-algebra over a base set X, every partial real-valued constant function is measurable. Proposition 121E (a) of [Fremlin1] p. 37 . (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 26-Jun-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm smfconst(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(csmblfn, c1)))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, csalg))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c2, cuni(c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cr))
  -| wceq(c0, cmpt(s0, c2, c3))
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
} = {
  issmfdf(s0, hs0, c0, c1, c2, w0)
  nfcxfr(s0, c0, cmpt(s0, c2, c3))
  nfmpt1(s0, c2, c3)
  nfv(hs0, w0)
  fmptdf(s0, c0, c2, cr, c3, w0)
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(c3, cr))
  pm2.61dan(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cr)), wcel(crab(s0, c2, wbr(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), clt, cv(hs0))), co(c1, crest, c2)), wbr(c3, clt, cv(hs0)))
  eqeltrd(crab(s0, c2, wbr(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), clt, cv(hs0))), co(c1, crest, c2), cin(cuni(c1), c2), wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cr)), wbr(c3, clt, cv(hs0))))
  3eqtrd(crab(s0, c2, wbr(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), clt, cv(hs0))), cin(cuni(c1), c2), c2, c2, wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cr)), wbr(c3, clt, cv(hs0))))
  pimconstlt1(s0, c2, c0, cv(hs0), c3, wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cr)), wbr(c3, clt, cv(hs0))))
  nfan(s0, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cr)), wbr(c3, clt, cv(hs0)))
  nfv(s0, wbr(c3, clt, cv(hs0)))
  ad2antrr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wbr(c3, clt, cv(hs0)), wcel(c3, cr))
  simpr(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cr)), wbr(c3, clt, cv(hs0)))
  eqidd(c2, wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cr)), wbr(c3, clt, cv(hs0))))
  ad2antrr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wbr(c3, clt, cv(hs0)), wceq(c2, cin(cuni(c1), c2)))
  eqcomd(c2, cin(cuni(c1), c2), w0)
  sylib(w0, wceq(cin(cuni(c1), c2), c2), wss(c2, cuni(c1)))
  sseqin2(c2, cuni(c1))
  elrestd(cin(cuni(c1), c2), c1, c2, csalg, universe, cuni(c1), wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cr)), wbr(c3, clt, cv(hs0))))
  ad2antrr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wbr(c3, clt, cv(hs0)), wcel(c2, universe))
  salunid(c1, wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cr)), wbr(c3, clt, cv(hs0))))
  ad2antrr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wbr(c3, clt, cv(hs0)), wcel(c1, csalg))
  eqid(cin(cuni(c1), c2))
  eqeltrd(crab(s0, c2, wbr(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), clt, cv(hs0))), co(c1, crest, c2), emptycls, wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cr)), wn(wbr(c3, clt, cv(hs0)))))
  pimconstlt0(s0, c2, c0, cv(hs0), c3, wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cr)), wn(wbr(c3, clt, cv(hs0)))))
  nfan(s0, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cr)), wn(wbr(c3, clt, cv(hs0))))
  nfan(s0, w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cr))
  nfv(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), cr))
  nfv(s0, wn(wbr(c3, clt, cv(hs0))))

blocks.name: sssmfmpt

blocks.name: cnfrrnsmf

blocks.name: smfpreimale
blocks.content: Given a function measurable w.r.t. to a sigma-algebra, the preimage of a closed interval unbounded below is in the subspace sigma-algebra induced by its domain. See Proposition 121B (ii) of [Fremlin1] p. 35 (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 26-Jun-2021.)

thm smfpreimale(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {

  -| wceq(c0, cdm(c1))

  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  syl2anc(w0, wcel(crab(s0, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cle, c2)), co(c3, crest, c0)), wcel(c2, cr), wral(hs0, cr, wcel(crab(s0, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cle, cv(hs0))), co(c3, crest, c0))))
  simp3d(w0, wral(hs0, cr, wcel(crab(s0, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cle, cv(hs0))), co(c3, crest, c0))), wss(c0, cuni(c3)), wf(c1, c0, cr))
  mpbid(w0, w3a(wss(c0, cuni(c3)), wf(c1, c0, cr), wral(hs0, cr, wcel(crab(s0, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cle, cv(hs0))), co(c3, crest, c0)))), wcel(c1, cfv(csmblfn, c3)))
  issmfle(hs0, s0, c1, c3, c0, w0)
  rspcva(hs0, c2, cr, wcel(crab(s0, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cle, cv(hs0))), co(c3, crest, c0)), wcel(crab(s0, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cle, c2)), co(c3, crest, c0)))
  eleq1d(crab(s0, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cle, cv(hs0))), co(c3, crest, c0), crab(s0, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cle, c2)), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  rabbidv(s0, c0, wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cle, cv(hs0)), wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cle, c2))

  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)

blocks.name: issmfgtlem
blocks.content: The predicate " ` F ` is a real-valued measurable function w.r.t. to the sigma-algebra ` S ` ". A function is measurable iff the preimages of all left-open intervals unbounded above are in the subspace sigma-algebra induced by its domain. The domain of ` F ` is required to be a subset of the underlying set of ` S ` . Definition 121C of [Fremlin1] p. 36, and Proposition 121B (iii) of [Fremlin1] p. 35 . (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 26-Jun-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm issmfgtlem(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(csmblfn, c1)))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wnf(s1, w0)
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, csalg))
  -| wceq(c2, cdm(c0))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c2, cuni(c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c0, c2, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wral(s1, cr, wcel(crab(s0, c2, wbr(cv(s1), clt, cfv(c0, cv(s0)))), co(c1, crest, c2))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)

thm issmfgtlem(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0 ∈(SMblFn ` c1))
  ⊣ F/(s0, w0)
  ⊣ F/(s1, w0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ SAlg)
  ⊣ c2 = dom(c0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ⊆ ⋃ c1)
  ⊣ (w0 →(c0 : c2 → ℝ))
  ⊣ (w0 → ∀(s1 ∈ ℝ, { s0 ∈ c2 | s1[<](c0 ` s0)} ∈(c1[|`t]c2)))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
} = {
  mpbird(w0, c0 ∈(SMblFn ` c1), (c2 ⊆ ⋃ c1 ∧(c0 : c2 → ℝ)∧ ∀(hs0 ∈ ℝ, { s0 ∈ c2 |(c0 ` s0)[<]hs0 } ∈(c1[|`t]c2))))
  3jca(w0, c2 ⊆ ⋃ c1, (c0 : c2 → ℝ), ∀(hs0 ∈ ℝ, { s0 ∈ c2 |(c0 ` s0)[<]hs0 } ∈(c1[|`t]c2)))
  ralrimiva(hs0, cr, w0, { s0 ∈ c2 |(c0 ` s0)[<]hs0 } ∈(c1[|`t]c2))
  eqeltrd({ s0 ∈ c2 |(c0 ` s0)[<]hs0 }, (c1[|`t]c2), { s0 ∈ ⋃(c1[|`t]c2)|(c0 ` s0)[<]hs0 }, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ℝ))
  adantr(w0, hs0 ∈ ℝ, { s0 ∈ c2 |(c0 ` s0)[<]hs0 } = { s0 ∈ ⋃(c1[|`t]c2)|(c0 ` s0)[<]hs0 })
  rabeqd(s0, c2, ⋃(c1[|`t]c2), w0, (c0 ` s0)[<]hs0)
  eqcomd(c2, ⋃(c1[|`t]c2), w0)
  salpreimagtlt(s0, s1, ⋃(c1[|`t]c2), (c0 ` s0), hs0, (c1[|`t]c2), (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ℝ))
  nfan(s0, w0, hs0 ∈ ℝ)
  nfv(s0, hs0 ∈ ℝ)
  nfan(s1, w0, hs0 ∈ ℝ)
  nfv(s1, hs0 ∈ ℝ)
  adantr(w0, hs0 ∈ ℝ, (c1[|`t]c2)∈ SAlg)
  subsalsal((c1[|`t]c2), c1, c2, universe, w0)
  mpdan(w0, c2 ∈ 𝕌, c2 ⊆ ⋃ c1)
  ssexd(c2, ⋃ c1, universe, (w0 ∧ c2 ⊆ ⋃ c1))
  adantr(w0, c2 ⊆ ⋃ c1, ⋃ c1 ∈ 𝕌)
  uniexd(c1, csalg, w0)
  simpr(w0, c2 ⊆ ⋃ c1)
  eqid((c1[|`t]c2))
  eqid(⋃(c1[|`t]c2))
  adantlr(w0, hs0 ∈ ℝ, s0 ∈ ⋃(c1[|`t]c2), (c0 ` s0)∈ ℝ*)
  rexrd((c0 ` s0), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ ⋃(c1[|`t]c2)))
  ffvelrnd(c0, s0, cr, c2, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ ⋃(c1[|`t]c2)))
  adantr(w0, s0 ∈ ⋃(c1[|`t]c2), (c0 : c2 → ℝ))
  eleqtrd(s0, c2, ⋃(c1[|`t]c2), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ ⋃(c1[|`t]c2)))
  simpr(w0, s0 ∈ ⋃(c1[|`t]c2))
  adantr(w0, s0 ∈ ⋃(c1[|`t]c2), ⋃(c1[|`t]c2)= c2)
  adantlr(w0, hs0 ∈ ℝ, s1 ∈ ℝ, { s0 ∈ ⋃(c1[|`t]c2)| s1[<](c0 ` s0)} ∈(c1[|`t]c2))
  eqeltrd({ s0 ∈ ⋃(c1[|`t]c2)| s1[<](c0 ` s0)}, (c1[|`t]c2), { s0 ∈ c2 | s1[<](c0 ` s0)}, (w0 ∧ s1 ∈ ℝ))
  adantr(w0, s1 ∈ ℝ, { s0 ∈ ⋃(c1[|`t]c2)| s1[<](c0 ` s0)} = { s0 ∈ c2 | s1[<](c0 ` s0)})
  rabeqd(s0, ⋃(c1[|`t]c2), c2, w0, s1[<](c0 ` s0))
  restuni4(c1, c2, csalg, w0)
  r19.21bi(s1, cr, w0, { s0 ∈ c2 | s1[<](c0 ` s0)} ∈(c1[|`t]c2))
  simpr(w0, hs0 ∈ ℝ)
  issmf(hs0, s0, c0, c1, c2, w0)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.cuni.s(s0, (c1[|`t]c2))
  diff.co.s(s0, c1, crest, c2)
  diff.crest.s(s0)
  diff.cuni.s(s1, (c1[|`t]c2))
  diff.cfv.s(s1, c0, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.co.s(s1, c1, crest, c2)
  diff.crest.s(s1)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, hs0, cr)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.cr.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, hs0, cr)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.cr.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
}

blocks.name: issmfgt
blocks.content: The predicate " ` F ` is a real-valued measurable function w.r.t. to the sigma-algebra ` S ` ". A function is measurable iff the preimages of all left-open intervals unbounded above are in the subspace sigma-algebra induced by its domain. The domain of ` F ` is required to be b subset of the underlying set of ` S ` . Definition 121C of [Fremlin1] p. 36, and Proposition 121B (iii) of [Fremlin1] p. 35 . (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 26-Jun-2021.)

  eqtrd({ hs1 ∈ c2 | hs0[<](c0 ` hs1)}, { s1 ∈ c2 | s0[<](c0 ` s1)}, { hs1 ∈ c2 | s0[<](c0 ` hs1)}, hs0 = s0)
  rabbidv(hs1, c2, hs0 = s0, hs0[<](c0 ` hs1), s0[<](c0 ` hs1))

  diff.hs1.c(c2)

blocks.name: issmfled
blocks.content: A sufficient condition for " ` F ` being a real-valued measurable function w.r.t. to the sigma-algebra ` S ` ". (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 26-Jun-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm issmfled(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(csmblfn, c1)))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, csalg))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c2, cuni(c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c0, c2, cr))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cr)), wcel(crab(s1, c2, wbr(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), cle, cv(s0))), co(c1, crest, c2)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {
  mpbird(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(csmblfn, c1)), w3a(wss(cdm(c0), cuni(c1)), wf(c0, cdm(c0), cr), wral(s0, cr, wcel(crab(s1, cdm(c0), wbr(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), cle, cv(s0))), co(c1, crest, cdm(c0))))))
  3jca(w0, wss(cdm(c0), cuni(c1)), wf(c0, cdm(c0), cr), wral(s0, cr, wcel(crab(s1, cdm(c0), wbr(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), cle, cv(s0))), co(c1, crest, cdm(c0)))))
  eqsstrd(cdm(c0), cuni(c1), c2, w0)
  ffdmd(c0, cr, c2, w0)
  ralrimi(s0, cr, w0, wcel(crab(s1, cdm(c0), wbr(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), cle, cv(s0))), co(c1, crest, cdm(c0))))
  ex(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cr), wcel(crab(s1, cdm(c0), wbr(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), cle, cv(s0))), co(c1, crest, cdm(c0))))
  mpbird(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cr)), wcel(crab(s1, cdm(c0), wbr(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), cle, cv(s0))), co(c1, crest, cdm(c0))), wcel(crab(s1, c2, wbr(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), cle, cv(s0))), co(c1, crest, c2)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cr), wb(wcel(crab(s1, cdm(c0), wbr(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), cle, cv(s0))), co(c1, crest, cdm(c0))), wcel(crab(s1, c2, wbr(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), cle, cv(s0))), co(c1, crest, c2))))
  eleq12d(crab(s1, cdm(c0), wbr(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), cle, cv(s0))), co(c1, crest, cdm(c0)), crab(s1, c2, wbr(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), cle, cv(s0))), co(c1, crest, c2), w0)
  rabeqd(s1, cdm(c0), c2, w0, wbr(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), cle, cv(s0)))
  oveq2d(c1, crest, cdm(c0), c2, w0)
  fdmd(c0, c2, cr, w0)
  issmfle(s0, s1, c0, c1, cdm(c0), w0)
  eqid(cdm(c0))
  diff.cdm.s(s1, c0)
  diff.cdm.s(s0, c0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm issmfled(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0 ∈(SMblFn ` c1))
  ⊣ F/(s0, w0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ SAlg)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ⊆ ⋃ c1)
  ⊣ (w0 →(c0 : c2 → ℝ))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ ℝ)→ { s1 ∈ c2 |(c0 ` s1)[≤]s0 } ∈(c1[|`t]c2))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
} = {
  mpbird(w0, c0 ∈(SMblFn ` c1), (dom(c0)⊆ ⋃ c1 ∧(c0 : dom(c0)→ ℝ)∧ ∀(s0 ∈ ℝ, { s1 ∈ dom(c0)|(c0 ` s1)[≤]s0 } ∈(c1[|`t]dom(c0)))))
  3jca(w0, dom(c0)⊆ ⋃ c1, (c0 : dom(c0)→ ℝ), ∀(s0 ∈ ℝ, { s1 ∈ dom(c0)|(c0 ` s1)[≤]s0 } ∈(c1[|`t]dom(c0))))
  eqsstrd(dom(c0), ⋃ c1, c2, w0)
  ffdmd(c0, cr, c2, w0)
  ralrimi(s0, cr, w0, { s1 ∈ dom(c0)|(c0 ` s1)[≤]s0 } ∈(c1[|`t]dom(c0)))
  ex(w0, s0 ∈ ℝ, { s1 ∈ dom(c0)|(c0 ` s1)[≤]s0 } ∈(c1[|`t]dom(c0)))
  mpbird((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ ℝ), { s1 ∈ dom(c0)|(c0 ` s1)[≤]s0 } ∈(c1[|`t]dom(c0)), { s1 ∈ c2 |(c0 ` s1)[≤]s0 } ∈(c1[|`t]c2))
  adantr(w0, s0 ∈ ℝ, ({ s1 ∈ dom(c0)|(c0 ` s1)[≤]s0 } ∈(c1[|`t]dom(c0))↔ { s1 ∈ c2 |(c0 ` s1)[≤]s0 } ∈(c1[|`t]c2)))
  eleq12d({ s1 ∈ dom(c0)|(c0 ` s1)[≤]s0 }, (c1[|`t]dom(c0)), { s1 ∈ c2 |(c0 ` s1)[≤]s0 }, (c1[|`t]c2), w0)
  rabeqd(s1, dom(c0), c2, w0, (c0 ` s1)[≤]s0)
  oveq2d(c1, crest, dom(c0), c2, w0)
  fdmd(c0, c2, cr, w0)
  issmfle(s0, s1, c0, c1, dom(c0), w0)
  eqid(dom(c0))
  diff.cdm.s(s1, c0)
  diff.cdm.s(s0, c0)
}

blocks.name: smfpimltxrmpt
blocks.content: Given a function measurable w.r.t. to a sigma-algebra, the preimage of an open interval unbounded below is in the subspace sigma-algebra induced by its domain. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 26-Jun-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm smfpimltxrmpt(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, clt, c2)), co(c3, crest, c0)))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, csalg))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cfv(csmblfn, c3)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cxr))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  mpbird(w0, wcel(crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, clt, c2)), co(c3, crest, c0)), wcel(crab(s0, cdm(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), wbr(cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cv(s0)), clt, c2)), co(c3, crest, cdm(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)))))
  eqeltrd(crab(s0, cdm(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), wbr(cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cv(s0)), clt, c2)), co(c3, crest, cdm(cmpt(s0, c0, c1))), crab(hs0, cdm(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), wbr(cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cv(hs0)), clt, c2)), w0)
  a1i(w0, wceq(crab(s0, cdm(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), wbr(cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cv(s0)), clt, c2)), crab(hs0, cdm(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), wbr(cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cv(hs0)), clt, c2))))
  cbvrab(s0, hs0, cdm(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), wbr(cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cv(s0)), clt, c2), wbr(cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cv(hs0)), clt, c2))
  nfcv(hs0, cdm(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)))
  nfv(hs0, wbr(cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cv(s0)), clt, c2))
  nfbr(s0, cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cv(hs0)), clt, c2)
  nffv(s0, cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cv(hs0))
  nfcv(s0, cv(hs0))
  nfcv(s0, clt)
  nfcv(s0, c2)
  breq1d(cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cv(s0)), clt, c2, cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))
  fveq2(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cmpt(s0, c0, c1))
  smfpimltxr(hs0, cdm(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), cmpt(s0, c0, c1), c2, c3, w0)
  nfcv(hs0, cmpt(s0, c0, c1))
  eqid(cdm(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)))
  eleq12d(crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, clt, c2)), co(c3, crest, c0), crab(s0, cdm(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), wbr(cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cv(s0)), clt, c2)), co(c3, crest, cdm(cmpt(s0, c0, c1))), w0)
  3eqtrrd(crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, clt, c2)), crab(s0, cdm(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), wbr(cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cv(s0)), clt, c2)), crab(s0, c0, wbr(cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cv(s0)), clt, c2)), crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, clt, c2)), w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(crab(s0, cdm(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), wbr(cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cv(s0)), clt, c2)), crab(s0, c0, wbr(cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cv(s0)), clt, c2))), wceq(cdm(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), c0))
  rabeqf(s0, cdm(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), c0, wbr(cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cv(s0)), clt, c2))
  nfdm(s0, cmpt(s0, c0, c1))
  nfmpt1(s0, c0, c1)
  nfcv(s0, c0)
  rabbida(s0, c0, w0, wbr(cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cv(s0)), clt, c2), wbr(c1, clt, c2))
  breq1d(cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cv(s0)), clt, c2, c1, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  fvmpt2d(s0, c0, cmpt(s0, c0, c1), c1, c4, w0)
  a1i(w0, wceq(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cmpt(s0, c0, c1)))
  eqidd(crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, clt, c2)), w0)
  oveq2d(c3, crest, c0, cdm(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), w0)
  eqcomd(c0, cdm(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), w0)
  dmmptdf(s0, cmpt(s0, c0, c1), c0, c1, c4, w0)
  eqid(cmpt(s0, c0, c1))
  diff.hs0.c(cdm(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)))
  diff.hs0.w(wbr(cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cv(s0)), clt, c2))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.clt.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(cmpt(s0, c0, c1))

blocks.name: smfmbfcex
blocks.content: A constant function, with non-lebesgue-measurable domain is a sigma-measurable functions (w.r.t. the Lebesgue measure on the Reals) but it is not a measurable functions ( w.r.t. to ~ df-mbf ). (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 26-Jun-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm smfmbfcex(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wa(wcel(c0, cfv(csmblfn, c1)), wn(wcel(c0, cmbf))))
  -| wceq(c1, cdm(cvol))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c2, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wn(wcel(c2, c1)))
  -| wceq(c0, cmpt(s0, c2, nat0))
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  jca(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(csmblfn, c1)), wn(wcel(c0, cmbf)))
  smfconst(s0, c0, c1, c2, nat0, w0)
  nfv(s0, w0)
  a1i(w0, wcel(c1, csalg))
  eqeltri(c1, csalg, cdm(cvol))
  dmvolsal()
  syl6sseqr(c2, cuni(c1), cr, w0)
  eqtri(cuni(c1), cr, cuni(cdm(cvol)))
  unieqi(c1, cdm(cvol))
  unidmvol()
  0red(w0)
  syl(w0, wn(wcel(c0, cmbf)), wn(wcel(cdm(c0), cdm(cvol))))
  mpbird(w0, wn(wcel(cdm(c0), cdm(cvol))), wn(wcel(c2, c1)))
  notbid(w0, wcel(cdm(c0), cdm(cvol)), wcel(c2, c1))
  eleq12d(cdm(c0), cdm(cvol), c2, c1, w0)
  fdmd(c0, c2, cr, w0)
  fmptd(s0, c0, c2, cr, nat0, w0)
  0red(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)))
  a1i(w0, wceq(cdm(cvol), c1))
  eqcomi(cdm(cvol), c1)
  con3i(wcel(cdm(c0), cdm(cvol)), wcel(c0, cmbf))
  mbfdm(c0)
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
  diff.cr.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm smfmbfcex(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0 ∈(SMblFn ` c1)∧ ¬ c0 ∈ MblFn))
  ⊣ c1 = dom(vol)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ⊆ ℝ)
  ⊣ (w0 → ¬ c2 ∈ c1)
  ⊣ c0 =(s0 ∈ c2 ↦ 0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  jca(w0, c0 ∈(SMblFn ` c1), ¬ c0 ∈ MblFn)
  smfconst(s0, c0, c1, c2, nat0, w0)
  nfv(s0, w0)
  a1i(w0, c1 ∈ SAlg)
  eqeltri(c1, csalg, dom(vol))
  dmvolsal()
  syl6sseqr(c2, ⋃ c1, cr, w0)
  eqtri(⋃ c1, cr, ⋃ dom(vol))
  unieqi(c1, dom(vol))
  unidmvol()
  0red(w0)
  syl(w0, ¬ c0 ∈ MblFn, ¬ dom(c0)∈ dom(vol))
  mpbird(w0, ¬ dom(c0)∈ dom(vol), ¬ c2 ∈ c1)
  notbid(w0, dom(c0)∈ dom(vol), c2 ∈ c1)
  eleq12d(dom(c0), dom(vol), c2, c1, w0)
  fdmd(c0, c2, cr, w0)
  fmptd(s0, c0, c2, cr, nat0, w0)
  0red((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c2))
  a1i(w0, dom(vol)= c1)
  eqcomi(dom(vol), c1)
  con3i(dom(c0)∈ dom(vol), c0 ∈ MblFn)
  mbfdm(c0)
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
  diff.cr.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: issmfgtd
blocks.content: A sufficient condition for " ` F ` being a measurable function w.r.t. to the sigma-algebra ` S ` ". (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 26-Jun-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm issmfgtd(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(csmblfn, c1)))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, csalg))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c2, cuni(c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c0, c2, cr))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cr)), wcel(crab(s1, c2, wbr(cv(s0), clt, cfv(c0, cv(s1)))), co(c1, crest, c2)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {
  mpbird(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(csmblfn, c1)), w3a(wss(cdm(c0), cuni(c1)), wf(c0, cdm(c0), cr), wral(s0, cr, wcel(crab(s1, cdm(c0), wbr(cv(s0), clt, cfv(c0, cv(s1)))), co(c1, crest, cdm(c0))))))
  3jca(w0, wss(cdm(c0), cuni(c1)), wf(c0, cdm(c0), cr), wral(s0, cr, wcel(crab(s1, cdm(c0), wbr(cv(s0), clt, cfv(c0, cv(s1)))), co(c1, crest, cdm(c0)))))
  eqsstrd(cdm(c0), cuni(c1), c2, w0)
  ffdmd(c0, cr, c2, w0)
  ralrimi(s0, cr, w0, wcel(crab(s1, cdm(c0), wbr(cv(s0), clt, cfv(c0, cv(s1)))), co(c1, crest, cdm(c0))))
  ex(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cr), wcel(crab(s1, cdm(c0), wbr(cv(s0), clt, cfv(c0, cv(s1)))), co(c1, crest, cdm(c0))))
  mpbird(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cr)), wcel(crab(s1, cdm(c0), wbr(cv(s0), clt, cfv(c0, cv(s1)))), co(c1, crest, cdm(c0))), wcel(crab(s1, c2, wbr(cv(s0), clt, cfv(c0, cv(s1)))), co(c1, crest, c2)))
  eleq12d(crab(s1, cdm(c0), wbr(cv(s0), clt, cfv(c0, cv(s1)))), co(c1, crest, cdm(c0)), crab(s1, c2, wbr(cv(s0), clt, cfv(c0, cv(s1)))), co(c1, crest, c2), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cr)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cr), wceq(crab(s1, cdm(c0), wbr(cv(s0), clt, cfv(c0, cv(s1)))), crab(s1, c2, wbr(cv(s0), clt, cfv(c0, cv(s1))))))
  rabeqd(s1, cdm(c0), c2, w0, wbr(cv(s0), clt, cfv(c0, cv(s1))))

thm issmfgtd(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0 ∈(SMblFn ` c1))
  ⊣ F/(s0, w0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ SAlg)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ⊆ ⋃ c1)
  ⊣ (w0 →(c0 : c2 → ℝ))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ ℝ)→ { s1 ∈ c2 | s0[<](c0 ` s1)} ∈(c1[|`t]c2))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
} = {
  mpbird(w0, c0 ∈(SMblFn ` c1), (dom(c0)⊆ ⋃ c1 ∧(c0 : dom(c0)→ ℝ)∧ ∀(s0 ∈ ℝ, { s1 ∈ dom(c0)| s0[<](c0 ` s1)} ∈(c1[|`t]dom(c0)))))
  3jca(w0, dom(c0)⊆ ⋃ c1, (c0 : dom(c0)→ ℝ), ∀(s0 ∈ ℝ, { s1 ∈ dom(c0)| s0[<](c0 ` s1)} ∈(c1[|`t]dom(c0))))
  eqsstrd(dom(c0), ⋃ c1, c2, w0)
  ffdmd(c0, cr, c2, w0)
  ralrimi(s0, cr, w0, { s1 ∈ dom(c0)| s0[<](c0 ` s1)} ∈(c1[|`t]dom(c0)))
  ex(w0, s0 ∈ ℝ, { s1 ∈ dom(c0)| s0[<](c0 ` s1)} ∈(c1[|`t]dom(c0)))
  mpbird((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ ℝ), { s1 ∈ dom(c0)| s0[<](c0 ` s1)} ∈(c1[|`t]dom(c0)), { s1 ∈ c2 | s0[<](c0 ` s1)} ∈(c1[|`t]c2))
  eleq12d({ s1 ∈ dom(c0)| s0[<](c0 ` s1)}, (c1[|`t]dom(c0)), { s1 ∈ c2 | s0[<](c0 ` s1)}, (c1[|`t]c2), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ ℝ))
  adantr(w0, s0 ∈ ℝ, { s1 ∈ dom(c0)| s0[<](c0 ` s1)} = { s1 ∈ c2 | s0[<](c0 ` s1)})
  rabeqd(s1, dom(c0), c2, w0, s0[<](c0 ` s1))
  adantr(w0, s0 ∈ ℝ, (c1[|`t]dom(c0))=(c1[|`t]c2))
  oveq2d(c1, crest, dom(c0), c2, w0)
  fdmd(c0, c2, cr, w0)
  issmfgt(s0, s1, c0, c1, dom(c0), w0)
  eqid(dom(c0))
  diff.cdm.s(s1, c0)
  diff.cdm.s(s0, c0)
}

blocks.name: smfpreimagt
blocks.content: Given a function measurable w.r.t. to a sigma-algebra, the preimage of an open interval unbounded above is in the subspace sigma-algebra induced by its domain. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 26-Jun-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm smfpreimagt(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, clt, cfv(c2, cv(s0)))), co(c3, crest, c0)))

} = {

  mpbid(w0, w3a(wss(c0, cuni(c3)), wf(c2, c0, cr), wral(hs0, cr, wcel(crab(s0, c0, wbr(cv(hs0), clt, cfv(c2, cv(s0)))), co(c3, crest, c0)))), wcel(c2, cfv(csmblfn, c3)))
  issmfgt(hs0, s0, c2, c3, c0, w0)
  rspcva(hs0, c1, cr, wcel(crab(s0, c0, wbr(cv(hs0), clt, cfv(c2, cv(s0)))), co(c3, crest, c0)), wcel(crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, clt, cfv(c2, cv(s0)))), co(c3, crest, c0)))
  eleq1d(crab(s0, c0, wbr(cv(hs0), clt, cfv(c2, cv(s0)))), co(c3, crest, c0), crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, clt, cfv(c2, cv(s0)))), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))

  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)

thm smfpreimagt(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → { s0 ∈ c0 | c1[<](c2 ` s0)} ∈(c3[|`t]c0))
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ SAlg)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈(SMblFn ` c3))
  ⊣ c0 = dom(c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ ℝ)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
} = {
  syl2anc(w0, { s0 ∈ c0 | c1[<](c2 ` s0)} ∈(c3[|`t]c0), c1 ∈ ℝ, ∀(hs0 ∈ ℝ, { s0 ∈ c0 | hs0[<](c2 ` s0)} ∈(c3[|`t]c0)))
  simp3d(w0, ∀(hs0 ∈ ℝ, { s0 ∈ c0 | hs0[<](c2 ` s0)} ∈(c3[|`t]c0)), c0 ⊆ ⋃ c3, (c2 : c0 → ℝ))
  mpbid(w0, (c0 ⊆ ⋃ c3 ∧(c2 : c0 → ℝ)∧ ∀(hs0 ∈ ℝ, { s0 ∈ c0 | hs0[<](c2 ` s0)} ∈(c3[|`t]c0))), c2 ∈(SMblFn ` c3))
  issmfgt(hs0, s0, c2, c3, c0, w0)
  rspcva(hs0, c1, cr, { s0 ∈ c0 | hs0[<](c2 ` s0)} ∈(c3[|`t]c0), { s0 ∈ c0 | c1[<](c2 ` s0)} ∈(c3[|`t]c0))
  eleq1d({ s0 ∈ c0 | hs0[<](c2 ` s0)}, (c3[|`t]c0), { s0 ∈ c0 | c1[<](c2 ` s0)}, hs0 = c1)
  rabbidv(s0, c0, hs0 = c1, hs0[<](c2 ` s0), c1[<](c2 ` s0))
  breq1(hs0, c1, clt, (c2 ` s0))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cr)
  diff.hs0.w({ s0 ∈ c0 | c1[<](c2 ` s0)} ∈(c3[|`t]c0))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: smfaddlem2
blocks.content: The sum of two sigma-measurable functions is measurable. Proposition 121E (b) of [Fremlin1] p. 37 . (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 26-Jun-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm smfaddlem2(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {

  -| wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c1, c3), cfv(csmblfn, c5)))

  -| diffss(s0, s1)

  eqeltrd(crab(s0, cin(c0, c1), wbr(co(c2, caddc, c3), clt, c4)), co(c5, crest, cin(c0, c1)), ciun(s1, cq, ciun(s2, cfv(c7, cv(s1)), crab(s0, cin(c0, c1), wa(wbr(c2, clt, cv(s1)), wbr(c3, clt, cv(s2)))))), w0)

  ad2antlr(w0, wcel(cv(s1), cq), wcel(cv(s2), cfv(c7, cv(s1))), wcel(cv(s1), cr))
  smfpimltmpt(s0, cin(c0, c1), c3, cv(s2), c5, cr, wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), cq)), wcel(cv(s2), cfv(c7, cv(s1)))))
  nfan(s0, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), cq)), wcel(cv(s2), cfv(c7, cv(s1))))
  nfan(s0, w0, wcel(cv(s1), cq))
  nfv(s0, wcel(cv(s1), cq))
  nfv(s0, wcel(cv(s2), cfv(c7, cv(s1))))
  ad2antrr(w0, wcel(cv(s1), cq), wcel(cv(s2), cfv(c7, cv(s1))), wcel(c5, csalg))
  ad4ant14(w0, wcel(cv(s1), cq), wcel(cv(s2), cfv(c7, cv(s1))), wcel(cv(s0), cin(c0, c1)), wcel(c3, cr))
  syldan(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cin(c0, c1)), wcel(c3, cr), wcel(cv(s0), c1))
  ad2antrr(w0, wcel(cv(s1), cq), wcel(cv(s2), cfv(c7, cv(s1))), wcel(cmpt(s0, cin(c0, c1), c3), cfv(csmblfn, c5)))
  sssmfmpt(s0, cin(c0, c1), c3, c5, c1, w0)
  ssdf(s0, cin(c0, c1), c1, w0)
  adantl(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cin(c0, c1)), wcel(cv(s0), c1))
  elinel2(cv(s0), c0, c1)
  sseldi(cv(s2), cr, cq, wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), cq)), wcel(cv(s2), cfv(c7, cv(s1)))))
  ssriv(s1, cq, cr)
  qre(cv(s1))
  sselda(cv(s2), cfv(c7, cv(s1)), cq, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), cq)))
  syl6eqss(cfv(c7, cv(s1)), cq, crab(s2, cq, wbr(co(cv(s1), caddc, cv(s2)), clt, c4)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), cq)))
  fvmpt2d(s1, cq, c7, crab(s2, cq, wbr(co(cv(s1), caddc, cv(s2)), clt, c4)), universe, w0)
  a1i(w0, wceq(c7, cmpt(s1, cq, crab(s2, cq, wbr(co(cv(s1), caddc, cv(s2)), clt, c4)))))
  a1i(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), cq)), wcel(crab(s2, cq, wbr(co(cv(s1), caddc, cv(s2)), clt, c4)), universe))
  rabex(s2, cq, wbr(co(cv(s1), caddc, cv(s2)), clt, c4))
  qex()
  ssrab2(s2, cq, wbr(co(cv(s1), caddc, cv(s2)), clt, c4))
  diff.cq.s(s1)
  diff.co.s(s1, c5, crest, cin(c0, c1))
  diff.crest.s(s1)
  diff.cin.s(s1, c0, c1)
  diff.cin.s(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.cfv.s(s2, c7, cv(s1))

thm smfaddlem2(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → { s0 ∈(c0 ⋂ c1)|(c2[+]c3)[<]c4 } ∈(c5[|`t](c0 ⋂ c1)))
  ⊣ F/(s0, w0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c5 ∈ SAlg)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c6)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ c2 ∈ ℝ)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1)→ c3 ∈ ℝ)
  ⊣ (w0 →(s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c2)∈(SMblFn ` c5))
  ⊣ (w0 →(s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c3)∈(SMblFn ` c5))
  ⊣ (w0 → c4 ∈ ℝ)
  ⊣ c7 =(s1 ∈ ℚ ↦ { s2 ∈ ℚ |(s1[+]s2)[<]c4 })
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c7)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
  ⊣ d(s1, c4)
  ⊣ d(s1, c5)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c2)
  ⊣ d(s2, c3)
  ⊣ d(s2, c4)
  ⊣ d(s2, c5)
  ⊣ d(s2, c7)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
  ⊣ d(s2, w0)
} = {
  eqeltrd({ s0 ∈(c0 ⋂ c1)|(c2[+]c3)[<]c4 }, (c5[|`t](c0 ⋂ c1)), ⋃(s1 ∈ ℚ, ⋃(s2 ∈(c7 ` s1), { s0 ∈(c0 ⋂ c1)|(c2[<]s1 ∧ c3[<]s2)})), w0)
  smfaddlem1(s0, s1, s2, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c7, w0)
  saliuncl(s1, cq, ⋃(s2 ∈(c7 ` s1), { s0 ∈(c0 ⋂ c1)|(c2[<]s1 ∧ c3[<]s2)}), (c5[|`t](c0 ⋂ c1)), w0)
  a1i(w0, ℚ[≼]_om)
  saliuncl(s2, (c7 ` s1), { s0 ∈(c0 ⋂ c1)|(c2[<]s1 ∧ c3[<]s2)}, (c5[|`t](c0 ⋂ c1)), (w0 ∧ s1 ∈ ℚ))
  adantr(w0, s1 ∈ ℚ, (c5[|`t](c0 ⋂ c1))∈ SAlg)
  syl2anc((w0 ∧ s1 ∈ ℚ), (c7 ` s1)[≼]_om, (c7 ` s1)[≼]ℚ, ℚ[≼]_om)
  sylc((w0 ∧ s1 ∈ ℚ), (c7 ` s1)[≼]ℚ, ℚ ∈ 𝕌, (c7 ` s1)⊆ ℚ)
  a1i((w0 ∧ s1 ∈ ℚ), ℚ ∈ 𝕌)
  ssdomg(cq, universe, (c7 ` s1))
  a1i((w0 ∧ s1 ∈ ℚ), ℚ[≼]_om)
  qct()
  domtr((c7 ` s1), cq, com)
  syl5eqelr({ s0 ∈(c0 ⋂ c1)|(c2[<]s1 ∧ c3[<]s2)}, (c5[|`t](c0 ⋂ c1)), ({ s0 ∈(c0 ⋂ c1)| c2[<]s1 } ⋂ { s0 ∈(c0 ⋂ c1)| c3[<]s2 }), ((w0 ∧ s1 ∈ ℚ)∧ s2 ∈(c7 ` s1)))
  inrab(s0, (c0 ⋂ c1), c2[<]s1, c3[<]s2)
  salincld({ s0 ∈(c0 ⋂ c1)| c2[<]s1 }, { s0 ∈(c0 ⋂ c1)| c3[<]s2 }, (c5[|`t](c0 ⋂ c1)), ((w0 ∧ s1 ∈ ℚ)∧ s2 ∈(c7 ` s1)))
  ad2antrr(w0, s1 ∈ ℚ, s2 ∈(c7 ` s1), (c5[|`t](c0 ⋂ c1))∈ SAlg)
  subsalsal((c5[|`t](c0 ⋂ c1)), c5, (c0 ⋂ c1), universe, w0)
  ssexd((c0 ⋂ c1), c0, c6, w0)
  eqid((c5[|`t](c0 ⋂ c1)))
  smfpimltmpt(s0, (c0 ⋂ c1), c2, s1, c5, cr, ((w0 ∧ s1 ∈ ℚ)∧ s2 ∈(c7 ` s1)))
  ad4ant14(w0, s1 ∈ ℚ, s2 ∈(c7 ` s1), s0 ∈(c0 ⋂ c1), c2 ∈ ℝ)
  syldan(w0, s0 ∈(c0 ⋂ c1), c2 ∈ ℝ, s0 ∈ c0)
  ad2antrr(w0, s1 ∈ ℚ, s2 ∈(c7 ` s1), (s0 ∈(c0 ⋂ c1)↦ c2)∈(SMblFn ` c5))
  sssmfmpt(s0, (c0 ⋂ c1), c2, c5, c0, w0)
  ssdf(s0, (c0 ⋂ c1), c0, w0)
  adantl(w0, s0 ∈(c0 ⋂ c1), s0 ∈ c0)
  elinel1(s0, c0, c1)
  ad2antlr(w0, s1 ∈ ℚ, s2 ∈(c7 ` s1), s1 ∈ ℝ)
  smfpimltmpt(s0, (c0 ⋂ c1), c3, s2, c5, cr, ((w0 ∧ s1 ∈ ℚ)∧ s2 ∈(c7 ` s1)))
  nfan(s0, (w0 ∧ s1 ∈ ℚ), s2 ∈(c7 ` s1))
  nfan(s0, w0, s1 ∈ ℚ)
  nfv(s0, s1 ∈ ℚ)
  nfv(s0, s2 ∈(c7 ` s1))
  ad2antrr(w0, s1 ∈ ℚ, s2 ∈(c7 ` s1), c5 ∈ SAlg)
  ad4ant14(w0, s1 ∈ ℚ, s2 ∈(c7 ` s1), s0 ∈(c0 ⋂ c1), c3 ∈ ℝ)
  syldan(w0, s0 ∈(c0 ⋂ c1), c3 ∈ ℝ, s0 ∈ c1)
  ad2antrr(w0, s1 ∈ ℚ, s2 ∈(c7 ` s1), (s0 ∈(c0 ⋂ c1)↦ c3)∈(SMblFn ` c5))
  sssmfmpt(s0, (c0 ⋂ c1), c3, c5, c1, w0)
  ssdf(s0, (c0 ⋂ c1), c1, w0)
  adantl(w0, s0 ∈(c0 ⋂ c1), s0 ∈ c1)
  elinel2(s0, c0, c1)
  sseldi(s2, cr, cq, ((w0 ∧ s1 ∈ ℚ)∧ s2 ∈(c7 ` s1)))
  ssriv(s1, cq, cr)
  qre(s1)
  sselda(s2, (c7 ` s1), cq, (w0 ∧ s1 ∈ ℚ))
  syl6eqss((c7 ` s1), cq, { s2 ∈ ℚ |(s1[+]s2)[<]c4 }, (w0 ∧ s1 ∈ ℚ))
  fvmpt2d(s1, cq, c7, { s2 ∈ ℚ |(s1[+]s2)[<]c4 }, universe, w0)
  a1i(w0, c7 =(s1 ∈ ℚ ↦ { s2 ∈ ℚ |(s1[+]s2)[<]c4 }))
  a1i((w0 ∧ s1 ∈ ℚ), { s2 ∈ ℚ |(s1[+]s2)[<]c4 } ∈ 𝕌)
  rabex(s2, cq, (s1[+]s2)[<]c4)
  qex()
  ssrab2(s2, cq, (s1[+]s2)[<]c4)
  diff.cq.s(s1)
  diff.co.s(s1, c5, crest, (c0 ⋂ c1))
  diff.crest.s(s1)
  diff.cin.s(s1, c0, c1)
  diff.cin.s(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.cfv.s(s2, c7, s1)
  diff.co.s(s2, c5, crest, (c0 ⋂ c1))
  diff.crest.s(s2)
  diff.cin.s(s2, c0, c1)
  diff.wa.s(s2, w0, s1 ∈ ℚ)
  diff.wcel.s(s2, s1, cq)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
  diff.cq.s(s2)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, s1, cq)
  diff.cq.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, s2, (c7 ` s1))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c7, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s2)
  diff.cr.s(s1)
}

blocks.name: smfadd
blocks.content: The sum of two sigma-measurable functions is measurable. Proposition 121E (b) of [Fremlin1] p. 37 . (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 26-Jun-2021.)

thm smfadd(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, cin(c0, c1), co(c2, caddc, c3)), cfv(csmblfn, c4)))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, csalg))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c5))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c2, cr))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(c3, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c2), cfv(csmblfn, c4)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c1, c3), cfv(csmblfn, c4)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  issmfdmpt(s0, hs0, cin(c0, c1), co(c2, caddc, c3), c4, w0)
  nfv(hs0, w0)
  sstrd(cin(c0, c1), cuni(c4), c0, w0)
  ssdf(s0, cin(c0, c1), c0, w0)
  eqsstrd(c0, cuni(c4), cdm(cmpt(s0, c0, c2)), w0)
  eqcomd(c0, cdm(cmpt(s0, c0, c2)), w0)
  dmmptdf(s0, cmpt(s0, c0, c2), c0, c2, cr, w0)
  eqid(cmpt(s0, c0, c2))
  smfdmss(cdm(cmpt(s0, c0, c2)), c4, cmpt(s0, c0, c2), w0)
  eqid(cdm(cmpt(s0, c0, c2)))
  fvmptelrn(s0, cin(c0, c1), co(c2, caddc, c3), cr, w0)
  fmptdf(s0, cmpt(s0, cin(c0, c1), co(c2, caddc, c3)), cin(c0, c1), cr, co(c2, caddc, c3), w0)
  readdcld(c2, c3, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cin(c0, c1))))
  syldan(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cin(c0, c1)), wcel(c2, cr), wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  adantl(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cin(c0, c1)), wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  elinel1(cv(s0), c0, c1)
  syldan(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cin(c0, c1)), wcel(c3, cr), wcel(cv(s0), c1))
  adantl(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cin(c0, c1)), wcel(cv(s0), c1))
  elinel2(cv(s0), c0, c1)
  eqid(cmpt(s0, cin(c0, c1), co(c2, caddc, c3)))
  smfaddlem2(s0, hs1, hs3, c0, c1, c2, c3, cv(hs0), c4, c5, cmpt(hs1, cq, crab(hs2, cq, wbr(co(cv(hs1), caddc, cv(hs2)), clt, cv(hs0)))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cr)))
  nfan(s0, w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cr))
  nfv(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), cr))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wcel(c4, csalg))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wcel(c0, c5))
  adantlr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(c2, cr))
  adantlr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(c3, cr))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c2), cfv(csmblfn, c4)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wcel(cmpt(s0, c1, c3), cfv(csmblfn, c4)))
  simpr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cr))
  mpteq2i(hs1, cq, crab(hs2, cq, wbr(co(cv(hs1), caddc, cv(hs2)), clt, cv(hs0))), crab(hs3, cq, wbr(co(cv(hs1), caddc, cv(hs3)), clt, cv(hs0))))
  cbvrabv(hs2, hs3, cq, wbr(co(cv(hs1), caddc, cv(hs2)), clt, cv(hs0)), wbr(co(cv(hs1), caddc, cv(hs3)), clt, cv(hs0)))
  breq1d(co(cv(hs1), caddc, cv(hs2)), clt, cv(hs0), co(cv(hs1), caddc, cv(hs3)), wceq(cv(hs2), cv(hs3)))
  oveq2(cv(hs2), cv(hs3), cv(hs1), caddc)
  diff.cin.s(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cin(c0, c1))
  diff.hs0.c(co(c2, caddc, c3))
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs3)
  diff.hs3.s(s0)
  diff.hs1.s(hs3)

  diff.crab.s(s0, hs2, cq, wbr(co(cv(hs1), caddc, cv(hs2)), clt, cv(hs0)))
  diff.cq.s(s0)
  diff.wbr.s(s0, co(cv(hs1), caddc, cv(hs2)), clt, cv(hs0))
  diff.co.s(s0, cv(hs1), caddc, cv(hs2))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.caddc.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs2)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs2)
  diff.hs2.s(s0)
  diff.clt.s(s0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c(cv(hs0))
  diff.hs1.c(c4)
  diff.hs3.c(c0)
  diff.hs3.c(c1)
  diff.hs3.c(c2)
  diff.hs3.c(c3)
  diff.hs3.c(cv(hs0))
  diff.hs3.c(c4)
  diff.hs3.c(cmpt(hs1, cq, crab(hs2, cq, wbr(co(cv(hs1), caddc, cv(hs2)), clt, cv(hs0)))))
  diff.hs1.w(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cr)))
  diff.hs3.w(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cr)))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cv(hs0), cr)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cr.s(s0)
  diff.hs2.s(hs3)
  diff.hs2.c(cq)
  diff.hs3.c(cq)
  diff.hs2.w(wbr(co(cv(hs1), caddc, cv(hs3)), clt, cv(hs0)))
  diff.hs3.w(wbr(co(cv(hs1), caddc, cv(hs2)), clt, cv(hs0)))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm smfadd(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(s0 ∈(c0 ⋂ c1)↦(c2[+]c3))∈(SMblFn ` c4))
  ⊣ F/(s0, w0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c4 ∈ SAlg)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c5)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ c2 ∈ ℝ)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1)→ c3 ∈ ℝ)
  ⊣ (w0 →(s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c2)∈(SMblFn ` c4))
  ⊣ (w0 →(s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c3)∈(SMblFn ` c4))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
} = {
  issmfdmpt(s0, hs0, (c0 ⋂ c1), (c2[+]c3), c4, w0)
  nfv(hs0, w0)
  sstrd((c0 ⋂ c1), ⋃ c4, c0, w0)
  ssdf(s0, (c0 ⋂ c1), c0, w0)
  eqsstrd(c0, ⋃ c4, dom((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c2)), w0)
  eqcomd(c0, dom((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c2)), w0)
  dmmptdf(s0, (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c2), c0, c2, cr, w0)
  eqid((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c2))
  smfdmss(dom((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c2)), c4, (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c2), w0)
  eqid(dom((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c2)))
  fvmptelrn(s0, (c0 ⋂ c1), (c2[+]c3), cr, w0)
  fmptdf(s0, (s0 ∈(c0 ⋂ c1)↦(c2[+]c3)), (c0 ⋂ c1), cr, (c2[+]c3), w0)
  readdcld(c2, c3, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈(c0 ⋂ c1)))
  syldan(w0, s0 ∈(c0 ⋂ c1), c2 ∈ ℝ, s0 ∈ c0)
  adantl(w0, s0 ∈(c0 ⋂ c1), s0 ∈ c0)
  elinel1(s0, c0, c1)
  syldan(w0, s0 ∈(c0 ⋂ c1), c3 ∈ ℝ, s0 ∈ c1)
  adantl(w0, s0 ∈(c0 ⋂ c1), s0 ∈ c1)
  elinel2(s0, c0, c1)
  eqid((s0 ∈(c0 ⋂ c1)↦(c2[+]c3)))
  smfaddlem2(s0, hs1, hs3, c0, c1, c2, c3, hs0, c4, c5, (hs1 ∈ ℚ ↦ { hs2 ∈ ℚ |(hs1[+]hs2)[<]hs0 }), (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ℝ))
  nfan(s0, w0, hs0 ∈ ℝ)
  nfv(s0, hs0 ∈ ℝ)
  adantr(w0, hs0 ∈ ℝ, c4 ∈ SAlg)
  adantr(w0, hs0 ∈ ℝ, c0 ∈ c5)
  adantlr(w0, hs0 ∈ ℝ, s0 ∈ c0, c2 ∈ ℝ)
  adantlr(w0, hs0 ∈ ℝ, s0 ∈ c1, c3 ∈ ℝ)

thm decsmflem(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, wff w0) {

  -| wceq(c4, cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)))

  pimdecfgtioc(s1, s2, c1, c8, c2, c3, c5, c6, wa(w0, wcel(c6, c1)))
  nfan(s1, w0, wcel(c6, c1))
  adantr(w0, wcel(c6, c1), wss(c2, cr))

  adantr(w0, wcel(c6, c1), wcel(c5, cxr))

  rspceeqv(s0, c8, c0, c1, cin(c8, c2), cin(cv(s0), c2))
  ineq1(cv(s0), c8, c2)
  syl2anc(wa(w0, wn(wcel(c6, c1))), wrex(s0, c0, wceq(c1, cin(cv(s0), c2))), wcel(c7, c0), wceq(c1, cin(c7, c2)))
  adantr(w0, wn(wcel(c6, c1)), wcel(c7, c0))
  a1i(w0, wcel(c7, c0))
  eqeltri(c7, c0, co(cmnf, cioo, c6))

thm decsmflem(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → ∃(s0 ∈ c0, c1 =(s0 ⋂ c2)))
  ⊣ F/(s1, w0)
  ⊣ F/(s2, w0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ⊆ ℝ)
  ⊣ (w0 →(c3 : c2 → ℝ*))
  ⊣ (w0 → ∀(s1 ∈ c2, ∀(s2 ∈ c2,(s1[≤]s2 →(c3 ` s2)[≤](c3 ` s1)))))
  ⊣ c4 =(topGen ` ran((,)))
  ⊣ c0 =(SalGen ` c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → c5 ∈ ℝ*)
  ⊣ c1 = { s1 ∈ c2 | c5[<](c3 ` s1)}
  ⊣ c6 = sup(c1, ℝ*, <)
  ⊣ c7 =(-∞[(,)]c6)
  ⊣ c8 =(-∞[(,]]c6)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c7)
  ⊣ d(s0, c8)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
  ⊣ d(s1, c5)
  ⊣ d(s1, c7)
  ⊣ d(s1, c8)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c2)
  ⊣ d(s2, c3)
  ⊣ d(s2, c5)
  ⊣ d(s2, c6)
  ⊣ d(s2, c7)
} = {
  pm2.61dan(w0, ∃(s0 ∈ c0, c1 =(s0 ⋂ c2)), c6 ∈ c1)
  syl2anc((w0 ∧ c6 ∈ c1), ∃(s0 ∈ c0, c1 =(s0 ⋂ c2)), c8 ∈ c0, c1 =(c8 ⋂ c2))
  syl5eqel(c8, c0, (-∞[(,]]c6), (w0 ∧ c6 ∈ c1))
  iocborel(cmnf, c6, c0, c4, (w0 ∧ c6 ∈ c1))
  a1i((w0 ∧ c6 ∈ c1), -∞ ∈ ℝ*)
  mnfxr()
  sselda(c6, c1, cr, w0)
  sstrd(c1, cr, c2, w0)
  a1i(w0, c1 ⊆ c2)
  eqsstri(c1, c2, { s1 ∈ c2 | c5[<](c3 ` s1)})
  ssrab2(s1, c2, c5[<](c3 ` s1))

  nfan(s1, w0, c6 ∈ c1)
  adantr(w0, c6 ∈ c1, c2 ⊆ ℝ)
  adantr(w0, c6 ∈ c1, (c3 : c2 → ℝ*))
  adantr(w0, c6 ∈ c1, ∀(s1 ∈ c2, ∀(s2 ∈ c2,(s1[≤]s2 →(c3 ` s2)[≤](c3 ` s1)))))
  adantr(w0, c6 ∈ c1, c5 ∈ ℝ*)
  simpr(w0, c6 ∈ c1)
  rspceeqv(s0, c8, c0, c1, (c8 ⋂ c2), (s0 ⋂ c2))
  ineq1(s0, c8, c2)
  syl2anc((w0 ∧ ¬ c6 ∈ c1), ∃(s0 ∈ c0, c1 =(s0 ⋂ c2)), c7 ∈ c0, c1 =(c7 ⋂ c2))
  adantr(w0, ¬ c6 ∈ c1, c7 ∈ c0)
  a1i(w0, c7 ∈ c0)
  eqeltri(c7, c0, (-∞[(,)]c6))
  iooborel(cmnf, c6, c0, c4)
  pimdecfgtioo(s1, s2, c1, c7, c2, c3, c5, c6, (w0 ∧ ¬ c6 ∈ c1))
  nfan(s1, w0, ¬ c6 ∈ c1)
  nfn(s1, c6 ∈ c1)
  nfel(s1, c6, c1)
  nfcxfr(s1, c6, sup(c1, ℝ*, <))
  nfsup(s1, c1, cxr, clt)
  nfcv(s1, cxr)
  nfcv(s1, clt)
  nfcxfr(s1, c1, { s1 ∈ c2 | c5[<](c3 ` s1)})
  nfrab1(s1, c2, c5[<](c3 ` s1))
  nfan(s2, w0, ¬ c6 ∈ c1)
  nfv(s2, ¬ c6 ∈ c1)

  simpr(w0, ¬ c6 ∈ c1)

  ineq1(s0, c7, c2)

  diff.clt.s(s1)
  diff.cin.s(s0, c8, c2)

blocks.name: smfpreimagtf
blocks.content: Given a function measurable w.r.t. to a sigma-algebra, the preimage of an open interval unbounded above is in the subspace sigma-algebra induced by its domain. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 26-Jun-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm smfpreimagtf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, clt, cfv(c2, cv(s0)))), co(c3, crest, c0)))
  -| wnfc(s0, c2)
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, csalg))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cfv(csmblfn, c3)))
  -| wceq(c0, cdm(c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cr))
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  eqeltrd(crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, clt, cfv(c2, cv(s0)))), co(c3, crest, c0), crab(hs0, c0, wbr(c1, clt, cfv(c2, cv(hs0)))), w0)
  a1i(w0, wceq(crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, clt, cfv(c2, cv(s0)))), crab(hs0, c0, wbr(c1, clt, cfv(c2, cv(hs0))))))
  cbvrab(s0, hs0, c0, wbr(c1, clt, cfv(c2, cv(s0))), wbr(c1, clt, cfv(c2, cv(hs0))))
  nfcxfr(s0, c0, cdm(c2))
  nfdm(s0, c2)
  nfcv(hs0, c0)
  nfv(hs0, wbr(c1, clt, cfv(c2, cv(s0))))
  nfbr(s0, c1, clt, cfv(c2, cv(hs0)))
  nfcv(s0, c1)
  nfcv(s0, clt)
  nffv(s0, c2, cv(hs0))
  nfcv(s0, cv(hs0))
  breq2d(c1, clt, cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))
  fveq2(cv(s0), cv(hs0), c2)
  smfpreimagt(hs0, c0, c1, c2, c3, w0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wbr(c1, clt, cfv(c2, cv(s0))))
  diff.clt.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
}

  ⊣ F/(s0, c2)

blocks.name: issmfgelem
blocks.content: The predicate " ` F ` is a real-valued measurable function w.r.t. to the sigma-algebra ` S ` ". A function is measurable iff the preimages of all left-closed intervals unbounded above are in the subspace sigma-algebra induced by its domain. The domain of ` F ` is required to be a subset of the underlying set of ` S ` . Definition 121C of [Fremlin1] p. 36, and Proposition 121B (iv) of [Fremlin1] p. 36 . (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 26-Jun-2021.)

  -| diffss(s0, s1)

  3jca(w0, wss(c2, cuni(c1)), wf(c0, c2, cr), wral(hs0, cr, wcel(crab(s0, c2, wbr(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), clt, cv(hs0))), co(c1, crest, c2))))
  ralrimiva(hs0, cr, w0, wcel(crab(s0, c2, wbr(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), clt, cv(hs0))), co(c1, crest, c2)))
  eqeltrd(crab(s0, c2, wbr(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), clt, cv(hs0))), co(c1, crest, c2), crab(s0, cuni(co(c1, crest, c2)), wbr(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), clt, cv(hs0))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cr)))

  rabeqd(s0, c2, cuni(co(c1, crest, c2)), w0, wbr(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), clt, cv(hs0)))
  salpreimagelt(s0, s1, cuni(co(c1, crest, c2)), cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cv(hs0), co(c1, crest, c2), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cr)))
  nfan(s0, w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cr))

thm issmfgelem(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0 ∈(SMblFn ` c1))

  ⊣ (w0 → ∀(s1 ∈ ℝ, { s0 ∈ c2 | s1[≤](c0 ` s0)} ∈(c1[|`t]c2)))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)

  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)

  eqeltrd({ s0 ∈ c2 |(c0 ` s0)[<]hs0 }, (c1[|`t]c2), { s0 ∈ ⋃(c1[|`t]c2)|(c0 ` s0)[<]hs0 }, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ℝ))
  adantr(w0, hs0 ∈ ℝ, { s0 ∈ c2 |(c0 ` s0)[<]hs0 } = { s0 ∈ ⋃(c1[|`t]c2)|(c0 ` s0)[<]hs0 })

  simpr(w0, c2 ⊆ ⋃ c1)
  eqid((c1[|`t]c2))
  eqid(⋃(c1[|`t]c2))
  adantlr(w0, hs0 ∈ ℝ, s0 ∈ ⋃(c1[|`t]c2), (c0 ` s0)∈ ℝ*)
  rexrd((c0 ` s0), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ ⋃(c1[|`t]c2)))

  diff.co.s(s0, c1, crest, c2)
  diff.crest.s(s0)

  diff.cfv.s(s1, c0, s0)

blocks.name: issmfge
blocks.content: The predicate " ` F ` is a real-valued measurable function w.r.t. to the sigma-algebra ` S ` ". A function is measurable iff the preimages of all left-closed intervals unbounded above are in the subspace sigma-algebra induced by its domain. The domain of ` F ` is required to be b subset of the underlying set of ` S ` . Definition 121C of [Fremlin1] p. 36, and Proposition 121B (iv) of [Fremlin1] p. 36 . (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 26-Jun-2021.)

blocks.name: smflimlem1
blocks.content: Lemma for the proof that the limit of a sequence of sigma-measurable functions is sigma-measurable, Proposition 121F (a) of [Fremlin1] p. 38 . This lemma proves that ` ( D i^i I ) ` is in the subspace sigma-algebra induced by ` D ` . (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 26-Jun-2021.)

blocks.name: smflimlem2
blocks.content: Lemma for the proof that the limit of sigma-measurable functions is sigma-measurable, Proposition 121F (a) of [Fremlin1] p. 38 . This lemma proves one-side of the double inclusion for the proof that the preimages of right-closed, unbounded-below intervals are in the subspace sigma-algebra induced by ` D ` . (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 26-Jun-2021.)

blocks.name: smflimlem3
blocks.content: The limit of sigma-measurable functions is sigma-measurable. Proposition 121F (a) of [Fremlin1] p. 38 . (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 26-Jun-2021.)

blocks.name: smflimlem4
blocks.content: Lemma for the proof that the limit of sigma-measurable functions is sigma-measurable, Proposition 121F (a) of [Fremlin1] p. 38 . This lemma proves one-side of the double inclusion for the proof that the preimages of right-closed, unbounded-below intervals are in the subspace sigma-algebra induced by ` D ` . (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 26-Jun-2021.)

blocks.name: smflim
blocks.content: The limit of sigma-measurable functions is sigma-measurable. Proposition 121F (a) of [Fremlin1] p. 38 . Notice that every function in the sequence can have a different (partial) domain, and the domain of convergence can be decidedly irregular (Remark 121G of [Fremlin1] p. 39 ). (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 26-Jun-2021.)
blocks.origin:

thm smflim(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0 ∈(SMblFn ` c1))
  ⊣ F/(s0, c2)
  ⊣ F/(s1, c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ ℤ)
  ⊣ c4 =(ℤ≥ ` c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ SAlg)
  ⊣ (w0 →(c2 : c4 →(SMblFn ` c1)))
  ⊣ c5 = { s1 ∈ ⋃(s2 ∈ c4, ⋂(s0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` s2), dom((c2 ` s0))))|(s0 ∈ c4 ↦((c2 ` s0)` s1))∈ dom(~~>)}
  ⊣ c0 =(s1 ∈ c5 ↦(~~> `(s0 ∈ c4 ↦((c2 ` s0)` s1))))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
  ⊣ d(s1, c4)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c2)
  ⊣ d(s2, c4)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s2, w0)
} = {
  issmfled(hs1, hs0, c0, c1, c5, w0)
  nfv(hs1, w0)
  sstrd(c5, ⋃ c1, ⋃(s2 ∈ c4, ⋂(s0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` s2), dom((c2 ` s0)))), w0)
  a1i(w0, c5 ⊆ ⋃(s2 ∈ c4, ⋂(s0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` s2), dom((c2 ` s0)))))
  eqsstri(c5, ⋃(s2 ∈ c4, ⋂(s0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` s2), dom((c2 ` s0)))), { s1 ∈ ⋃(s2 ∈ c4, ⋂(s0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` s2), dom((c2 ` s0))))|(s0 ∈ c4 ↦((c2 ` s0)` s1))∈ dom(~~>)})
  ssrab2f(s1, ⋃(s2 ∈ c4, ⋂(s0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` s2), dom((c2 ` s0)))), (s0 ∈ c4 ↦((c2 ` s0)` s1))∈ dom(~~>))

blocks.name: nsssmfmbflem
blocks.content: The sigma-measurable functions (w.r.t. the Lebesgue measure on the Reals) are not a subset of the measurable functions. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 26-Jun-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm nsssmfmbflem(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(csmblfn, c0)), wn(wcel(cv(s0), cmbf)))))
  -| wceq(c0, cdm(cvol))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c1, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wn(wcel(c1, c0)))
  -| wceq(c2, cmpt(s1, c1, nat0))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  sylc(w0, wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(csmblfn, c0)), wn(wcel(cv(s0), cmbf)))), wcel(c2, universe), wa(wcel(c2, cfv(csmblfn, c0)), wn(wcel(c2, cmbf))))
  fexd(c2, c1, cr, universe, w0)
  fmptd(s1, c2, c1, cr, nat0, w0)
  0red(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c1)))
  ssexd(c1, cr, universe, w0)
  a1i(w0, wcel(cr, universe))
  reex()
  smfmbfcex(s1, c2, c0, c1, w0)
  spcegv(s0, c2, universe, wa(wcel(c2, cfv(csmblfn, c0)), wn(wcel(c2, cmbf))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(csmblfn, c0)), wn(wcel(cv(s0), cmbf))))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(s0), cfv(csmblfn, c0)), wn(wcel(cv(s0), cmbf)), wcel(c2, cfv(csmblfn, c0)), wn(wcel(c2, cmbf)))
  eleq1(cv(s0), c2, cfv(csmblfn, c0))
  notbid(wceq(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(s0), cmbf), wcel(c2, cmbf))
  eleq1(cv(s0), c2, cmbf)
  diff.cr.s(s1)
  diff.wa.s(s0, wcel(c2, cfv(csmblfn, c0)), wn(wcel(c2, cmbf)))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c2, cfv(csmblfn, c0))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, csmblfn, c0)
  diff.csmblfn.s(s0)
  diff.wn.s(s0, wcel(c2, cmbf))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c2, cmbf)
  diff.cmbf.s(s0)
}

thm nsssmfmbflem(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → ∃(s0,(s0 ∈(SMblFn ` c0)∧ ¬ s0 ∈ MblFn)))
  ⊣ c0 = dom(vol)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ⊆ ℝ)
  ⊣ (w0 → ¬ c1 ∈ c0)
  ⊣ c2 =(s1 ∈ c1 ↦ 0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  sylc(w0, ∃(s0,(s0 ∈(SMblFn ` c0)∧ ¬ s0 ∈ MblFn)), c2 ∈ 𝕌, (c2 ∈(SMblFn ` c0)∧ ¬ c2 ∈ MblFn))
  fexd(c2, c1, cr, universe, w0)
  fmptd(s1, c2, c1, cr, nat0, w0)
  0red((w0 ∧ s1 ∈ c1))
  ssexd(c1, cr, universe, w0)
  a1i(w0, ℝ ∈ 𝕌)
  reex()
  smfmbfcex(s1, c2, c0, c1, w0)
  spcegv(s0, c2, universe, (c2 ∈(SMblFn ` c0)∧ ¬ c2 ∈ MblFn), (s0 ∈(SMblFn ` c0)∧ ¬ s0 ∈ MblFn))
  anbi12d(s0 = c2, s0 ∈(SMblFn ` c0), ¬ s0 ∈ MblFn, c2 ∈(SMblFn ` c0), ¬ c2 ∈ MblFn)
  eleq1(s0, c2, (SMblFn ` c0))
  notbid(s0 = c2, s0 ∈ MblFn, c2 ∈ MblFn)
  eleq1(s0, c2, cmbf)
  diff.cr.s(s1)
  diff.wa.s(s0, c2 ∈(SMblFn ` c0), ¬ c2 ∈ MblFn)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c2, (SMblFn ` c0))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, csmblfn, c0)
  diff.csmblfn.s(s0)
  diff.wn.s(s0, c2 ∈ MblFn)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c2, cmbf)
  diff.cmbf.s(s0)
}

blocks.content: The sigma-measurable functions (w.r.t. the Lebesgue measure on the Reals) are not a subset of the measurable functions. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 26-Jun-2021.)

thm nsssmfmbf(class c0) {
  |- wn(wss(cfv(csmblfn, c0), cmbf))
  -| wceq(c0, cdm(cvol))
} = {
  mpbir(wn(wss(cfv(csmblfn, c0), cmbf)), wex(hs0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(csmblfn, c0)), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), cmbf)))))
  ax-mp(wex(hs0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(csmblfn, c0)), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), cmbf)))), wex(hs1, wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cpw(cr)), wn(wcel(cv(hs1), cdm(cvol))))))
  mpbi(wex(hs1, wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cpw(cr)), wn(wcel(cv(hs1), cdm(cvol))))), wn(wss(cpw(cr), cdm(cvol))))
  pssnssi(cpw(cr), cdm(cvol))
  vitali2()
  nss(hs1, cpw(cr), cdm(cvol))
  exlimiv(hs1, wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cpw(cr)), wn(wcel(cv(hs1), cdm(cvol)))), wex(hs0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(csmblfn, c0)), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), cmbf)))))
  nsssmfmbflem(hs0, hs2, c0, cv(hs1), cmpt(hs2, cv(hs1), nat0), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cpw(cr)), wn(wcel(cv(hs1), cdm(cvol)))))
  adantr(wcel(cv(hs1), cpw(cr)), wn(wcel(cv(hs1), cdm(cvol))), wss(cv(hs1), cr))
  elpwi(cv(hs1), cr)
  adantl(wcel(cv(hs1), cpw(cr)), wn(wcel(cv(hs1), cdm(cvol))), wn(wcel(cv(hs1), c0)))
  biimpi(wn(wcel(cv(hs1), cdm(cvol))), wn(wcel(cv(hs1), c0)))
  notbii(wcel(cv(hs1), cdm(cvol)), wcel(cv(hs1), c0))
  bicomi(wcel(cv(hs1), cdm(cvol)), wcel(cv(hs1), c0))
  eleq2i(cv(hs1), c0, cdm(cvol))
  eqid(cmpt(hs2, cv(hs1), nat0))
  nss(hs0, cfv(csmblfn, c0), cmbf)
  diff.hs1.c(cpw(cr))
  diff.hs1.c(cdm(cvol))
  diff.hs1.w(wex(hs0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(csmblfn, c0)), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), cmbf)))))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cmpt(hs2, cv(hs1), nat0))
  diff.hs2.c(cv(hs1))
  diff.hs2.w(wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cpw(cr)), wn(wcel(cv(hs1), cdm(cvol)))))
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(csmblfn, c0))
  diff.hs0.c(cmbf)
}

thm nsssmfmbf(class c0) {
  ⊢ ¬(SMblFn ` c0)⊆ MblFn
  ⊣ c0 = dom(vol)
} = {
  mpbir(¬(SMblFn ` c0)⊆ MblFn, ∃(hs0,(hs0 ∈(SMblFn ` c0)∧ ¬ hs0 ∈ MblFn)))
  ax-mp(∃(hs0,(hs0 ∈(SMblFn ` c0)∧ ¬ hs0 ∈ MblFn)), ∃(hs1,(hs1 ∈ P(ℝ)∧ ¬ hs1 ∈ dom(vol))))
  mpbi(∃(hs1,(hs1 ∈ P(ℝ)∧ ¬ hs1 ∈ dom(vol))), ¬ P(ℝ)⊆ dom(vol))
  pssnssi(P(ℝ), dom(vol))
  vitali2()
  nss(hs1, P(ℝ), dom(vol))
  exlimiv(hs1, (hs1 ∈ P(ℝ)∧ ¬ hs1 ∈ dom(vol)), ∃(hs0,(hs0 ∈(SMblFn ` c0)∧ ¬ hs0 ∈ MblFn)))
  nsssmfmbflem(hs0, hs2, c0, hs1, (hs2 ∈ hs1 ↦ 0), (hs1 ∈ P(ℝ)∧ ¬ hs1 ∈ dom(vol)))
  adantr(hs1 ∈ P(ℝ), ¬ hs1 ∈ dom(vol), hs1 ⊆ ℝ)
  elpwi(hs1, cr)
  adantl(hs1 ∈ P(ℝ), ¬ hs1 ∈ dom(vol), ¬ hs1 ∈ c0)
  biimpi(¬ hs1 ∈ dom(vol), ¬ hs1 ∈ c0)
  notbii(hs1 ∈ dom(vol), hs1 ∈ c0)
  bicomi(hs1 ∈ dom(vol), hs1 ∈ c0)
  eleq2i(hs1, c0, dom(vol))
  eqid((hs2 ∈ hs1 ↦ 0))
  nss(hs0, (SMblFn ` c0), cmbf)
  diff.hs1.c(P(ℝ))
  diff.hs1.c(dom(vol))
  diff.hs1.w(∃(hs0,(hs0 ∈(SMblFn ` c0)∧ ¬ hs0 ∈ MblFn)))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c((hs2 ∈ hs1 ↦ 0))
  diff.hs2.c(hs1)
  diff.hs2.w((hs1 ∈ P(ℝ)∧ ¬ hs1 ∈ dom(vol)))
  diff.hs0.c((SMblFn ` c0))
  diff.hs0.c(cmbf)
}

blocks.name: smfpimgtxr
blocks.content: Given a function measurable w.r.t. to a sigma-algebra, the preimage of an open interval unbounded above is in the subspace sigma-algebra induced by its domain. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 26-Jun-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm smfpimgtxr(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, clt, cfv(c2, cv(s0)))), co(c3, crest, c0)))
  -| wnfc(s0, c2)
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, csalg))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cfv(csmblfn, c3)))

  pm2.61dan(w0, { s0 ∈ c0 | c1[<](c2 ` s0)} ∈(c3[|`t]c0), c1 = -∞)

  adantr(w0, c1 = -∞, { s0 ∈ c0 | -∞[<](c2 ` s0)} = c0)

  simpr(w0, hs0 ∈ c0)
  eqidd(c0, w0)
  adantr(w0, c1 = -∞, c0 ∈(c3[|`t]c0))
  eqeltrd(c0, (c3[|`t]c0), ⋃(c3[|`t]c0), w0)
  eqcomd(c0, ⋃(c3[|`t]c0), w0)
  restuni4(c3, c0, csalg, w0)

  salunid((c3[|`t]c0), w0)
  syldan(w0, ¬ c1 = -∞, { s0 ∈ c0 | c1[<](c2 ` s0)} ∈(c3[|`t]c0), c1 ≠ -∞)
  adantl(w0, ¬ c1 = -∞, c1 ≠ -∞)
  neqne(c1, cmnf)
  pm2.61dan((w0 ∧ c1 ≠ -∞), { s0 ∈ c0 | c1[<](c2 ` s0)} ∈(c3[|`t]c0), c1 = +∞)
  adantlr(w0, c1 ≠ -∞, c1 = +∞, { s0 ∈ c0 | c1[<](c2 ` s0)} ∈(c3[|`t]c0))
  eqeltrd({ s0 ∈ c0 | c1[<](c2 ` s0)}, (c3[|`t]c0), emptycls, (w0 ∧ c1 = +∞))
  eqtrd({ s0 ∈ c0 | c1[<](c2 ` s0)}, emptycls, { s0 ∈ c0 | +∞[<](c2 ` s0)}, (w0 ∧ c1 = +∞))
  adantl(w0, c1 = +∞, { s0 ∈ c0 | c1[<](c2 ` s0)} = { s0 ∈ c0 | +∞[<](c2 ` s0)})
  rabbidv(s0, c0, c1 = +∞, c1[<](c2 ` s0), +∞[<](c2 ` s0))

  adantr(w0, c1 ∈ ℝ, c2 ∈(SMblFn ` c3))
  simpr(w0, c1 ∈ ℝ)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, c1, cmnf)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(-∞[<](c2 ` s0))

  diff.clt.s(s0)

blocks.content: Given a function measurable w.r.t. to a sigma-algebra, the preimage of an open interval unbounded above is in the subspace sigma-algebra induced by its domain. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 26-Jun-2021.)

thm smfpimgtmpt(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, clt, c2)), co(c3, crest, c0)))

  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c2, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c2), cfv(csmblfn, c3)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cr))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  mpbird(w0, wcel(crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, clt, c2)), co(c3, crest, c0)), wcel(crab(s0, cdm(cmpt(s0, c0, c2)), wbr(c1, clt, cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c2), cv(s0)))), co(c3, crest, cdm(cmpt(s0, c0, c2)))))
  smfpreimagtf(s0, cdm(cmpt(s0, c0, c2)), c1, cmpt(s0, c0, c2), c3, w0)
  eqid(cdm(cmpt(s0, c0, c2)))
  eleq12d(crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, clt, c2)), co(c3, crest, c0), crab(s0, cdm(cmpt(s0, c0, c2)), wbr(c1, clt, cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c2), cv(s0)))), co(c3, crest, cdm(cmpt(s0, c0, c2))), w0)
  3eqtrrd(crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, clt, c2)), crab(s0, cdm(cmpt(s0, c0, c2)), wbr(c1, clt, cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c2), cv(s0)))), crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, clt, cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c2), cv(s0)))), crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, clt, c2)), w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(crab(s0, cdm(cmpt(s0, c0, c2)), wbr(c1, clt, cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c2), cv(s0)))), crab(s0, c0, wbr(c1, clt, cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c2), cv(s0))))), wceq(cdm(cmpt(s0, c0, c2)), c0))
  rabeqf(s0, cdm(cmpt(s0, c0, c2)), c0, wbr(c1, clt, cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c2), cv(s0))))
  nfdm(s0, cmpt(s0, c0, c2))
  nfmpt1(s0, c0, c2)
  nfcv(s0, c0)
  rabbida(s0, c0, w0, wbr(c1, clt, cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c2), cv(s0))), wbr(c1, clt, c2))
  breq2d(c1, clt, cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c2), cv(s0)), c2, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  fvmpt2d(s0, c0, cmpt(s0, c0, c2), c2, c4, w0)

  oveq2d(c3, crest, c0, cdm(cmpt(s0, c0, c2)), w0)
